40// Order
41//
42// Standard (non-Kokkos data structures)
43// 1. FArray
44// 2. ViewFArray
45// 3. FMatrix
46// 4. ViewFMatrix
47// 5. CArray
48// 6. ViewCArray
49// 7. CMatrix
50// 8. ViewCMatrix
51// 9. RaggedRightArray
52// 10. RaggedDownArray
53// 11. DynamicRaggedRightArray
54// 12. DynamicRaggedDownArray
55// 13. CSRArray
56// 14. CSCArray
57// 15. CSRArray
58// 16. CSCArray //todo
59//
60// Kokkos Data structures
61// 17. FArrayKokkos
62// 18. ViewFArrayKokkos
63// 19. FMatrixKokkos
64// 20. ViewFMatrixKokkos
65// 21. CArrayKokkos
66// 22. ViewCArrayKokkos
67// 23. CMatrixKokkos
68// 24. ViewCMatrixKokkos
69// 25. RaggedRightArrayKokkos
70// 26. RaggedDownArrayKokkos
71// 27. DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos
72// 28. DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos
73// 29. CSRArrayKokkos
74// 29. CSCArrayKokkos
75
76#include <stdio.h>
77#include <stdlib.h>
78#include <string>
79#include <assert.h>
80#include <memory> // for shared_ptr
81#include "macros.h"
82
83using real_t = double;
84using u_int = unsigned int;
85
86
87#ifdef HAVE_KOKKOS
88#include <Kokkos_Core.hpp>
89#include <Kokkos_DualView.hpp>
90
91using HostSpace = Kokkos::HostSpace;
92using MemoryUnmanaged = Kokkos::MemoryUnmanaged;
93
94#ifdef HAVE_CUDA
95//using UVMMemSpace = Kokkos::CudaUVMSpace;
96using DefaultMemSpace = Kokkos::CudaSpace;
97using DefaultExecSpace = Kokkos::Cuda;
98using DefaultLayout = Kokkos::LayoutLeft;
99#elif HAVE_OPENMP
100using DefaultMemSpace = Kokkos::HostSpace;
101using DefaultExecSpace = Kokkos::OpenMP;
102using DefaultLayout = Kokkos::LayoutRight;
103#elif HAVE_THREADS
104using DefaultMemSpace = Kokkos::HostSpace;
105using DefaultExecSpace = Kokkos::Threads;
106using DefaultLayout = Kokkos::LayoutLeft;
107#elif HAVE_HIP
108using DefaultMemSpace = Kokkos::Experimental::HIPSpace;
109using DefaultExecSpace = Kokkos::Experimental::HIP;
110using DefaultLayout = Kokkos::LayoutLeft;
111#else
112using DefaultMemSpace = Kokkos::Serial;
113using DefaultExecSpace = Kokkos::Serial;
114using DefaultLayout = Kokkos::LayoutLeft;
115#endif
116
117//MACROS to make the code less scary
118#define kmalloc(size) ( Kokkos::kokkos_malloc<DefaultMemSpace>(size) )
119#define kfree(pnt) ( Kokkos::kokkos_free(pnt) )
120#define ProfileRegionStart ( Kokkos::Profiling::pushRegion )
121#define ProfileRegionEnd ( Kokkos::Profiling::popRegion )
122#define DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY "array_"
123#define DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX "matrix_"
124
125using policy1D = Kokkos::RangePolicy<DefaultExecSpace>;
126using policy2D = Kokkos::MDRangePolicy< Kokkos::Rank<2> >;
127using policy3D = Kokkos::MDRangePolicy< Kokkos::Rank<3> >;
128using policy4D = Kokkos::MDRangePolicy< Kokkos::Rank<4> >;
129
130using TeamPolicy = Kokkos::TeamPolicy<DefaultExecSpace>;
131//using mdrange_policy2 = Kokkos::MDRangePolicy<Kokkos::Rank<2>>;
132//using mdrange_policy3 = Kokkos::MDRangePolicy<Kokkos::Rank<3>>;
133
134using RMatrix1D = Kokkos::View<real_t *,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
135using RMatrix2D = Kokkos::View<real_t **,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
136using RMatrix3D = Kokkos::View<real_t ***,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
137using RMatrix4D = Kokkos::View<real_t ****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
138using RMatrix5D = Kokkos::View<real_t *****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
139using IMatrix1D = Kokkos::View<int *,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
140using IMatrix2D = Kokkos::View<int **,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
141using IMatrix3D = Kokkos::View<int ***,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
142using IMatrix4D = Kokkos::View<int ****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
143using IMatrix5D = Kokkos::View<int *****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
144using SVar = Kokkos::View<size_t,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
145using SArray2D = Kokkos::View<size_t **,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
146using SArray3D = Kokkos::View<size_t ***,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
147using SArray4D = Kokkos::View<size_t ****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
148using SArray5D = Kokkos::View<size_t *****,DefaultLayout,DefaultExecSpace>;
149
150using SHArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,DefaultLayout,Kokkos::HostSpace>;
151#endif
152
153//To disable asserts, uncomment the following line
154//#define NDEBUG
155
156
157//---Begin Standard Data Structures---
158
159//1. FArray
160// indicies are [0:N-1]
161template <typename T>
162class FArray {
163
164private:
165 size_t dims_[7];
166 size_t length_;
167 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
168 std::shared_ptr <T []> array_;
169
170public:
171
172 // default constructor
173 FArray ();
174
175 //overload constructors from 1D to 7D
176
177 FArray(size_t dim0);
178
179 FArray(size_t dim0,
180 size_t dim1);
181
182 FArray(size_t dim0,
183 size_t dim1,
184 size_t dim2);
185
186 FArray(size_t dim0,
187 size_t dim1,
188 size_t dim2,
189 size_t dim3);
190
191 FArray(size_t dim0,
192 size_t dim1,
193 size_t dim2,
194 size_t dim3,
195 size_t dim4);
196
197 FArray(size_t dim0,
198 size_t dim1,
199 size_t dim2,
200 size_t dim3,
201 size_t dim4,
202 size_t dim5);
203
204 FArray(size_t dim0,
205 size_t dim1,
206 size_t dim2,
207 size_t dim3,
208 size_t dim4,
209 size_t dim5,
210 size_t dim6);
211
212 FArray (const FArray& temp);
213
214 // overload operator() to access data as array(i,....,n);
215 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
216
217 T& operator()(size_t i,
218 size_t j) const;
219
220 T& operator()(size_t i,
221 size_t j,
222 size_t k) const;
223
224 T& operator()(size_t i,
225 size_t j,
226 size_t k,
227 size_t l) const;
228
229 T& operator()(size_t i,
230 size_t j,
231 size_t k,
232 size_t l,
233 size_t m) const;
234
235 T& operator()(size_t i,
236 size_t j,
237 size_t k,
238 size_t l,
239 size_t m,
240 size_t n) const;
241 T& operator()(size_t i,
242 size_t j,
243 size_t k,
244 size_t l,
245 size_t m,
246 size_t n,
247 size_t o) const;
248
249 //overload = operator
250 FArray& operator=(const FArray& temp);
251
252 //return array size
253 size_t size() const;
254
255 // return array dims
256 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
257
258 // return array order (rank)
259 size_t order() const;
260
261 //return pointer
262 T* pointer() const;
263
264 // deconstructor
265 ~FArray ();
266
267}; // end of f_array_t
268
269//---FArray class definnitions----
270
271//constructors
272template <typename T>
273FArray<T>::FArray(){
274 array_ = NULL;
275 length_ = 0;
276}
277
278//1D
279template <typename T>
280FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0)
281{
282 dims_[0] = dim0;
283 length_ = dim0;
284 order_ = 1;
285 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
286}
287
288template <typename T>
289FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
290 size_t dim1)
291{
292 dims_[0] = dim0;
293 dims_[1] = dim1;
294 order_ = 2;
295 length_ = dim0*dim1;
296 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
297}
298
299//3D
300template <typename T>
301FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
302 size_t dim1,
303 size_t dim2)
304{
305 dims_[0] = dim0;
306 dims_[1] = dim1;
307 dims_[2] = dim2;
308 order_ = 3;
309 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2;
310 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
311}
312
313//4D
314template <typename T>
315FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
316 size_t dim1,
317 size_t dim2,
318 size_t dim3)
319{
320 dims_[0] = dim0;
321 dims_[1] = dim1;
322 dims_[2] = dim2;
323 dims_[3] = dim3;
324 order_ = 4;
325 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3;
326 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
327}
328
329//5D
330template <typename T>
331FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
332 size_t dim1,
333 size_t dim2,
334 size_t dim3,
335 size_t dim4)
336{
337 dims_[0] = dim0;
338 dims_[1] = dim1;
339 dims_[2] = dim2;
340 dims_[3] = dim3;
341 dims_[4] = dim4;
342 order_ = 5;
343 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4;
344 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
345}
346
347//6D
348template <typename T>
349FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
350 size_t dim1,
351 size_t dim2,
352 size_t dim3,
353 size_t dim4,
354 size_t dim5)
355{
356 dims_[0] = dim0;
357 dims_[1] = dim1;
358 dims_[2] = dim2;
359 dims_[3] = dim3;
360 dims_[4] = dim4;
361 dims_[5] = dim5;
362 order_ = 6;
363 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4*dim5;
364 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
365}
366
367
368//7D
369template <typename T>
370FArray<T>::FArray(size_t dim0,
371 size_t dim1,
372 size_t dim2,
373 size_t dim3,
374 size_t dim4,
375 size_t dim5,
376 size_t dim6)
377{
378 dims_[0] = dim0;
379 dims_[1] = dim1;
380 dims_[2] = dim2;
381 dims_[3] = dim3;
382 dims_[4] = dim4;
383 dims_[5] = dim5;
384 dims_[6] = dim6;
385 order_ = 7;
386 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4*dim5*dim6;
387 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
388
389}
390
391//Copy constructor
392
393template <typename T>
394FArray<T>::FArray(const FArray& temp) {
395
396 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
397
398 if (this != &temp) {
399 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
400 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
401 } // end for
402
403 order_ = temp.order_;
404 length_ = temp.length_;
405 array_ = temp.array_;
406 } // end if
407
408} // end constructor
409
410//overload operator () for 1D to 7D
411//indices are from [0:N-1]
412
413//1D
414template <typename T>
415T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i) const
416{
417 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 1D!");
418 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 1D!");
419 return array_[i];
420}
421
422//2D
423template <typename T>
424T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
425 size_t j) const
426{
427 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 2D!");
428 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 2D!");
429 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArray 2D!");
430 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]];
431}
432
433//3D
434template <typename T>
435T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
436 size_t j,
437 size_t k) const
438{
439 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 3D!");
440 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 3D!");
441 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in Farray 3D!");
442 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArray 3D!");
443 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
444 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]];
445}
446
447//4D
448template <typename T>
449T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
450 size_t j,
451 size_t k,
452 size_t l) const
453{
454 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 4D!");
455 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 4D!");
456 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArray 4D!");
457 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArray 4D!");
458 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArray 4D!");
459 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
460 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
461 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]];
462}
463
464//5D
465template <typename T>
466T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
467 size_t j,
468 size_t k,
469 size_t l,
470 size_t m) const
471{
472 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 5D!");
473 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 5D!");
474 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArray 5D!");
475 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArray 5D!");
476 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArray 5D!");
477 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArray 5D!");
478 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
479 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
480 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
481 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]];
482}
483
484//6D
485template <typename T>
486T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
487 size_t j,
488 size_t k,
489 size_t l,
490 size_t m,
491 size_t n) const
492{
493 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 6D!");
494 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
495 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
496 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
497 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
498 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
499 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FArray 6D!");
500 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
501 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
502 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
503 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]
504 + n*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]];
505}
506
507//7D
508template <typename T>
509T& FArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
510 size_t j,
511 size_t k,
512 size_t l,
513 size_t m,
514 size_t n,
515 size_t o) const
516{
517 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArray 7D!");
518 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
519 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
520 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
521 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
522 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
523 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
524 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in FArray 7D!");
525 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
526 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
527 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
528 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]
529 + n*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]
530 + o*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]*dims_[5]];
531}
532
533// = operator
534//THIS = FArray <> TEMP(n,m,...)
535template <typename T>
536FArray<T>& FArray<T>::operator= (const FArray& temp)
537{
538 if(this != & temp) {
539 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
540 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
541 } // end for
542
543 order_ = temp.order_;
544 length_ = temp.length_;
545 array_ = temp.array_;
546 }
547 return *this;
548}
549
550template <typename T>
551inline size_t FArray<T>::size() const {
552 return length_;
553}
554
555template <typename T>
556inline size_t FArray<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
557 assert(i < order_ && "FArray order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
558 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to FArray dims is out of bounds!");
559 return dims_[i];
560}
561
562template <typename T>
563inline size_t FArray<T>::order() const {
564 return order_;
565}
566
567
568template <typename T>
569inline T* FArray<T>::pointer() const {
570 return array_.get();
571}
572
573//delete FArray
574template <typename T>
575FArray<T>::~FArray(){}
576
577//---end of FArray class definitions----
578
579
580//2. ViewFArray
581// indicies are [0:N-1]
582template <typename T>
583class ViewFArray {
584
585private:
586 size_t dims_[7];
587 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
588 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
589 T * array_;
590
591public:
592
593 // default constructor
594 ViewFArray ();
595
596 //---1D to 7D array ---
597 ViewFArray(T *array,
598 size_t dim0);
599
600 ViewFArray (T *array,
601 size_t dim0,
602 size_t dim1);
603
604 ViewFArray (T *array,
605 size_t dim0,
606 size_t dim1,
607 size_t dim2);
608
609 ViewFArray (T *array,
610 size_t dim0,
611 size_t dim1,
612 size_t dim2,
613 size_t dim3);
614
615 ViewFArray (T *array,
616 size_t dim0,
617 size_t dim1,
618 size_t dim2,
619 size_t dim3,
620 size_t dim4);
621
622 ViewFArray (T *array,
623 size_t dim0,
624 size_t dim1,
625 size_t dim2,
626 size_t dim3,
627 size_t dim4,
628 size_t dim5);
629
630 ViewFArray (T *array,
631 size_t dim0,
632 size_t dim1,
633 size_t dim2,
634 size_t dim3,
635 size_t dim4,
636 size_t dim5,
637 size_t dim6);
638
639 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
640
641 T& operator()(size_t i,
642 size_t j) const;
643
644 T& operator()(size_t i,
645 size_t j,
646 size_t k) const;
647
648 T& operator()(size_t i,
649 size_t j,
650 size_t k,
651 size_t l) const;
652
653 T& operator()(size_t i,
654 size_t j,
655 size_t k,
656 size_t l,
657 size_t m) const;
658
659 T& operator()(size_t i,
660 size_t j,
661 size_t k,
662 size_t l,
663 size_t m,
664 size_t n) const;
665
666 T& operator()(size_t i,
667 size_t j,
668 size_t k,
669 size_t l,
670 size_t m,
671 size_t n,
672 size_t o) const;
673
674 // calculate C = math(A,B)
675 template <typename M>
676 void operator=(M do_this_math);
677
678 //return array size
679 size_t size() const;
680
681 //return array dims
682 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
683
684 // return array order (rank)
685 size_t order() const;
686
687 // return pointer
688 T* pointer() const;
689
690}; // end of viewFArray
691
692//class definitions for viewFArray
693
694//~~~~constructors for viewFArray for 1D to 7D~~~~~~~
695
696//no dimension
697template <typename T>
698ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(){
699 array_ = NULL;
700 length_ = 0;
701}
702
703//1D
704template <typename T>
705ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
706 size_t dim0)
707{
708 dims_[0] = dim0;
709 order_ = 1;
710 length_ = dim0;
711 array_ = array;
712}
713
714//2D
715template <typename T>
716ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
717 size_t dim0,
718 size_t dim1)
719{
720 dims_[0] = dim0;
721 dims_[1] = dim1;
722 order_ = 2;
723 length_ = dim0*dim1;
724 array_ = array;
725}
726
727//3D
728template <typename T>
729ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
730 size_t dim0,
731 size_t dim1,
732 size_t dim2)
733{
734 dims_[0] = dim0;
735 dims_[1] = dim1;
736 dims_[2] = dim2;
737 order_ = 3;
738 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2;
739 array_ = array;
740}
741
742//4D
743template <typename T>
744ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
745 size_t dim0,
746 size_t dim1,
747 size_t dim2,
748 size_t dim3)
749{
750 dims_[0] = dim0;
751 dims_[1] = dim1;
752 dims_[2] = dim2;
753 dims_[3] = dim3;
754 order_ = 4;
755 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3;
756 array_ = array;
757}
758
759//5D
760template <typename T>
761ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
762 size_t dim0,
763 size_t dim1,
764 size_t dim2,
765 size_t dim3,
766 size_t dim4)
767{
768 dims_[0] = dim0;
769 dims_[1] = dim1;
770 dims_[2] = dim2;
771 dims_[3] = dim3;
772 dims_[4] = dim4;
773 order_ = 5;
774 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4;
775 array_ = array;
776}
777
778//6D
779template <typename T>
780ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
781 size_t dim0,
782 size_t dim1,
783 size_t dim2,
784 size_t dim3,
785 size_t dim4,
786 size_t dim5)
787{
788 dims_[0] = dim0;
789 dims_[1] = dim1;
790 dims_[2] = dim2;
791 dims_[3] = dim3;
792 dims_[4] = dim4;
793 dims_[5] = dim5;
794 order_ = 6;
795 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4*dim5;
796 array_ = array;
797}
798
799//7D
800template <typename T>
801ViewFArray<T>::ViewFArray(T *array,
802 size_t dim0,
803 size_t dim1,
804 size_t dim2,
805 size_t dim3,
806 size_t dim4,
807 size_t dim5,
808 size_t dim6)
809{
810 dims_[0] = dim0;
811 dims_[1] = dim1;
812 dims_[2] = dim2;
813 dims_[3] = dim3;
814 dims_[4] = dim4;
815 dims_[5] = dim5;
816 dims_[6] = dim6;
817 order_ = 7;
818 length_ = dim0*dim1*dim2*dim3*dim4*dim5*dim6;
819 array_ = array;
820}
821
822//~~~~~~operator () overload
823//for dimensions 1D to 7D
824//indices for array are from 0...N-1
825
826//1D
827template <typename T>
828T& ViewFArray<T>::operator()(size_t i) const
829{
830 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 1D!");
831 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 1D!");
832 return array_[i];
833}
834
835//2D
836template <typename T>
837T& ViewFArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
838 size_t j) const
839{
840 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 2D!");
841 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 2D!");
842 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 2D!");
843 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]];
844}
845
846//3D
847template <typename T>
848T& ViewFArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
849 size_t j,
850 size_t k) const
851{
852 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 3D!");
853 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 3D!");
854 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 3D!");
855 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArray 3D!");
856 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
857 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]];
858}
859
860//4D
861template <typename T>
862T& ViewFArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
863 size_t j,
864 size_t k,
865 size_t l) const
866{
867 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 4D!");
868 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 4D!");
869 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 4D!");
870 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArray 4D!");
871 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArray 4D!");
872 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
873 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
874 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]];
875}
876
877//5D
878template <typename T>
879T& ViewFArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
880 size_t j,
881 size_t k,
882 size_t l,
883 size_t m) const
884{
885 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 5D!");
886 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 5D!");
887 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 5D!");
888 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArray 5D!");
889 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArray 5D!");
890 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArray 5D!");
891 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
892 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
893 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
894 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]];
895}
896
897//6D
898template <typename T>
899T& ViewFArray<T>:: operator()(size_t i,
900 size_t j,
901 size_t k,
902 size_t l,
903 size_t m,
904 size_t n) const
905{
906 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 6D!");
907 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
908 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
909 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
910 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
911 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
912 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFArray 6D!");
913 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
914 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
915 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
916 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]
917 + n*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]];
918}
919
920//7D
921template <typename T>
922T& ViewFArray<T>:: operator()(size_t i,
923 size_t j,
924 size_t k,
925 size_t l,
926 size_t m,
927 size_t n,
928 size_t o) const
929{
930 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArray 7D!");
931 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
932 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
933 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
934 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
935 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
936 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
937 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFArray 7D!");
938 return array_[i + j*dims_[0]
939 + k*dims_[0]*dims_[1]
940 + l*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]
941 + m*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]
942 + n*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]
943 + o*dims_[0]*dims_[1]*dims_[2]*dims_[3]*dims_[4]*dims_[5]];
944}
945
946// calculate this ViewFArray object = math(A,B)
947template <typename T>
948template <typename M>
949void ViewFArray<T>::operator=(M do_this_math){
950 do_this_math(*this); // pass in this ViewFArray object
951}// end of math opperation
952
953template <typename T>
954inline size_t ViewFArray<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
955 assert(i < order_ && "ViewFArray order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
956 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewFArray dims is out of bounds!");
957 return dims_[i];
958}
959
960template <typename T>
961inline size_t ViewFArray<T>::order() const {
962 return order_;
963}
964
965template <typename T>
966inline size_t ViewFArray<T>::size() const {
967 return length_;
968}
969
970template <typename T>
971inline T* ViewFArray<T>::pointer() const {
972 return array_;
973}
974
975//---end of ViewFArray class definitions---
976
977
978//3. FMatrix
979// indicies are [1:N]
980template <typename T>
981class FMatrix {
982private:
983 size_t dims_[7];
984 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
985 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
986 std::shared_ptr <T []> matrix_;
987
988public:
989 // Default constructor
990 FMatrix ();
991
992 //---1D to 7D matrix ---
993 FMatrix (size_t dim1);
994
995 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
996 size_t dim2);
997
998 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
999 size_t dim2,
1000 size_t dim3);
1001
1002 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
1003 size_t dim2,
1004 size_t dim3,
1005 size_t dim4);
1006
1007 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
1008 size_t dim2,
1009 size_t dim3,
1010 size_t dim4,
1011 size_t dim5);
1012
1013 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
1014 size_t dim2,
1015 size_t dim3,
1016 size_t dim4,
1017 size_t dim5,
1018 size_t dim6);
1019
1020 FMatrix (size_t dim1,
1021 size_t dim2,
1022 size_t dim3,
1023 size_t dim4,
1024 size_t dim5,
1025 size_t dim6,
1026 size_t dim7);
1027
1028 FMatrix (const FMatrix& temp);
1029
1030 T& operator() (size_t i) const;
1031
1032 T& operator() (size_t i,
1033 size_t j) const;
1034
1035 T& operator() (size_t i,
1036 size_t j,
1037 size_t k) const;
1038
1039 T& operator() (size_t i,
1040 size_t j,
1041 size_t k,
1042 size_t l) const;
1043
1044 T& operator() (size_t i,
1045 size_t j,
1046 size_t k,
1047 size_t l,
1048 size_t m) const;
1049
1050 T& operator() (size_t i,
1051 size_t j,
1052 size_t k,
1053 size_t l,
1054 size_t m,
1055 size_t n) const;
1056
1057 T& operator() (size_t i,
1058 size_t j,
1059 size_t k,
1060 size_t l,
1061 size_t m,
1062 size_t n,
1063 size_t o) const;
1064
1065
1066 // Overload copy assignment operator
1067 FMatrix& operator=(const FMatrix& temp);
1068
1069 // the length of the 1D storage array
1070 size_t size() const;
1071
1072 // matrix dims
1073 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
1074
1075 // return matrix order (rank)
1076 size_t order() const;
1077
1078 //return pointer
1079 T* pointer() const;
1080
1081 // Deconstructor
1082 ~FMatrix ();
1083
1084}; // End of FMatrix
1085
1086//---FMatrix class definitions---
1087
1088//constructors
1089template <typename T>
1090FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(){
1091 matrix_ = NULL;
1092 length_ = 0;
1093}
1094
1095//1D
1096template <typename T>
1097FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1)
1098{
1099 dims_[0] = dim1;
1100 order_ = 1;
1101 length_ = dim1;
1102 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1103}
1104
1105//2D
1106template <typename T>
1107FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1108 size_t dim2)
1109{
1110 dims_[0] = dim1;
1111 dims_[1] = dim2;
1112 order_ = 2;
1113 length_ = dim1 * dim2;
1114 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1115}
1116
1117//3D
1118template <typename T>
1119FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1120 size_t dim2,
1121 size_t dim3)
1122{
1123 dims_[0] = dim1;
1124 dims_[1] = dim2;
1125 dims_[2] = dim3;
1126 order_ = 3;
1127 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
1128 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1129}
1130
1131//4D
1132template <typename T>
1133FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1134 size_t dim2,
1135 size_t dim3,
1136 size_t dim4)
1137{
1138 dims_[0] = dim1;
1139 dims_[1] = dim2;
1140 dims_[2] = dim3;
1141 dims_[3] = dim4;
1142 order_ = 4;
1143 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
1144 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1145}
1146
1147//5D
1148template <typename T>
1149FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1150 size_t dim2,
1151 size_t dim3,
1152 size_t dim4,
1153 size_t dim5)
1154{
1155 dims_[0] = dim1;
1156 dims_[1] = dim2;
1157 dims_[2] = dim3;
1158 dims_[3] = dim4;
1159 dims_[4] = dim5;
1160 order_ = 5;
1161 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
1162 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1163}
1164
1165//6D
1166template <typename T>
1167FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1168 size_t dim2,
1169 size_t dim3,
1170 size_t dim4,
1171 size_t dim5,
1172 size_t dim6)
1173{
1174 dims_[0] = dim1;
1175 dims_[1] = dim2;
1176 dims_[2] = dim3;
1177 dims_[3] = dim4;
1178 dims_[4] = dim5;
1179 dims_[5] = dim6;
1180 order_ = 6;
1181 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
1182 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1183
1184}
1185
1186template <typename T>
1187FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(size_t dim1,
1188 size_t dim2,
1189 size_t dim3,
1190 size_t dim4,
1191 size_t dim5,
1192 size_t dim6,
1193 size_t dim7)
1194{
1195 dims_[0] = dim1;
1196 dims_[1] = dim2;
1197 dims_[2] = dim3;
1198 dims_[3] = dim4;
1199 dims_[4] = dim5;
1200 dims_[5] = dim6;
1201 dims_[6] = dim7;
1202 order_ = 7;
1203 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7;
1204 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
1205
1206}
1207
1208template <typename T>
1209FMatrix<T>::FMatrix(const FMatrix& temp) {
1210
1211 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
1212
1213 if (this != &temp) {
1214 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
1215 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
1216 } // end for
1217
1218 order_ = temp.order_;
1219 length_ = temp.length_;
1220 matrix_ = temp.matrix_;
1221 } // end if
1222
1223} // end constructor
1224
1225
1226//overload operators
1227
1228//1D
1229template <typename T>
1230inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i) const
1231{
1232 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 1D!");
1233 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 1D!");
1234 return matrix_[i - 1];
1235}
1236
1237//2D
1238template <typename T>
1239inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1240 size_t j) const
1241{
1242 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 2D!");
1243 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 2D!");
1244 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 2D!");
1245 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])];
1246}
1247
1248//3D
1249template <typename T>
1250inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1251 size_t j,
1252 size_t k) const
1253{
1254 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 3D!");
1255 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 3D!");
1256 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 3D!");
1257 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrix 3D!");
1258 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1259 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])];
1260}
1261
1262//4D
1263template <typename T>
1264inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1265 size_t j,
1266 size_t k,
1267 size_t l) const
1268{
1269 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 4D!");
1270 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 4D!");
1271 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 4D!");
1272 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrix 4D!");
1273 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrix 4D!");
1274 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1275 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1276 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])];
1277}
1278
1279//5D
1280template <typename T>
1281inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1282 size_t j,
1283 size_t k,
1284 size_t l,
1285 size_t m) const
1286{
1287 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 5D!");
1288 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 5D!");
1289 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 5D!");
1290 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrix 5D!");
1291 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrix 5D!");
1292 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrix 5D!");
1293 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1294 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1295 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1296 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])];
1297}
1298
1299//6D
1300template <typename T>
1301inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1302 size_t j,
1303 size_t k,
1304 size_t l,
1305 size_t m,
1306 size_t n) const
1307{
1308 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 6D!");
1309 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1310 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1311 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1312 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1313 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1314 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FMatrix 6D!");
1315 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1316 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1317 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1318 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
1319 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])];
1320}
1321
1322//7D
1323template <typename T>
1324inline T& FMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
1325 size_t j,
1326 size_t k,
1327 size_t l,
1328 size_t m,
1329 size_t n,
1330 size_t o) const
1331{
1332 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrix 7D!");
1333 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1334 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1335 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1336 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1337 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1338 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1339 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in FMatrix 7D!");
1340 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1341 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1342 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1343 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
1344 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
1345 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5])];
1346}
1347
1348
1349template <typename T>
1350inline FMatrix<T>& FMatrix<T>::operator= (const FMatrix& temp)
1351{
1352 // Do nothing if assignment is of the form x = x
1353 if (this != &temp) {
1354 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
1355 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
1356 } // end for
1357
1358 order_ = temp.order_;
1359 length_ = temp.length_;
1360 matrix_ = temp.matrix_;
1361 }
1362
1363 return *this;
1364}
1365
1366template <typename T>
1367inline size_t FMatrix<T>::size() const {
1368 return length_;
1369}
1370
1371template <typename T>
1372inline size_t FMatrix<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
1373 i--; // i starts at 1
1374 assert(i < order_ && "FMatrix order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
1375 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to FMatrix dims is out of bounds!");
1376 return dims_[i];
1377}
1378
1379template <typename T>
1380inline size_t FMatrix<T>::order() const {
1381 return order_;
1382}
1383
1384template <typename T>
1385inline T* FMatrix<T>::pointer() const{
1386 return matrix_.get();
1387}
1388
1389template <typename T>
1390FMatrix<T>::~FMatrix() {}
1391
1392//----end of FMatrix class definitions----
1393
1394
1395//4. ViewFMatrix
1396// indices are [1:N]
1397template <typename T>
1398class ViewFMatrix {
1399
1400private:
1401 size_t dims_[7];
1402 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
1403 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
1404 T * matrix_;
1405
1406public:
1407
1408 // Default constructor
1409 ViewFMatrix ();
1410
1411 //--- 1D to 7D matrix ---
1412
1413 ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1414 size_t dim1);
1415
1416 ViewFMatrix(T *some_matrix,
1417 size_t dim1,
1418 size_t dim2);
1419
1420 ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1421 size_t dim1,
1422 size_t dim2,
1423 size_t dim3);
1424
1425 ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1426 size_t dim1,
1427 size_t dim2,
1428 size_t dim3,
1429 size_t dim4);
1430
1431 ViewFMatrix (T *matrix,
1432 size_t dim1,
1433 size_t dim2,
1434 size_t dim3,
1435 size_t dim4,
1436 size_t dim5);
1437
1438 ViewFMatrix (T *matrix,
1439 size_t dim1,
1440 size_t dim2,
1441 size_t dim3,
1442 size_t dim4,
1443 size_t dim5,
1444 size_t dim6);
1445
1446 ViewFMatrix (T *matrix,
1447 size_t dim1,
1448 size_t dim2,
1449 size_t dim3,
1450 size_t dim4,
1451 size_t dim5,
1452 size_t dim6,
1453 size_t dim7);
1454
1455 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
1456
1457 T& operator()(size_t i,
1458 size_t j) const;
1459
1460 T& operator()(size_t i,
1461 size_t j,
1462 size_t k) const;
1463
1464 T& operator()(size_t i,
1465 size_t j,
1466 size_t k,
1467 size_t l) const;
1468
1469 T& operator() (size_t i,
1470 size_t j,
1471 size_t k,
1472 size_t l,
1473 size_t m) const;
1474
1475 T& operator()(size_t i,
1476 size_t j,
1477 size_t k,
1478 size_t l,
1479 size_t m,
1480 size_t n) const;
1481
1482 T& operator()(size_t i,
1483 size_t j,
1484 size_t k,
1485 size_t l,
1486 size_t m,
1487 size_t n,
1488 size_t o) const;
1489
1490 // calculate C = math(A,B)
1491 template <typename M>
1492 void operator=(M do_this_math);
1493
1494 // length of 1D array
1495 size_t size() const;
1496
1497 // matrix dims
1498 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
1499
1500 // return matrix order (rank)
1501 size_t order() const;
1502
1503 // return pointer
1504 T* pointer() const;
1505
1506}; // end of ViewFMatrix
1507
1508//constructors
1509
1510//no dimension
1511template <typename T>
1512ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix() {
1513 matrix_ = NULL;
1514 length_ = 0;
1515}
1516
1517//1D
1518template <typename T>
1519ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1520 size_t dim1)
1521{
1522 dims_[0] = dim1;
1523 order_ = 1;
1524 length_ = dim1;
1525 matrix_ = matrix;
1526}
1527
1528//2D
1529template <typename T>
1530ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1531 size_t dim1,
1532 size_t dim2)
1533{
1534 dims_[0] = dim1;
1535 dims_[1] = dim2;
1536 order_ = 2;
1537 length_ = dim1 * dim2;
1538 matrix_ = matrix;
1539}
1540
1541//3D
1542template <typename T>
1543ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix (T *matrix,
1544 size_t dim1,
1545 size_t dim2,
1546 size_t dim3)
1547{
1548 dims_[0] = dim1;
1549 dims_[1] = dim2;
1550 dims_[2] = dim3;
1551 order_ = 3;
1552 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
1553 matrix_ = matrix;
1554}
1555
1556//4D
1557template <typename T>
1558ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1559 size_t dim1,
1560 size_t dim2,
1561 size_t dim3,
1562 size_t dim4)
1563{
1564 dims_[0] = dim1;
1565 dims_[1] = dim2;
1566 dims_[2] = dim3;
1567 dims_[3] = dim4;
1568 order_ = 4;
1569 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
1570 matrix_ = matrix;
1571}
1572
1573//5D
1574template <typename T>
1575ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1576 size_t dim1,
1577 size_t dim2,
1578 size_t dim3,
1579 size_t dim4,
1580 size_t dim5)
1581{
1582 dims_[0] = dim1;
1583 dims_[1] = dim2;
1584 dims_[2] = dim3;
1585 dims_[3] = dim4;
1586 dims_[4] = dim5;
1587 order_ = 5;
1588 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
1589 matrix_ = matrix;
1590}
1591
1592//6D
1593template <typename T>
1594ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1595 size_t dim1,
1596 size_t dim2,
1597 size_t dim3,
1598 size_t dim4,
1599 size_t dim5,
1600 size_t dim6)
1601{
1602 dims_[0] = dim1;
1603 dims_[1] = dim2;
1604 dims_[2] = dim3;
1605 dims_[3] = dim4;
1606 dims_[4] = dim5;
1607 dims_[5] = dim6;
1608 order_ = 6;
1609 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
1610 matrix_ = matrix;
1611}
1612
1613//6D
1614template <typename T>
1615ViewFMatrix<T>::ViewFMatrix(T *matrix,
1616 size_t dim1,
1617 size_t dim2,
1618 size_t dim3,
1619 size_t dim4,
1620 size_t dim5,
1621 size_t dim6,
1622 size_t dim7)
1623{
1624 dims_[0] = dim1;
1625 dims_[1] = dim2;
1626 dims_[2] = dim3;
1627 dims_[3] = dim4;
1628 dims_[4] = dim5;
1629 dims_[5] = dim6;
1630 dims_[6] = dim7;
1631 order_ = 7;
1632 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7;
1633 matrix_ = matrix;
1634}
1635
1636
1637//overload operator ()
1638
1639//1D
1640template <typename T>
1641inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i) const
1642{
1643 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 1D!");
1644 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 1D"); // die if >= dim1
1645
1646 return matrix_[(i - 1)];
1647}
1648
1649//2D
1650template <typename T>
1651inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1652 size_t j) const
1653{
1654 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 2D!");
1655 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 2D"); // die if >= dim1
1656 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 2D"); // die if >= dim2
1657
1658 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])];
1659}
1660
1661//3D
1662template <typename T>
1663inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1664 size_t j,
1665 size_t k) const
1666{
1667 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 3D!");
1668 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 3D"); // die if >= dim1
1669 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 3D"); // die if >= dim2
1670 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 3D"); // die if >= dim3
1671
1672 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1673 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])];
1674}
1675
1676//4D
1677template <typename T>
1678inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1679 size_t j,
1680 size_t k,
1681 size_t l) const
1682{
1683 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 4D!");
1684 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim1
1685 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim2
1686 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim3
1687 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim4
1688
1689 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1690 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1691 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])];
1692}
1693
1694//5D
1695template <typename T>
1696inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1697 size_t j,
1698 size_t k,
1699 size_t l,
1700 size_t m) const
1701{
1702 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 5D!");
1703 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 5D"); // die if >= dim1
1704 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 5D"); // die if >= dim2
1705 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 5D"); // die if >= dim3
1706 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 5D"); // die if >= dim4
1707 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 5D"); // die if >= dim5
1708
1709 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1710 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1711 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1712 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])];
1713}
1714
1715//6D
1716template <typename T>
1717inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1718 size_t j,
1719 size_t k,
1720 size_t l,
1721 size_t m,
1722 size_t n) const
1723{
1724 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 6D!");
1725 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim1
1726 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim2
1727 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim3
1728 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim4
1729 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim5
1730 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 6D"); // die if >= dim6
1731 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1732 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1733 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1734 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
1735 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])];
1736}
1737
1738//6D
1739template <typename T>
1740inline T& ViewFMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
1741 size_t j,
1742 size_t k,
1743 size_t l,
1744 size_t m,
1745 size_t n,
1746 size_t o) const
1747{
1748 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrix 7D!");
1749 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim1
1750 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim2
1751 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim3
1752 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim4
1753 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim5
1754 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim6
1755 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewFMatrix 7D"); // die if >= dim7
1756
1757 return matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
1758 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
1759 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
1760 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
1761 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
1762 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5])];
1763}
1764
1765// calculate this ViewFMatrix object = math(A,B)
1766template <typename T>
1767template <typename M>
1768void ViewFMatrix<T>::operator=(M do_this_math){
1769 do_this_math(*this); // pass in this ViewFArray object
1770}// end of math opperation
1771
1772template <typename T>
1773inline size_t ViewFMatrix<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
1774 i--; // i starts at 1
1775 assert(i < order_ && "ViewFMatrix order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
1776 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewFMatrix dims is out of bounds!");
1777 return dims_[i];
1778}
1779
1780template <typename T>
1781inline size_t ViewFMatrix<T>::order() const {
1782 return order_;
1783}
1784
1785template <typename T>
1786inline T* ViewFMatrix<T>::pointer() const {
1787 return matrix_;
1788}
1789//-----end ViewFMatrix-----
1790
1791
1792//5. CArray
1793// indicies are [0:N-1]
1794template <typename T>
1795class CArray {
1796
1797private:
1798 size_t dims_[7];
1799 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
1800 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
1801 std::shared_ptr <T []> array_;
1802
1803public:
1804 // Default constructor
1805 CArray ();
1806
1807 // --- 1D to 7D array ---
1808
1809 CArray (size_t dim0);
1810
1811 CArray (size_t dim0,
1812 size_t dim1);
1813
1814 CArray (size_t dim0,
1815 size_t dim1,
1816 size_t dim2);
1817
1818 CArray (size_t dim0,
1819 size_t dim1,
1820 size_t dim2,
1821 size_t dim3);
1822
1823 CArray (size_t dim0,
1824 size_t dim1,
1825 size_t dim2,
1826 size_t dim3,
1827 size_t dim4);
1828
1829 CArray (size_t dim0,
1830 size_t dim1,
1831 size_t dim2,
1832 size_t dim3,
1833 size_t dim4,
1834 size_t dim5);
1835
1836 CArray (size_t dim0,
1837 size_t dim1,
1838 size_t dim2,
1839 size_t dim3,
1840 size_t dim4,
1841 size_t dim5,
1842 size_t dim6);
1843
1844 CArray (const CArray& temp);
1845
1846 // Overload operator()
1847 T& operator() (size_t i) const;
1848
1849 T& operator() (size_t i,
1850 size_t j) const;
1851
1852 T& operator() (size_t i,
1853 size_t j,
1854 size_t k) const;
1855
1856 T& operator() (size_t i,
1857 size_t j,
1858 size_t k,
1859 size_t l) const;
1860
1861 T& operator() (size_t i,
1862 size_t j,
1863 size_t k,
1864 size_t l,
1865 size_t m) const;
1866
1867 T& operator() (size_t i,
1868 size_t j,
1869 size_t k,
1870 size_t l,
1871 size_t m,
1872 size_t n) const;
1873
1874 T& operator() (size_t i,
1875 size_t j,
1876 size_t k,
1877 size_t l,
1878 size_t m,
1879 size_t n,
1880 size_t o) const;
1881
1882 // Overload copy assignment operator
1883 CArray& operator= (const CArray& temp);
1884
1885 //return array size
1886 size_t size() const;
1887
1888 // return array dims
1889 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
1890
1891 // return array order (rank)
1892 size_t order() const;
1893
1894 //return pointer
1895 T* pointer() const;
1896
1897 // Deconstructor
1898 ~CArray ();
1899
1900}; // End of CArray
1901
1902//---carray class declarations---
1903
1904//constructors
1905
1906//no dim
1907template <typename T>
1908CArray<T>::CArray() {
1909 array_ = NULL;
1910 length_ = order_ = 0;
1911}
1912
1913//1D
1914template <typename T>
1915CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0)
1916{
1917 dims_[0] = dim0;
1918 order_ = 1;
1919 length_ = dim0;
1920 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1921}
1922
1923//2D
1924template <typename T>
1925CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
1926 size_t dim1)
1927{
1928 dims_[0] = dim0;
1929 dims_[1] = dim1;
1930 order_ = 2;
1931 length_ = dim0 * dim1;
1932 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1933}
1934
1935//3D
1936template <typename T>
1937CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
1938 size_t dim1,
1939 size_t dim2)
1940{
1941 dims_[0] = dim0;
1942 dims_[1] = dim1;
1943 dims_[2] = dim2;
1944 order_ = 3;
1945 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2;
1946 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1947}
1948
1949//4D
1950template <typename T>
1951CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
1952 size_t dim1,
1953 size_t dim2,
1954 size_t dim3)
1955{
1956 dims_[0] = dim0;
1957 dims_[1] = dim1;
1958 dims_[2] = dim2;
1959 dims_[3] = dim3;
1960 order_ = 4;
1961 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
1962 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1963}
1964
1965//5D
1966template <typename T>
1967CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
1968 size_t dim1,
1969 size_t dim2,
1970 size_t dim3,
1971 size_t dim4) {
1972 dims_[0] = dim0;
1973 dims_[1] = dim1;
1974 dims_[2] = dim2;
1975 dims_[3] = dim3;
1976 dims_[4] = dim4;
1977 order_ = 5;
1978 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
1979 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1980}
1981
1982//6D
1983template <typename T>
1984CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
1985 size_t dim1,
1986 size_t dim2,
1987 size_t dim3,
1988 size_t dim4,
1989 size_t dim5) {
1990 dims_[0] = dim0;
1991 dims_[1] = dim1;
1992 dims_[2] = dim2;
1993 dims_[3] = dim3;
1994 dims_[4] = dim4;
1995 dims_[5] = dim5;
1996 order_ = 6;
1997 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
1998 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
1999}
2000
2001//7D
2002template <typename T>
2003CArray<T>::CArray(size_t dim0,
2004 size_t dim1,
2005 size_t dim2,
2006 size_t dim3,
2007 size_t dim4,
2008 size_t dim5,
2009 size_t dim6) {
2010 dims_[0] = dim0;
2011 dims_[1] = dim1;
2012 dims_[2] = dim2;
2013 dims_[3] = dim3;
2014 dims_[4] = dim4;
2015 dims_[5] = dim5;
2016 dims_[6] = dim6;
2017 order_ = 7;
2018 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
2019 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2020}
2021
2022//Copy constructor
2023
2024template <typename T>
2025CArray<T>::CArray(const CArray& temp) {
2026
2027 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
2028
2029 if (this != &temp) {
2030 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
2031 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
2032 } // end for
2033
2034 order_ = temp.order_;
2035 length_ = temp.length_;
2036 array_ = temp.array_;
2037 } // end if
2038
2039} // end constructor
2040
2041
2042//overload () operator
2043
2044//1D
2045template <typename T>
2046inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i) const
2047{
2048 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 1D!");
2049 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 1D!");
2050
2051 return array_[i];
2052}
2053
2054//2D
2055template <typename T>
2056inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2057 size_t j) const
2058{
2059 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 2D!");
2060 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 2D!");
2061 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArray 2D!");
2062
2063 return array_[j + (i * dims_[1])];
2064}
2065
2066//3D
2067template <typename T>
2068inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2069 size_t j,
2070 size_t k) const
2071{
2072 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 3D!");
2073 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 3D!");
2074 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in Carray 3D!");
2075 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArray 3D!");
2076
2077 return array_[k + (j * dims_[2])
2078 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2079}
2080
2081//4D
2082template <typename T>
2083inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2084 size_t j,
2085 size_t k,
2086 size_t l) const
2087{
2088 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 4D!");
2089 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 4D"); // die if >= dim0
2090 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArray 4D"); // die if >= dim1
2091 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArray 4D"); // die if >= dim2
2092 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArray 4D"); // die if >= dim3
2093
2094 return array_[l + (k * dims_[3])
2095 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2096 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2097}
2098
2099//5D
2100template <typename T>
2101inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2102 size_t j,
2103 size_t k,
2104 size_t l,
2105 size_t m) const
2106{
2107 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 5D!");
2108 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 5D!");
2109 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArray 5D!");
2110 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArray 5D!");
2111 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArray 5D!");
2112 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArray 5D!");
2113
2114 return array_[m + (l * dims_[4])
2115 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2116 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2117 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2118}
2119
2120//6D
2121template <typename T>
2122inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2123 size_t j,
2124 size_t k,
2125 size_t l,
2126 size_t m,
2127 size_t n) const
2128{
2129 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 6D!");
2130 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2131 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2132 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2133 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2134 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2135 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CArray 6D!");
2136
2137 return array_[n + (m * dims_[5])
2138 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
2139 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2140 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2141 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2142}
2143
2144//7D
2145template <typename T>
2146inline T& CArray<T>::operator() (size_t i,
2147 size_t j,
2148 size_t k,
2149 size_t l,
2150 size_t m,
2151 size_t n,
2152 size_t o) const
2153{
2154 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArray 7D!");
2155 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2156 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2157 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2158 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2159 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2160 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2161 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in CArray 7D!");
2162
2163 return array_[o + (n * dims_[6])
2164 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
2165 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
2166 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2167 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2168 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2169
2170}
2171
2172
2173//overload = operator
2174template <typename T>
2175inline CArray<T>& CArray<T>::operator= (const CArray& temp)
2176{
2177
2178 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
2179 if (this != &temp) {
2180 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
2181 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
2182 } // end for
2183
2184 order_ = temp.order_;
2185 length_ = temp.length_;
2186 array_ = temp.array_;
2187 }
2188 return *this;
2189}
2190
2191
2192
2193//return size
2194template <typename T>
2195inline size_t CArray<T>::size() const {
2196 return length_;
2197}
2198
2199template <typename T>
2200inline size_t CArray<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
2201 assert(i < order_ && "CArray order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
2202 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to CArray dims is out of bounds!");
2203 return dims_[i];
2204}
2205
2206template <typename T>
2207inline size_t CArray<T>::order() const {
2208 return order_;
2209}
2210
2211
2212template <typename T>
2213inline T* CArray<T>::pointer() const{
2214 return array_.get();
2215}
2216
2217//destructor
2218template <typename T>
2219CArray<T>::~CArray() {}
2220
2221//----endof carray class definitions----
2222
2223
2224//6. ViewCArray
2225// indicies are [0:N-1]
2226template <typename T>
2227class ViewCArray {
2228
2229private:
2230 size_t dims_[7];
2231 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
2232 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
2233 T * array_;
2234
2235public:
2236
2237 // Default constructor
2238 ViewCArray ();
2239
2240 //--- 1D to 7D array ---
2241 ViewCArray(T *array,
2242 size_t dim0);
2243
2244 ViewCArray(T *array,
2245 size_t dim0,
2246 size_t dim1);
2247
2248 ViewCArray(T *some_array,
2249 size_t dim0,
2250 size_t dim1,
2251 size_t dim2);
2252
2253 ViewCArray(T *some_array,
2254 size_t dim0,
2255 size_t dim1,
2256 size_t dim2,
2257 size_t dim3);
2258
2259 ViewCArray (T *some_array,
2260 size_t dim0,
2261 size_t dim1,
2262 size_t dim2,
2263 size_t dim3,
2264 size_t dim4);
2265
2266 ViewCArray (T *some_array,
2267 size_t dim0,
2268 size_t dim1,
2269 size_t dim2,
2270 size_t dim3,
2271 size_t dim4,
2272 size_t dim5);
2273
2274 ViewCArray (T *some_array,
2275 size_t dim0,
2276 size_t dim1,
2277 size_t dim2,
2278 size_t dim3,
2279 size_t dim4,
2280 size_t dim5,
2281 size_t dim6);
2282
2283 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
2284
2285 T& operator()(size_t i,
2286 size_t j) const;
2287
2288 T& operator()(size_t i,
2289 size_t j,
2290 size_t k) const;
2291
2292 T& operator()(size_t i,
2293 size_t j,
2294 size_t k,
2295 size_t l) const;
2296 T& operator()(size_t i,
2297 size_t j,
2298 size_t k,
2299 size_t l,
2300 size_t m) const;
2301
2302 T& operator()(size_t i,
2303 size_t j,
2304 size_t k,
2305 size_t l,
2306 size_t m,
2307 size_t n) const;
2308
2309 T& operator()(size_t i,
2310 size_t j,
2311 size_t k,
2312 size_t l,
2313 size_t m,
2314 size_t n,
2315 size_t o) const;
2316
2317 // calculate C = math(A,B)
2318 template <typename M>
2319 void operator=(M do_this_math);
2320
2321 //return array size
2322 size_t size() const;
2323
2324 // return array dims
2325 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
2326
2327 // return array order (rank)
2328 size_t order() const;
2329
2330 // return pointer
2331 T* pointer() const;
2332
2333}; // end of ViewCArray
2334
2335//class definitions
2336
2337//constructors
2338
2339//no dim
2340template <typename T>
2341ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray() {
2342 array_ = NULL;
2343 length_ = order_ = 0;
2344}
2345
2346//1D
2347template <typename T>
2348ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2349 size_t dim0)
2350{
2351 dims_[0] = dim0;
2352 order_ = 1;
2353 length_ = dim0;
2354 array_ = array;
2355}
2356
2357//2D
2358template <typename T>
2359ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2360 size_t dim0,
2361 size_t dim1)
2362{
2363 dims_[0] = dim0;
2364 dims_[1] = dim1;
2365 order_ = 2;
2366 length_ = dim0 * dim1;
2367 array_ = array;
2368}
2369
2370//3D
2371template <typename T>
2372ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray (T *array,
2373 size_t dim0,
2374 size_t dim1,
2375 size_t dim2)
2376{
2377 dims_[0] = dim0;
2378 dims_[1] = dim1;
2379 dims_[2] = dim2;
2380 order_ = 3;
2381 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2;
2382 array_ = array;
2383}
2384
2385//4D
2386template <typename T>
2387ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2388 size_t dim0,
2389 size_t dim1,
2390 size_t dim2,
2391 size_t dim3)
2392{
2393 dims_[0] = dim0;
2394 dims_[1] = dim1;
2395 dims_[2] = dim2;
2396 dims_[3] = dim3;
2397 order_ = 4;
2398 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
2399 array_ = array;
2400}
2401
2402//5D
2403template <typename T>
2404ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2405 size_t dim0,
2406 size_t dim1,
2407 size_t dim2,
2408 size_t dim3,
2409 size_t dim4)
2410{
2411 dims_[0] = dim0;
2412 dims_[1] = dim1;
2413 dims_[2] = dim2;
2414 dims_[3] = dim3;
2415 dims_[4] = dim4;
2416 order_ = 5;
2417 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
2418 array_ = array;
2419}
2420
2421//6D
2422template <typename T>
2423ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2424 size_t dim0,
2425 size_t dim1,
2426 size_t dim2,
2427 size_t dim3,
2428 size_t dim4,
2429 size_t dim5)
2430{
2431 dims_[0] = dim0;
2432 dims_[1] = dim1;
2433 dims_[2] = dim2;
2434 dims_[3] = dim3;
2435 dims_[4] = dim4;
2436 dims_[5] = dim5;
2437 order_ = 6;
2438 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
2439 array_ = array;
2440}
2441
2442//7D
2443template <typename T>
2444ViewCArray<T>::ViewCArray(T *array,
2445 size_t dim0,
2446 size_t dim1,
2447 size_t dim2,
2448 size_t dim3,
2449 size_t dim4,
2450 size_t dim5,
2451 size_t dim6)
2452{
2453 dims_[0] = dim0;
2454 dims_[1] = dim1;
2455 dims_[2] = dim2;
2456 dims_[3] = dim3;
2457 dims_[4] = dim4;
2458 dims_[5] = dim5;
2459 dims_[6] = dim6;
2460 order_ = 7;
2461 length_ = dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
2462 array_ = array;
2463}
2464
2465//overload () operator
2466
2467//1D
2468template <typename T>
2469inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i) const
2470{
2471 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 1D!");
2472 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 1D!");
2473
2474 return array_[i];
2475}
2476
2477/*
2478//specification for CArray type
2479//1D
2480template <typename T>
2481inline T& ViewCArray<CArray<T>>::operator()(size_t i) const
2482{
2483 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in c_array 1D"); // die if >= dim1
2484
2485 return (*this_array_)(i);
2486}
2487*/
2488
2489//2D
2490template <typename T>
2491inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2492 size_t j) const
2493{
2494
2495 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 2D!");
2496 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 2D!");
2497 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArray 2D!");
2498
2499 return array_[j + (i * dims_[1])];
2500}
2501
2502//3D
2503template <typename T>
2504inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2505 size_t j,
2506 size_t k) const
2507{
2508 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 3D!");
2509 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 3D!");
2510 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCarray 3D!");
2511 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArray 3D!");
2512
2513 return array_[k + (j * dims_[2])
2514 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2515}
2516
2517//4D
2518template <typename T>
2519inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2520 size_t j,
2521 size_t k,
2522 size_t l) const
2523{
2524 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 4D!");
2525 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 4D"); // die if >= dim0
2526 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArray 4D"); // die if >= dim1
2527 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArray 4D"); // die if >= dim2
2528 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArray 4D"); // die if >= dim3
2529
2530 return array_[l + (k * dims_[3])
2531 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2532 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2533}
2534
2535//5D
2536template <typename T>
2537inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2538 size_t j,
2539 size_t k,
2540 size_t l,
2541 size_t m) const
2542{
2543 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 5D!");
2544 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 5D!");
2545 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArray 5D!");
2546 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArray 5D!");
2547 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArray 5D!");
2548 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArray 5D!");
2549
2550 return array_[m + (l * dims_[4])
2551 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2552 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2553 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2554}
2555
2556//6D
2557template <typename T>
2558inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2559 size_t j,
2560 size_t k,
2561 size_t l,
2562 size_t m,
2563 size_t n) const
2564{
2565 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 6D!");
2566 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2567 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2568 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2569 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2570 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2571 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCArray 6D!");
2572
2573 return array_[n + (m * dims_[5])
2574 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
2575 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2576 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2577 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2578}
2579
2580//7D
2581template <typename T>
2582inline T& ViewCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2583 size_t j,
2584 size_t k,
2585 size_t l,
2586 size_t m,
2587 size_t n,
2588 size_t o) const
2589{
2590 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArray 7D!");
2591 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2592 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2593 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2594 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2595 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2596 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2597 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewCArray 7D!");
2598
2599 return array_[o + (n * dims_[6])
2600 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
2601 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
2602 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
2603 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
2604 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
2605}
2606
2607
2608// calculate this ViewFArray object = math(A,B)
2609template <typename T>
2610template <typename M>
2611void ViewCArray<T>::operator=(M do_this_math){
2612 do_this_math(*this); // pass in this ViewFArray object
2613}// end of math opperation
2614
2615//return size
2616template <typename T>
2617inline size_t ViewCArray<T>::size() const {
2618 return length_;
2619}
2620
2621template <typename T>
2622inline size_t ViewCArray<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
2623 assert(i < order_ && "ViewCArray order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
2624 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewCArray dims is out of bounds!");
2625 return dims_[i];
2626}
2627
2628template <typename T>
2629inline size_t ViewCArray<T>::order() const {
2630 return order_;
2631}
2632
2633template <typename T>
2634inline T* ViewCArray<T>::pointer() const {
2635 return array_;
2636}
2637
2638//---end of ViewCArray class definitions----
2639
2640
2641//7. CMatrix
2642template <typename T>
2643class CMatrix {
2644
2645private:
2646 size_t dims_[7];
2647 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
2648 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
2649 std::shared_ptr <T []> matrix_;
2650
2651public:
2652
2653 // default constructor
2654 CMatrix();
2655
2656 CMatrix(size_t dim1);
2657
2658 CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2659 size_t dim2);
2660
2661 CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2662 size_t dim2,
2663 size_t dim3);
2664
2665 CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2666 size_t dim2,
2667 size_t dim3,
2668 size_t dim4);
2669
2670 CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2671 size_t dim2,
2672 size_t dim3,
2673 size_t dim4,
2674 size_t dim5);
2675
2676 CMatrix (size_t dim1,
2677 size_t dim2,
2678 size_t dim3,
2679 size_t dim4,
2680 size_t dim5,
2681 size_t dim6);
2682
2683 CMatrix (size_t dim1,
2684 size_t dim2,
2685 size_t dim3,
2686 size_t dim4,
2687 size_t dim5,
2688 size_t dim6,
2689 size_t dim7);
2690
2691 CMatrix(const CMatrix& temp);
2692
2693 //overload operators to access data
2694 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
2695
2696 T& operator()(size_t i,
2697 size_t j) const;
2698
2699 T& operator()(size_t i,
2700 size_t j,
2701 size_t k) const;
2702
2703 T& operator()(size_t i,
2704 size_t j,
2705 size_t k,
2706 size_t l) const;
2707
2708 T& operator()(size_t i,
2709 size_t j,
2710 size_t k,
2711 size_t l,
2712 size_t m) const;
2713
2714 T& operator()(size_t i,
2715 size_t j,
2716 size_t k,
2717 size_t l,
2718 size_t m,
2719 size_t n) const;
2720
2721 T& operator()(size_t i,
2722 size_t j,
2723 size_t k,
2724 size_t l,
2725 size_t m,
2726 size_t n,
2727 size_t o) const;
2728
2729 //overload = operator
2730 CMatrix& operator= (const CMatrix &temp);
2731
2732 //return array size
2733 size_t size() const;
2734
2735 // return array dims
2736 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
2737
2738 // return array order (rank)
2739 size_t order() const;
2740
2741 //return pointer
2742 T* pointer() const;
2743
2744 // deconstructor
2745 ~CMatrix( );
2746
2747}; // end of CMatrix
2748
2749// CMatrix class definitions
2750
2751//constructors
2752
2753//no dim
2754
2755//1D
2756template <typename T>
2757CMatrix<T>::CMatrix() {
2758 matrix_ = NULL;
2759 length_ = 0;
2760}
2761
2762//1D
2763template <typename T>
2764CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1)
2765{
2766 dims_[0] = dim1;
2767 order_ = 1;
2768 length_ = dim1;
2769 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2770}
2771
2772//2D
2773template <typename T>
2774CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2775 size_t dim2)
2776{
2777 dims_[0] = dim1;
2778 dims_[1] = dim2;
2779 order_ = 2;
2780 length_ = dim1 * dim2;
2781 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2782}
2783
2784//3D
2785template <typename T>
2786CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2787 size_t dim2,
2788 size_t dim3)
2789{
2790 dims_[0] = dim1;
2791 dims_[1] = dim2;
2792 dims_[2] = dim3;
2793 order_ = 3;
2794 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
2795 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2796}
2797
2798//4D
2799template <typename T>
2800CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2801 size_t dim2,
2802 size_t dim3,
2803 size_t dim4)
2804{
2805 dims_[0] = dim1;
2806 dims_[1] = dim2;
2807 dims_[2] = dim3;
2808 dims_[3] = dim4;
2809 order_ = 4;
2810 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
2811 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2812}
2813
2814//5D
2815template <typename T>
2816CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2817 size_t dim2,
2818 size_t dim3,
2819 size_t dim4,
2820 size_t dim5)
2821{
2822 dims_[0] = dim1;
2823 dims_[1] = dim2;
2824 dims_[2] = dim3;
2825 dims_[3] = dim4;
2826 dims_[4] = dim5;
2827 order_ = 5;
2828 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
2829 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2830}
2831
2832//6D
2833template <typename T>
2834CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2835 size_t dim2,
2836 size_t dim3,
2837 size_t dim4,
2838 size_t dim5,
2839 size_t dim6)
2840{
2841 dims_[0] = dim1;
2842 dims_[1] = dim2;
2843 dims_[2] = dim3;
2844 dims_[3] = dim4;
2845 dims_[4] = dim5;
2846 dims_[5] = dim6;
2847 order_ = 6;
2848 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
2849 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2850}
2851
2852//7D
2853template <typename T>
2854CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(size_t dim1,
2855 size_t dim2,
2856 size_t dim3,
2857 size_t dim4,
2858 size_t dim5,
2859 size_t dim6,
2860 size_t dim7)
2861{
2862 dims_[0] = dim1;
2863 dims_[1] = dim2;
2864 dims_[2] = dim3;
2865 dims_[3] = dim4;
2866 dims_[4] = dim5;
2867 dims_[5] = dim6;
2868 dims_[6] = dim7;
2869 order_ = 7;
2870 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7;
2871 matrix_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
2872}
2873
2874template <typename T>
2875CMatrix<T>::CMatrix(const CMatrix& temp) {
2876
2877 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
2878
2879 if (this != &temp) {
2880 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
2881 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
2882 } // end for
2883
2884 order_ = temp.order_;
2885 length_ = temp.length_;
2886 matrix_ = temp.matrix_;
2887 } // end if
2888
2889} // end constructor
2890
2891//overload () operator
2892
2893//1D
2894template <typename T>
2895T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i) const
2896{
2897 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 1D!");
2898 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 1D!");
2899
2900 return matrix_[i-1];
2901}
2902
2903//2D
2904template <typename T>
2905T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2906 size_t j) const
2907{
2908 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 2D!");
2909 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 2D!");
2910 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 2D!");
2911
2912 return matrix_[(j-1) + (i-1)*dims_[1]];
2913}
2914
2915//3D
2916template <typename T>
2917T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2918 size_t j,
2919 size_t k) const
2920{
2921 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 3D!");
2922 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 3D!");
2923 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 3D!");
2924 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrix 3D!");
2925
2926 return matrix_[(k-1) + (j-1)*dims_[2]
2927 + (i-1)*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
2928}
2929
2930//4D
2931template <typename T>
2932T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2933 size_t j,
2934 size_t k,
2935 size_t l) const
2936{
2937 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 4D!");
2938 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim0
2939 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim1
2940 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim2
2941 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim3
2942
2943 return matrix_[(l-1) + (k-1)*dims_[3]
2944 + (j-1)*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
2945 + (i-1)*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
2946}
2947
2948//5D
2949template <typename T>
2950T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2951 size_t j,
2952 size_t k,
2953 size_t l,
2954 size_t m) const
2955{
2956 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 5D!");
2957 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 5D!");
2958 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 5D!");
2959 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrix 5D!");
2960 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrix 5D!");
2961 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrix 5D!");
2962
2963 return matrix_[(m-1) + (l-1)*dims_[4]
2964 + (k-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
2965 + (j-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
2966 + (i-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
2967}
2968
2969//6D
2970template <typename T>
2971T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2972 size_t j,
2973 size_t k,
2974 size_t l,
2975 size_t m,
2976 size_t n) const
2977{
2978 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 6D!");
2979 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2980 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2981 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2982 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2983 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2984 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CMatrix 6D!");
2985
2986 return matrix_[ (n-1) + (m-1)*dims_[5]
2987 + (l-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]
2988 + (k-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
2989 + (j-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
2990 + (i-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
2991}
2992
2993//7D
2994template <typename T>
2995T& CMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
2996 size_t j,
2997 size_t k,
2998 size_t l,
2999 size_t m,
3000 size_t n,
3001 size_t o) const
3002{
3003 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrix 7D!");
3004 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3005 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3006 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3007 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3008 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3009 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3010 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in CMatrix 7D!");
3011
3012 return matrix_[(o-1) + (n-1)*dims_[6]
3013 + (m-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]
3014 + (l-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]
3015 + (k-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
3016 + (j-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
3017 + (i-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3018}
3019
3020//overload = operator
3021//THIS = CMatrix<> temp
3022template <typename T>
3023CMatrix<T> &CMatrix<T>::operator= (const CMatrix &temp) {
3024 if(this != &temp) {
3025 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
3026 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
3027 } // end for
3028
3029 order_ = temp.order_;
3030 length_ = temp.length_;
3031 matrix_ = temp.matrix_;
3032 }
3033 return *this;
3034}
3035
3036template <typename T>
3037inline size_t CMatrix<T>::size() const {
3038 return length_;
3039}
3040
3041template <typename T>
3042inline size_t CMatrix<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
3043 i--; // i starts at 1
3044 assert(i < order_ && "CMatrix order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
3045 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to CMatrix dims is out of bounds!");
3046 return dims_[i];
3047}
3048
3049template <typename T>
3050inline size_t CMatrix<T>::order() const {
3051 return order_;
3052}
3053
3054template <typename T>
3055inline T* CMatrix<T>::pointer() const{
3056 return matrix_.get();
3057}
3058
3059// Destructor
3060template <typename T>
3061CMatrix<T>::~CMatrix(){}
3062
