3063//----end of CMatrix class definitions----
3064
3065
3066//8. ViewCMatrix
3067// indices [1:N]
3068template <typename T>
3069class ViewCMatrix {
3070
3071private:
3072 size_t dims_[7];
3073 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
3074 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
3075 T * matrix_;
3076
3077public:
3078
3079 // default constructor
3080 ViewCMatrix();
3081
3082
3083 //--- 1D array ---
3084 // overloaded constructor
3085 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3086 size_t dim1);
3087
3088 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3089 size_t dim1,
3090 size_t dim2);
3091
3092 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3093 size_t dim1,
3094 size_t dim2,
3095 size_t dim3);
3096
3097 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3098 size_t dim1,
3099 size_t dim2,
3100 size_t dim3,
3101 size_t dim4);
3102
3103 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3104 size_t dim1,
3105 size_t dim2,
3106 size_t dim3,
3107 size_t dim4,
3108 size_t dim5);
3109
3110 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3111 size_t dim1,
3112 size_t dim2,
3113 size_t dim3,
3114 size_t dim4,
3115 size_t dim5,
3116 size_t dim6);
3117
3118 ViewCMatrix (T *matrix,
3119 size_t dim1,
3120 size_t dim2,
3121 size_t dim3,
3122 size_t dim4,
3123 size_t dim5,
3124 size_t dim6,
3125 size_t dim7);
3126
3127 T& operator() (size_t i) const;
3128
3129 T& operator() (size_t i,
3130 size_t j) const;
3131
3132 T& operator() (size_t i,
3133 size_t j,
3134 size_t k) const;
3135
3136 T& operator() (size_t i,
3137 size_t j,
3138 size_t k,
3139 size_t l) const;
3140
3141 T& operator() (size_t i,
3142 size_t j,
3143 size_t k,
3144 size_t l,
3145 size_t m) const;
3146
3147 T& operator() (size_t i,
3148 size_t j,
3149 size_t k,
3150 size_t l,
3151 size_t m,
3152 size_t n) const;
3153 T& operator() (size_t i,
3154 size_t j,
3155 size_t k,
3156 size_t l,
3157 size_t m,
3158 size_t n,
3159 size_t o) const;
3160
3161 // calculate C = math(A,B)
3162 template <typename M>
3163 void operator=(M do_this_math);
3164
3165 //return array size
3166 size_t size() const;
3167
3168 // return array dims
3169 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
3170
3171 // return array order (rank)
3172 size_t order() const;
3173
3174 // return pointer
3175 T* pointer() const;
3176
3177}; // end of ViewCMatrix
3178
3179//class definitions
3180
3181//constructors
3182
3183//no dim
3184template <typename T>
3185ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(){
3186 matrix_ = NULL;
3187 length_ = 0;
3188}
3189
3190//1D
3191template <typename T>
3192ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3193 size_t dim1)
3194{
3195 dims_[0] = dim1;
3196 order_ = 1;
3197 length_ = dim1;
3198 matrix_ = matrix;
3199}
3200
3201//2D
3202template <typename T>
3203ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3204 size_t dim1,
3205 size_t dim2)
3206{
3207 dims_[0] = dim1;
3208 dims_[1] = dim2;
3209 order_ = 2;
3210 length_ = dim1 * dim2;
3211 matrix_ = matrix;
3212}
3213
3214//3D
3215template <typename T>
3216ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3217 size_t dim1,
3218 size_t dim2,
3219 size_t dim3)
3220{
3221 dims_[0] = dim1;
3222 dims_[1] = dim2;
3223 dims_[2] = dim3;
3224 order_ = 3;
3225 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3;
3226 matrix_ = matrix;
3227}
3228
3229//4D
3230template <typename T>
3231ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3232 size_t dim1,
3233 size_t dim2,
3234 size_t dim3,
3235 size_t dim4)
3236{
3237 dims_[0] = dim1;
3238 dims_[1] = dim2;
3239 dims_[2] = dim3;
3240 dims_[3] = dim4;
3241 order_ = 4;
3242 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4;
3243 matrix_ = matrix;
3244}
3245
3246//5D
3247template <typename T>
3248ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3249 size_t dim1,
3250 size_t dim2,
3251 size_t dim3,
3252 size_t dim4,
3253 size_t dim5)
3254{
3255 dims_[0] = dim1;
3256 dims_[1] = dim2;
3257 dims_[2] = dim3;
3258 dims_[3] = dim4;
3259 dims_[4] = dim5;
3260 order_ = 5;
3261 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5;
3262 matrix_ = matrix;
3263}
3264
3265//6D
3266template <typename T>
3267ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3268 size_t dim1,
3269 size_t dim2,
3270 size_t dim3,
3271 size_t dim4,
3272 size_t dim5,
3273 size_t dim6) {
3274 dims_[0] = dim1;
3275 dims_[1] = dim2;
3276 dims_[2] = dim3;
3277 dims_[3] = dim4;
3278 dims_[4] = dim5;
3279 dims_[5] = dim6;
3280 order_ = 6;
3281 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6;
3282 matrix_ = matrix;
3283}
3284
3285//7D
3286template <typename T>
3287ViewCMatrix<T>::ViewCMatrix(T *matrix,
3288 size_t dim1,
3289 size_t dim2,
3290 size_t dim3,
3291 size_t dim4,
3292 size_t dim5,
3293 size_t dim6,
3294 size_t dim7) {
3295 dims_[0] = dim1;
3296 dims_[1] = dim2;
3297 dims_[2] = dim3;
3298 dims_[3] = dim4;
3299 dims_[4] = dim5;
3300 dims_[5] = dim6;
3301 dims_[6] = dim7;
3302 order_ = 7;
3303 length_ = dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7;
3304 matrix = matrix_;
3305}
3306
3307//overload () operator
3308
3309//1D
3310template <typename T>
3311T& ViewCMatrix<T>:: operator() (size_t i) const
3312{
3313 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 1D!");
3314 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 1D!");
3315
3316 return matrix_[i-1];
3317}
3318
3319//2D
3320template <typename T>
3321T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator() (size_t i,
3322 size_t j) const
3323{
3324 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 2D!");
3325 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 2D!");
3326 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 2D!");
3327
3328 return matrix_[(j-1) + (i-1)*dims_[1]];
3329}
3330
3331//3D
3332template <typename T>
3333T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator () (size_t i,
3334 size_t j,
3335 size_t k) const
3336{
3337 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 3D!");
3338 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 3D!");
3339 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 3D!");
3340 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 3D!");
3341
3342 return matrix_[(k-1) + (j-1)*dims_[2]
3343 + (i-1)*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3344}
3345
3346//4D
3347template <typename T>
3348T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
3349 size_t j,
3350 size_t k,
3351 size_t l) const
3352{
3353 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 4D!");
3354 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim0
3355 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim1
3356 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim2
3357 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 4D"); // die if >= dim3
3358
3359 return matrix_[(l-1) + (k-1)*dims_[3]
3360 + (j-1)*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
3361 + (i-1)*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3362}
3363
3364//5D
3365template <typename T>
3366T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
3367 size_t j,
3368 size_t k,
3369 size_t l,
3370 size_t m) const
3371{
3372 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3373 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3374 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3375 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3376 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3377 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 5D!");
3378
3379 return matrix_[(m-1) + (l-1)*dims_[4]
3380 + (k-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
3381 + (j-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
3382 + (i-1)*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3383}
3384
3385//6D
3386template <typename T>
3387T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
3388 size_t j,
3389 size_t k,
3390 size_t l,
3391 size_t m,
3392 size_t n) const
3393{
3394 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3395 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3396 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3397 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3398 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3399 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3400 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 6D!");
3401
3402 return matrix_[(n-1) + (m-1)*dims_[5]
3403 + (l-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]
3404 + (k-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
3405 + (j-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
3406 + (i-1)*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3407}
3408
3409//7D
3410template <typename T>
3411T& ViewCMatrix<T>::operator()(size_t i,
3412 size_t j,
3413 size_t k,
3414 size_t l,
3415 size_t m,
3416 size_t n,
3417 size_t o) const
3418{
3419 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3420 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3421 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3422 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3423 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3424 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3425 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3426 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewCMatrix 7D!");
3427
3428 return matrix_[(o-1) + (n-1)*dims_[6]
3429 + (m-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]
3430 + (l-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]
3431 + (k-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]
3432 + (j-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]
3433 + (i-1)*dims_[6]*dims_[5]*dims_[4]*dims_[3]*dims_[2]*dims_[1]];
3434}
3435
3436// calculate this ViewFArray object = math(A,B)
3437template <typename T>
3438template <typename M>
3439void ViewCMatrix<T>::operator=(M do_this_math){
3440 do_this_math(*this); // pass in this ViewFArray object
3441}// end of math opperation
3442
3443template <typename T>
3444inline size_t ViewCMatrix<T>::size() const {
3445 return length_;
3446}
3447
3448template <typename T>
3449inline size_t ViewCMatrix<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
3450 i--; // i starts at 1
3451 assert(i < order_ && "ViewCMatrix order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
3452 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewCMatrix dims is out of bounds!");
3453 return dims_[i];
3454}
3455
3456template <typename T>
3457inline size_t ViewCMatrix<T>::order() const {
3458 return order_;
3459}
3460
3461template <typename T>
3462inline T* ViewCMatrix<T>::pointer() const {
3463 return matrix_;
3464}
3465
3466
3467//----end of ViewCMatrix class definitions----
3468
3469//9. RaggedRightArray
3470template <typename T>
3471class RaggedRightArray {
3472private:
3473 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> start_index_;
3474 std::shared_ptr <T[]> array_;
3475
3476 size_t dim1_, length_;
3477 size_t num_saved_; // the number saved in the 1D array
3478
3479public:
3480 // Default constructor
3481 RaggedRightArray ();
3482
3483 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
3484
3485 // Overload constructor for a CArray
3486 RaggedRightArray (CArray<size_t> &strides_array);
3487
3488 // Overload constructor for a ViewCArray
3489 RaggedRightArray (ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array);
3490
3491 // Overloaded constructor for a traditional array
3492 RaggedRightArray (size_t *strides_array, size_t some_dim1);
3493
3494 // Overload constructor for a RaggedRightArray to
3495 // support a dynamically built stride_array
3496 RaggedRightArray (size_t some_dim1, size_t buffer);
3497
3498 // Copy constructor
3499 RaggedRightArray (const RaggedRightArray& temp);
3500
3501 // A method to return the stride size
3502 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
3503
3504 // A method to increase the number of column entries, i.e.,
3505 // the stride size. Used with the constructor for building
3506 // the stride_array dynamically.
3507 // DO NOT USE with the constructures with a strides_array
3508 void push_back(size_t i);
3509
3510 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
3511 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
3512 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
3513
3514 // method to return total size
3515 size_t size() const;
3516
3517 //return pointer
3518 T* pointer() const;
3519
3520 //get row starts array
3521 size_t* get_starts() const;
3522
3523 RaggedRightArray& operator+= (const size_t i);
3524
3525 RaggedRightArray& operator= (const RaggedRightArray &temp);
3526
3527 // Destructor
3528 ~RaggedRightArray ( );
3529}; // End of RaggedRightArray
3530
3531// Default constructor
3532template <typename T>
3533RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray () {
3534 array_ = NULL;
3535 start_index_ = NULL;
3536 length_ = 0;
3537}
3538
3539
3540// Overloaded constructor with CArray
3541template <typename T>
3542RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray (CArray<size_t> &strides_array){
3543 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3544 dim1_ = strides_array.size();
3545
3546 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3547 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3548 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3549
3550 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3551 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
3552 size_t count = 0;
3553 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3554 count += strides_array(i);
3555 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3556 } // end for i
3557 length_ = count;
3558
3559 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
3560} // End constructor
3561
3562// Overloaded constructor with a view c array
3563template <typename T>
3564RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray (ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array) {
3565 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3566 dim1_ = strides_array.size();
3567
3568 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3569 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3570 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3571
3572 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3573 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
3574 size_t count = 0;
3575 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3576 count += strides_array(i);
3577 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3578 } // end for i
3579 length_ = count;
3580
3581 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3582} // End constructor
3583
3584// Overloaded constructor with a regular cpp array
3585template <typename T>
3586RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray (size_t *strides_array, size_t dim1){
3587 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3588 dim1_ = dim1;
3589
3590 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3591 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3592 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3593
3594 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3595 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
3596 size_t count = 0;
3597 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3598 count += strides_array[i];
3599 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3600 } // end for i
3601 length_ = count;
3602
3603 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3604} // End constructor
3605
3606// overloaded constructor for a dynamically built strides_array.
3607// buffer is the max number of columns needed
3608template <typename T>
3609RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray (size_t some_dim1, size_t buffer){
3610
3611 dim1_ = some_dim1;
3612
3613 // create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3614 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3615 //start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3616
3617 num_saved_ = 0;
3618
3619 length_ = some_dim1*buffer;
3620 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3621
3622} // end constructor
3623
3624// Copy constructor
3625template <typename T>
3626RaggedRightArray<T>::RaggedRightArray (const RaggedRightArray& temp) {
3627
3628 if (this != &temp) {
3629 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
3630 length_ = temp.length_;
3631 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
3632
3633 // shared_ptr
3634 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
3635 array_ = temp.array_;
3636 }
3637}
3638
3639// A method to return the stride size
3640template <typename T>
3641inline size_t RaggedRightArray<T>::stride(size_t i) const {
3642 // Ensure that i is within bounds
3643 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is greater than dim1_ in RaggedRightArray");
3644
3645 return start_index_[(i + 1)] - start_index_[i];
3646}
3647
3648// A method to increase the stride size, in other words,
3649// this is used to build the stride array dynamically
3650// DO NOT USE with constructors that are given a stride array
3651template <typename T>
3652void RaggedRightArray<T>::push_back(size_t i){
3653 num_saved_ ++;
3654 start_index_[i+1] = num_saved_;
3655}
3656
3657// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
3658// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
3659template <typename T>
3660inline T& RaggedRightArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
3661 // get the 1D array index
3662 size_t start = start_index_[i];
3663
3664 // asserts
3665 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= dim1
3666 //assert(j < stride(i) && "j is out of stride bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= stride
3667 assert(j+start < length_ && "j+start is out of bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= 1D array length)
3668
3669 return array_[j + start];
3670} // End operator()
3671
3672//return size
3673template <typename T>
3674size_t RaggedRightArray<T>::size() const {
3675 return length_;
3676}
3677
3678template <typename T>
3679RaggedRightArray<T> & RaggedRightArray<T>::operator+= (const size_t i) {
3680 this->num_saved_ ++;
3681 this->start_index_[i+1] = num_saved_;
3682 return *this;
3683}
3684
3685//overload = operator
3686template <typename T>
3687RaggedRightArray<T> & RaggedRightArray<T>::operator= (const RaggedRightArray &temp) {
3688
3689 if( this != &temp) {
3690 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
3691 length_ = temp.length_;
3692 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
3693
3694 // shared_ptr
3695 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
3696 array_ = temp.array_;
3697 }
3698
3699 return *this;
3700}
3701
3702template <typename T>
3703inline T* RaggedRightArray<T>::pointer() const{
3704 return array_.get();
3705}
3706
3707template <typename T>
3708inline size_t* RaggedRightArray<T>::get_starts() const{
3709 return start_index_.get();
3710}
3711
3712// Destructor
3713template <typename T>
3714RaggedRightArray<T>::~RaggedRightArray () {}
3715
3716//----end of RaggedRightArray class definitions----
3717
3718//9. RaggedRightArrayofVectors
3719template <typename T>
3720class RaggedRightArrayofVectors {
3721private:
3722 std::shared_ptr <T[]> start_index_;
3723 std::shared_ptr <T[]> array_;
3724
3725 size_t dim1_, length_, vector_dim_;
3726 size_t num_saved_; // the number saved in the 1D array
3727
3728public:
3729 // Default constructor
3730 RaggedRightArrayofVectors ();
3731
3732 //--- 3D array access of a ragged right array storing a vector of size vector_dim_ at each (i,j)---
3733
3734 // Overload constructor for a CArray
3735 RaggedRightArrayofVectors (CArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim);
3736
3737 // Overload constructor for a ViewCArray
3738 RaggedRightArrayofVectors (ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim);
3739
3740 // Overloaded constructor for a traditional array
3741 RaggedRightArrayofVectors (size_t *strides_array, size_t some_dim1, size_t vector_dim);
3742
3743 // Overload constructor for a RaggedRightArray to
3744 // support a dynamically built stride_array
3745 RaggedRightArrayofVectors (size_t some_dim1, size_t buffer, size_t vector_dim);
3746
3747 // Copy constructor
3748 RaggedRightArrayofVectors (const RaggedRightArrayofVectors& temp);
3749
3750 // A method to return the stride size
3751 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
3752
3753 // A method to return the vector dim
3754 size_t vector_dim() const;
3755
3756 // A method to increase the number of column entries, i.e.,
3757 // the stride size. Used with the constructor for building
3758 // the stride_array dynamically.
3759 // DO NOT USE with the constructures with a strides_array
3760 void push_back(size_t i);
3761
3762 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
3763 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)], k=[0,vector_dim_]
3764 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
3765
3766 // method to return total size
3767 size_t size() const;
3768
3769 //return pointer
3770 T* pointer() const;
3771
3772 //get row starts array
3773 size_t* get_starts() const;
3774
3775 RaggedRightArrayofVectors& operator+= (const size_t i);
3776
3777 RaggedRightArrayofVectors& operator= (const RaggedRightArrayofVectors &temp);
3778
3779 // Destructor
3780 ~RaggedRightArrayofVectors ( );
3781}; // End of RaggedRightArray
3782
3783// Default constructor
3784template <typename T>
3785RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors () {
3786 array_ = NULL;
3787 start_index_ = NULL;
3788 length_ = 0;
3789}
3790
3791
3792// Overloaded constructor with CArray
3793template <typename T>
3794RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors (CArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim){
3795 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3796 dim1_ = strides_array.size();
3797 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
3798
3799 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3800 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3801 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3802
3803 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3804 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
3805 size_t count = 0;
3806 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3807 count += strides_array(i)*vector_dim_;
3808 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3809 } // end for i
3810 length_ = count;
3811
3812 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3813} // End constructor
3814
3815// Overloaded constructor with a view c array
3816template <typename T>
3817RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors (ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim) {
3818 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3819 dim1_ = strides_array.size();
3820 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
3821
3822 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3823 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3824 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3825
3826 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3827 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
3828 size_t count = 0;
3829 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3830 count += strides_array(i)*vector_dim_;
3831 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3832 } // end for i
3833 length_ = count;
3834
3835 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3836} // End constructor
3837
3838// Overloaded constructor with a regular cpp array
3839template <typename T>
3840RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors (size_t *strides_array, size_t dim1, size_t vector_dim){
3841 // The length of the stride array is some_dim1;
3842 dim1_ = dim1;
3843 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
3844
3845 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3846 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3847 start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3848
3849 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
3850 // represent the ragged-right array of vectors and set the starting 1D index
3851 size_t count = 0;
3852 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
3853 count += strides_array[i]*vector_dim_;
3854 start_index_[(i + 1)] = count;
3855 } // end for i
3856 length_ = count;
3857
3858 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
3859} // End constructor
3860
3861// overloaded constructor for a dynamically built strides_array.
3862// buffer is the max number of columns needed
3863template <typename T>
3864RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors (size_t some_dim1, size_t buffer, size_t vector_dim){
3865
3866 dim1_ = some_dim1;
3867 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
3868
3869 // create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
3870 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim1_ + 1)]); // note the dim1+1
3871 //start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
3872
3873 num_saved_ = 0;
3874
3875 length_ = some_dim1*buffer*vector_dim;
3876 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[some_dim1*buffer]);
3877
3878} // end constructor
3879
3880// Copy constructor
3881template <typename T>
3882RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::RaggedRightArrayofVectors (const RaggedRightArrayofVectors& temp) {
3883
3884 if( this != &temp) {
3885 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
3886 vector_dim_ = temp.vector_dim_;
3887 length_ = temp.length_;
3888 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
3889
3890 // shared pointer
3891 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
3892 array_ = temp.start_index_;
3893 }
3894} // end copy constructor
3895
3896// A method to return the stride size
3897template <typename T>
3898inline size_t RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::stride(size_t i) const {
3899 // Ensure that i is within bounds
3900 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is greater than dim1_ in RaggedRightArray");
3901
3902 return (start_index_[(i + 1)] - start_index_[i])/vector_dim_;
3903}
3904
3905// A method to increase the stride size, in other words,
3906// this is used to build the stride array dynamically
3907// DO NOT USE with constructors that are given a stride array
3908template <typename T>
3909void RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::push_back(size_t i){
3910 num_saved_ += vector_dim_;
3911 start_index_[i+1] = num_saved_;
3912}
3913
3914// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j,k)
3915// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)], k=[0:vector_dim_]
3916template <typename T>
3917inline T& RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
3918 // get the 1D array index
3919 size_t start = start_index_[i];
3920
3921 // asserts
3922 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= dim1
3923 //assert(j < stride(i) && "j is out of stride bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= stride
3924 assert(j*vector_dim_+start + k < length_ && "j+start is out of bounds in RaggedRightArray"); // die if >= 1D array length)
3925
3926 return array_[j*vector_dim_ + start + k];
3927} // End operator()
3928
3929//return size
3930template <typename T>
3931size_t RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::size() const {
3932 return length_;
3933}
3934
3935template <typename T>
3936RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T> & RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::operator+= (const size_t i) {
3937 this->num_saved_ += vector_dim_;
3938 this->start_index_[i+1] = num_saved_;
3939 return *this;
3940}
3941
3942//overload = operator
3943template <typename T>
3944RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T> & RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::operator= (const RaggedRightArrayofVectors &temp) {
3945
3946 if( this != &temp) {
3947 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
3948 vector_dim_ = temp.vector_dim_;
3949 length_ = temp.length_;
3950 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
3951
3952 // shared pointer
3953 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
3954 array_ = temp.start_index_;
3955 }
3956
3957 return *this;
3958}
3959
3960template <typename T>
3961inline T* RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::pointer() const{
3962 return array_.get();
3963}
3964
3965template <typename T>
3966inline size_t* RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::get_starts() const{
3967 return start_index_.get();
3968}
3969
3970// Destructor
3971template <typename T>
3972RaggedRightArrayofVectors<T>::~RaggedRightArrayofVectors () {}
3973
3974//----end of RaggedRightArrayofVectors class definitions----
3975
3976//10. RaggedDownArray
3977template <typename T>
3978class RaggedDownArray {
3979private:
3980 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> start_index_;
3981 std::shared_ptr <T[]> array_;
3982
3983 size_t dim2_;
3984 size_t length_;
3985 size_t num_saved_; // the number saved in the 1D array
3986
3987public:
3988 //default constructor
3989 RaggedDownArray() ;
3990
3991 //~~~~2D`~~~~
3992 //overload constructor with CArray
3993 RaggedDownArray(CArray<size_t> &strides_array);
3994
3995 //overload with ViewCArray
3996 RaggedDownArray(ViewCArray <size_t> &strides_array);
3997
3998 //overload with traditional array
3999 RaggedDownArray(size_t *strides_array, size_t dome_dim1);
4000
4001 // Overload constructor for a RaggedDownArray to
4002 // support a dynamically built stride_array
4003 RaggedDownArray (size_t some_dim2, size_t buffer);
4004
4005 // Copy constructor
4006 RaggedDownArray (const RaggedDownArray& temp);
4007
4008 //method to return stride size
4009 size_t stride(size_t j);
4010
4011 // A method to increase the number of column entries, i.e.,
4012 // the stride size. Used with the constructor for building
4013 // the stride_array dynamically.
4014 // DO NOT USE with the constructures with a strides_array
4015 void push_back(size_t j);
4016
4017 //overload () operator to access data as array (i,j)
4018 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j);
4019
4020 // method to return total size
4021 size_t size();
4022
4023 //return pointer
4024 T* pointer() const;
4025
4026 //get row starts array
4027 size_t* get_starts() const;
4028
4029 //overload = operator
4030 RaggedDownArray& operator= (const RaggedDownArray &temp);
4031
4032 //destructor
4033 ~RaggedDownArray();
4034
4035}; //~~~~~end of RaggedDownArray class declarations~~~~~~~~
4036
4037//no dims
4038template <typename T>
4039RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray() {
4040 array_ = NULL;
4041 start_index_ = NULL;
4042 length_ = 0;
4043}
4044
4045//overload constructor with CArray
4046template <typename T>
4047RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray( CArray <size_t> &strides_array) {
4048 // Length of stride array
4049 //dim2_ = strides_array.size();
4050
4051 // Create and initialize startding indices
4052 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim2_ + 1)]); // note the dim2+1
4053 start_index_[0] = 0; //1D array starts at 0
4054
4055
4056 //length of strides
4057 dim2_ = strides_array.size();
4058
4059 // Loop to find total length of 1D array
4060 size_t count = 0;
4061 for(size_t j = 0; j < dim2_ ; j++) {
4062 count += strides_array(j);
4063 start_index_[j+1] = count;
4064 }
4065 length_ = count;
4066
4067 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
4068
4069} // End constructor
4070
4071// Overload constructor with ViewCArray
4072template <typename T>
4073RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray( ViewCArray <size_t> &strides_array) {
4074 // Length of strides
4075 //dim2_ = strides_array.size();
4076
4077 //create array for holding start indices
4078 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim2_ + 1)]); // note the dim2+1
4079 start_index_[0] = 0;
4080
4081 size_t count = 0;
4082 // Loop over to get total length of 1D array
4083 for(size_t j = 0; j < dim2_ ;j++ ) {
4084 count += strides_array(j);
4085 start_index_[j+1] = count;
4086 }
4087 length_ = count;
4088 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T []> (new T[length_]);
4089
4090} // End constructor
4091
4092// Overload constructor with regualar array
4093template <typename T>
4094RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray( size_t *strides_array, size_t dim2){
4095 // Length of stride array
4096 dim2_ = dim2;
4097
4098 // Create and initialize starting index of entries
4099 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim2_ + 1)]); // note the dim2+1
4100 start_index_[0] = 0;
4101
4102 // Loop over to find length of 1D array
4103 // Represent ragged down array and set 1D index
4104 size_t count = 0;
4105 for(size_t j = 0; j < dim2_; j++) {
4106 count += strides_array[j];
4107 start_index_[j+1] = count;
4108 }
4109 length_ = count;
4110 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
4111
4112} //end construnctor
4113
4114// overloaded constructor for a dynamically built strides_array.
4115// buffer is the max number of columns needed
4116template <typename T>
4117RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray (size_t some_dim2, size_t buffer){
4118
4119 dim2_ = some_dim2;
4120
4121 // create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
4122 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[(dim2_ + 1)]); // note the dim2+1
4123 //start_index_[0] = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
4124
4125 num_saved_ = 0;
4126
4127 length_ = some_dim2*buffer;
4128 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[length_]);
4129
4130} // end constructor
4131
4132// Copy constructor
4133template <typename T>
4134RaggedDownArray<T>::RaggedDownArray (const RaggedDownArray& temp) {
4135 if( this != &temp) {
4136 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4137 length_ = temp.length_;
4138 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
4139
4140 // shared pointer
4141 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
4142 array_ = temp.array_;
4143 }
4144} // end copy constructor
4145
4146// Check the stride size
4147template <typename T>
4148size_t RaggedDownArray<T>::stride(size_t j) {
4149 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is greater than dim2_ in RaggedDownArray");
4150
4151 return start_index_[j+1] - start_index_[j];
4152}
4153
4154// A method to increase the stride size, in other words,
4155// this is used to build the stride array dynamically
4156// DO NOT USE with constructors that are given a stride array
4157template <typename T>
4158void RaggedDownArray<T>::push_back(size_t j){
4159 num_saved_ ++;
4160 start_index_[j+1] = num_saved_;
4161}
4162
4163//return size
4164template <typename T>
4165size_t RaggedDownArray<T>::size() {
4166 return length_;
4167}
4168
4169// overload operator () to access data as an array(i,j)
4170// Note: i = 0:stride(j), j = 0:N-1
4171template <typename T>
4172T& RaggedDownArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) {
4173 // Where is the array starting?
4174 // look at start index
4175 size_t start = start_index_[j];
4176
4177 // Make sure we are within array bounds
4178 assert(i < stride(j) && "i is out of bounds in RaggedDownArray");
4179 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is out of dim2_ bounds in RaggedDownArray");
4180 assert(i+start < length_ && "i+start is out of bounds in RaggedDownArray"); // die if >= 1D array length)
4181
4182 return array_[i + start];
4183
4184} // End () operator
4185
4186//overload = operator
4187template <typename T>
4188RaggedDownArray<T> & RaggedDownArray<T>::operator= (const RaggedDownArray &temp) {
4189
4190 if( this != &temp) {
4191 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4192 length_ = temp.length_;
4193 num_saved_ = temp.num_saved_;
4194
4195 // shared pointer
4196 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
4197 array_ = temp.array_;
4198 }
4199
4200 return *this;
4201}
4202
4203template <typename T>
4204inline T* RaggedDownArray<T>::pointer() const{
4205 return array_.get();
4206}
4207
4208
4209template <typename T>
4210inline size_t* RaggedDownArray<T>::get_starts() const{
4211 return start_index_.get();
4212}
4213
4214// Destructor
4215template <typename T>
4216RaggedDownArray<T>::~RaggedDownArray() {}
4217// End destructor
4218
4219
4220//----end of RaggedDownArray----
4221
4222
4223//11. DynamicRaggedRightArray
4224
4225template <typename T>
4226class DynamicRaggedRightArray {
4227private:
4228 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> stride_;
4229 std::shared_ptr <T[]> array_;
4230
4231 size_t dim1_;
4232 size_t dim2_;
4233 size_t length_;
4234
4235public:
4236 // Default constructor
4237 DynamicRaggedRightArray ();
4238
4239 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
4240
4241 // overload constructor
4242 DynamicRaggedRightArray (size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
4243
4244 // Copy constructor
4245 DynamicRaggedRightArray (const DynamicRaggedRightArray& temp);
4246
4247 // A method to return or set the stride size
4248 size_t& stride(size_t i) const;
4249
4250 // A method to return the size
4251 size_t size() const;
4252
4253 //return pointer
4254 T* pointer() const;
4255
4256 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
4257 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
4258 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4259
4260 // Overload copy assignment operator
4261 DynamicRaggedRightArray& operator= (const DynamicRaggedRightArray &temp);
4262
4263 // Destructor
4264 ~DynamicRaggedRightArray ();
4265};
4266
4267//nothing
4268template <typename T>
4269DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::DynamicRaggedRightArray () {
4270 array_ = NULL;
4271 stride_ = NULL;
4272 length_ = 0;
4273}
4274
4275// Overloaded constructor
4276template <typename T>
4277DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::DynamicRaggedRightArray (size_t dim1, size_t dim2) {
4278 // The dimensions of the array;
4279 dim1_ = dim1;
4280 dim2_ = dim2;
4281 length_ = dim1*dim2;
4282
4283 // Create memory on the heap for the values
4284 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[dim1*dim2]);
4285
4286 // Create memory for the stride size in each row
4287 stride_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[dim1]);
4288
4289 // Initialize the stride
4290 for (int i=0; i<dim1_; i++){
4291 stride_[i] = 0;
4292 }
4293
4294 // Start index is always = j + i*dim2
4295}
4296
4297// Copy constructor
4298template <typename T>
4299DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::DynamicRaggedRightArray (const DynamicRaggedRightArray& temp) {
4300 if( this != &temp) {
4301 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4302 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4303 length_ = temp.length_;
4304
4305 // shared pointer
4306 stride_ = temp.stride_;
4307 array_ = temp.array_;
4308 }
4309} // end copy constructor
4310
4311// A method to set the stride size for row i
4312template <typename T>
4313size_t& DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::stride(size_t i) const {
4314 return stride_[i];
4315}
4316
4317//return size
4318template <typename T>
4319size_t DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::size() const{
4320 return length_;
4321}
4322
4323// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
4324// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
4325template <typename T>
4326inline T& DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
4327 // Asserts
4328 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= dim1
4329 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is out of dim2 bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= dim2
4330 assert(j < stride_[i] && "j is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= stride
4331
4332 return array_[j + i*dim2_];
4333}
4334
4335//overload = operator
4336template <typename T>
4337inline DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>& DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::operator= (const DynamicRaggedRightArray &temp)
4338{
4339
4340 if( this != &temp) {
4341 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4342 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4343 length_ = temp.length_;
4344
4345 // shared pointer
4346 stride_ = temp.stride_;
4347 array_ = temp.array_;
4348 }
4349
4350 return *this;
4351}
4352
4353template <typename T>
4354inline T* DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::pointer() const{
4355 return array_.get();
4356}
4357
4358// Destructor
4359template <typename T>
4360DynamicRaggedRightArray<T>::~DynamicRaggedRightArray() {}
4361
4362
4363
4364
4365//----end DynamicRaggedRightArray class definitions----
4366
4367
4368//12. DynamicRaggedDownArray
4369
4370template <typename T>
4371class DynamicRaggedDownArray {
4372private:
4373 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> stride_;
4374 std::shared_ptr <T[]> array_;
4375
4376 size_t dim1_;
4377 size_t dim2_;
4378 size_t length_;
4379
4380public:
4381 // Default constructor
4382 DynamicRaggedDownArray ();
4383
4384 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
4385
4386 // overload constructor
4387 DynamicRaggedDownArray (size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
4388
4389 // Copy constructor
4390 DynamicRaggedDownArray (const DynamicRaggedDownArray& temp);
4391
4392 // A method to return or set the stride size
4393 size_t& stride(size_t j) const;
4394
4395 // A method to return the size
4396 size_t size() const;
4397
4398 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
4399 // where i=[stride(j)], j=[0:N-1]
4400 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4401
4402 // Overload copy assignment operator
4403 DynamicRaggedDownArray& operator= (const DynamicRaggedDownArray &temp);
4404
4405 //return pointer
4406 T* pointer() const;
4407
4408 // Destructor
4409 ~DynamicRaggedDownArray ();
4410};
4411
4412//nothing
4413template <typename T>
4414DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::DynamicRaggedDownArray () {
4415 array_ = NULL;
4416 stride_ = NULL;
4417 length_ = 0;
4418}
4419
4420// Overloaded constructor
4421template <typename T>
4422DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::DynamicRaggedDownArray (size_t dim1, size_t dim2) {
4423 // The dimensions of the array;
4424 dim1_ = dim1;
4425 dim2_ = dim2;
4426 length_ = dim1*dim2;
4427
4428 // Create memory on the heap for the values
4429 array_ = std::shared_ptr <T[]> (new T[dim1*dim2]);
4430
4431 // Create memory for the stride size in each row
4432 stride_ = std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> (new size_t[dim2]);
4433
4434 // Initialize the stride
4435 for (int j=0; j<dim2_; j++){
4436 stride_[j] = 0;
4437 }
4438
4439 // Start index is always = i + j*dim1
4440}
4441
4442// Copy constructor
4443template <typename T>
4444DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::DynamicRaggedDownArray (const DynamicRaggedDownArray& temp) {
4445 if( this != &temp) {
4446 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4447 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4448 length_ = temp.length_;
4449
4450 // shared pointer
4451 stride_ = temp.stride_;
4452 array_ = temp.array_;
4453 }
4454} // end copy constructor
4455
4456
4457// A method to set the stride size for column j
4458template <typename T>
4459size_t& DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::stride(size_t j) const {
4460 return stride_[j];
4461}
4462
4463//return size
4464template <typename T>
4465size_t DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::size() const{
4466 return length_;
4467}
4468
4469// overload operator () to access data as an array(i,j)
4470// Note: i = 0:stride(j), j = 0:N-1
4471
4472template <typename T>
4473inline T& DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
4474 // Asserts
4475 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArray"); // die if >= dim1
4476 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is out of dim2 bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArray"); // die if >= dim2
4477 assert(i < stride_[j] && "i is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArray"); // die if >= stride
4478
4479 return array_[i + j*dim1_];
4480}
4481
4482//overload = operator
4483template <typename T>
4484inline DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>& DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::operator= (const DynamicRaggedDownArray &temp)
4485{
4486
4487 if( this != &temp) {
4488 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4489 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4490 length_ = temp.length_;
4491
4492 // shared pointer
4493 stride_ = temp.stride_;
4494 array_ = temp.array_;
4495 }
4496
4497 return *this;
4498}
4499
4500template <typename T>
4501inline T* DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::pointer() const{
4502 return array_.get();
4503}
4504
4505// Destructor
4506template <typename T>
4507DynamicRaggedDownArray<T>::~DynamicRaggedDownArray() {}
4508
4509//----end of DynamicRaggedDownArray class definitions-----
4510
4511
4512// 15CSRArrayy
4513template <typename T>
4514class CSRArray {
4515 private: // What ought to be private ?
4516 size_t dim1_, dim2_; // dim1_ is number of rows dim2_ is number of columns
4517 size_t nnz_;
4518 std::shared_ptr <T []> array_;
4519 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> column_index_;
4520 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> start_index_;
4521
4522 public:
4523
4528 CSRArray();
4529
4530
4540 CSRArray(CArray<T> array, CArray<size_t> column_index, CArray<size_t> start_index, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
4541
4547 CSRArray(CArray<T> dense);
4548
4554 CSRArray(const CSRArray &temp);
4555
4563 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4564
4572 T& value(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4573
4580 CSRArray& operator=(const CSRArray &temp);
4581
4587 T* pointer() const;
4588
4594 size_t* get_starts() const;
4595
4596 void printer(); //debugging tool
4597
4604 T* begin(size_t i);
4605
4612 T* end(size_t i);
4613
4619 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
4620
4626 size_t dim1() const;
4631 size_t dim2() const;
4632
4633 // iterator for the raw data at row i
4634 // i.e. return the index each element is the index in the 1 array
4635 // This as the use of providing a reasonable way to get the column
4636 // index and data value in the case you need both
4637 size_t begin_index(size_t i);
4638 size_t end_index(size_t i);
4639
4640 // Get number of non zero elements in row i
4641 size_t nnz(size_t i);
4642 // Get total number of non zero elements
4643 size_t nnz();
4644
4645 // underscore stuff
4646 // Use the index into the 1d array to get what value is stored there and what is the corresponding row
4647 T& get_val_flat(size_t k);
4648 size_t get_col_flat(size_t k);
4649 // reverse map function from A(i,j) to what element of data/col_pt_ it corersponds to
4650 size_t flat_index(size_t i, size_t j);
4651 // Convertor
4652 int toCSC(CArray<T> &array, CArray<size_t> &start_index, CArray<size_t> &row_index);
4653
4654 void to_dense(CArray<T>& A);
4655 //destructor
4656 ~CSRArray();
4657
4658
4659};
4660
4661template<typename T>
4662CSRArray<T>::CSRArray(){}
4663
4664template <typename T>
4665CSRArray<T>::CSRArray(CArray<T> array, CArray<size_t> column_index, CArray<size_t> start_index, size_t dim1, size_t dim2 ){
4666 dim1_ = dim1;
4667 dim2_ = dim2;
4668 size_t nnz = array.size();
4669 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[dim1_ + 1]);
4670 array_ = std::shared_ptr<T []> (new T[nnz+1]);
4671 column_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[nnz]);
4672 size_t i ;
4673 for(i = 0; i < nnz; i++){
4674 array_[i] = array(i);
4675 column_index_[i] = column_index(i);
4676 }
4677 for(i = 0; i < dim1_ + 1; i++){
4678 start_index_[i] = start_index(i);
4679 }
4680 nnz_ = nnz;
4681}
4682
4683template<typename T>
4684CSRArray<T>::CSRArray(const CSRArray<T> &temp){
4685 if(this != temp) {
4686 nnz_ = temp.nnz_;
4687 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4688 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4689
4690 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
4691 column_index_ = temp.column_index_;
4692 array_ = temp.array_;
4693 }
4694}
4695
4696template<typename T>
4697CSRArray<T>::CSRArray(CArray<T> dense){
4698 dim1_ = dense.dims(0);
4699 dim2_ = dense.dims(1);
4700 nnz_ = dense.size();
4701 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[dim1_ + 1]);
4702 array_ = std::shared_ptr<T []> (new T[nnz_ + 1]);
4703 column_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[nnz_]);
4704 size_t i,j;
4705 size_t cur = 0;
4706 for(i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
4707 for(j = 0; i < dim2_; j++){
4708 if(j != 0){
4709 start_index_[i+1] += 1;
4710 column_index_[cur] = j;
4711 array_[cur] = dense(i,j);
4712 cur++;
4713 }
4714 }
4715 }
4716 start_index_[0] = 0;
4717 for(i = 1; i <= dim1_; i++){
4718 start_index_[i] = start_index_[i] + start_index_[i+1];
4719 }
4720
4721
4722}
4723
4724template<typename T>
4725T& CSRArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
4726 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
4727 size_t row_end = start_index_[i+1];
4728 size_t k;
4729 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
4730 if(column_index_[row_start + k] == j){
4731 return array_[row_start + k];
4732 }
4733 }
4734 array_[nnz_] = (T) NULL;
4735 return array_[nnz_];
4736}
4737
4738
4739template<typename T>
4740T& CSRArray<T>::value(size_t i, size_t j) const {
4741 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
4742 size_t row_end = start_index_[i+1];
4743 size_t k;
4744 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
4745 if(column_index_[row_start + k] == j){
4746 return array_[row_start + k];
4747 }
4748 }
4749 array_[nnz_] = (T) NULL;
4750 return array_[nnz_];
4751}
4752
4753template<typename T>
4754T* CSRArray<T>::pointer() const{
4755 return array_.get();
4756}
4757
4758template<typename T>
4759size_t* CSRArray<T>::get_starts() const {
4760 return start_index_.get();
4761}
4762
4763template<typename T>
4764CSRArray<T>& CSRArray<T>::operator=(const CSRArray &temp){
4765 if(this != temp) {
4766 nnz_ = temp.nnz_;
4767 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
4768 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
4769
4770 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
4771 column_index_ = temp.column_index_;
4772 array_ = temp.array_;
4773 }
4774 return *this;
4775}
4776
4777//debugging tool primarily
4778template <typename T>
4779void CSRArray<T>::printer(){
4780 size_t i,j;
4781 for(i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
4782 for(j = 0; j < dim2_; j++){
4783 printf(" %d ", (*this)(i,j));
4784 }
4785 printf("\n");
4786 }
4787}
4788
4789template<typename T>
4790void CSRArray<T>::to_dense(CArray<T>& A){
4791 size_t i,j;
4792 for(i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
4793 for(j = 0; j < dim2_; j++){
4794 A(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
4795 }
4796 }
4797
4798}
4799
4800template<typename T>
4801size_t CSRArray<T>::stride(size_t i) const {
4802 assert(i <= nrows_ && "Index i out of bounds in CSRArray.stride()");
4803 return start_index_[i+i] - start_index_[i];
4804
4805}
4806
4807
4808template<typename T>
4809size_t CSRArray<T>::dim1() const {
4810 return dim1_;
4811}
4812
4813template<typename T>
4814size_t CSRArray<T>::dim2() const {
4815 return dim2_;
4816}
4817
4818
4819template<typename T>
4820T* CSRArray<T>::begin(size_t i){
4821 assert(i <= nrows_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin()");
4822 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
4823 return &array_[row_start];
4824}
4825
4826template<typename T>
4827T* CSRArray<T>::end(size_t i){
4828 assert(i <= nrows_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.end()");
4829 size_t row_start = start_index_[i+1];
4830 return &array_[row_start];
4831}
4832
4833template<typename T>
4834size_t CSRArray<T>::begin_index(size_t i){
4835 assert(i <= nrows_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin_index()");
4836 return start_index_[i];
4837}
4838
4839template<typename T>
4840size_t CSRArray<T>::end_index(size_t i){
4841 assert(i <= nrows_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin_index()");
4842 return start_index_[i+1];
4843}
4844
4845template<typename T>
4846size_t CSRArray<T>::nnz(){
4847 return nnz_;
4848}
4849
4850template<typename T>
4851size_t CSRArray<T>::nnz(size_t i){
4852 assert(i <= nrows_ && "Index i out of bounds in CSRArray.stride()");
4853 return start_index_[i+1] - start_index_[i];
4854}
4855
4856
4857template<typename T>
4858T& CSRArray<T>::get_val_flat(size_t k){
4859 assert(k < nnz_ && "Index k is out of bounds in CSRArray.get_val_flat()");
4860 return array_[k];
4861}
4862
4863template<typename T>
4864size_t CSRArray<T>::get_col_flat(size_t k){
4865 assert(k < nnz_f && "Index k is out of bounds in CSRArray.get_col_lat()");
4866 return column_index_[k];
4867}
4868
4869
4870template<typename T>
4871size_t CSRArray<T>::flat_index(size_t i, size_t j){
4872 size_t k;
4873 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
4874 size_t row_end = start_index_[i+1];
4875 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
4876 if(column_index_[row_start+k] == j){
4877 return row_start+k;
4878 }
4879 }
4880 return nnz_;
4881}
4882
4883// Assumes that data, col_ptrs, and row_ptrs
4884// have been allocated size already before this call
4885// Returns the data in this csr format but as represented as the appropriatte vectors
4886// for a csc format
4887template<typename T>
4888int CSRArray<T>::toCSC(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs ){
4889 int nnz_cols[dim2_ + 1];
4890 int col_counts[dim2_];
4891 int i = 0;
4892 // How many elements are each column
4893 for(i =0 ; i < dim2_; i++){
4894 nnz_cols[i] = 0;
4895 col_counts[i] = 0;
4896 }
4897 nnz_cols[dim2_] = 0;
4898 col_ptrs(0) = 0;
4899 for(i =0; i < nnz_; i++){
4900 nnz_cols[column_index_[i] + 1] += 1;
4901 }
4902 // What we actually care about is how many elements are
4903 // in all the columns preceeding this column.
4904 for(i = 1; i <= dim2_; i++){
4905 nnz_cols[i] = nnz_cols[i-1] + nnz_cols[i];
4906 col_ptrs(i) = nnz_cols[i];
4907 }
4908 size_t row = 1;
4909 // if b is at A(i,j) stored in csr format
4910 // it needs to go where the where the ith column starts
4911 // + how many things we have put in the "window"
4912 // we allocated for this column already
4913 // For row we simply keep track of what row we are currently in
4914 // as we scan through the 1d array of data.
4915 for(i = 0; i < nnz_; i++){
4916 if(i >= start_index_[row]){
4917 row++;
4918 }
4919 int idx = nnz_cols[column_index_[i]] + col_counts[column_index_[i]];
4920 col_counts[column_index_[i]] += 1;
4921 data(idx) = array_[i];
4922 row_ptrs(idx) = row - 1;
4923 }
4924 // I return an int because I thought I might need to return an error code
4925 // Not sure that is true
4926 return 0;
4927}
4928
4929template <typename T>
4930CSRArray<T>::~CSRArray() {}
4931
4932// EndCSRArrayy
4933
4934// 16 CSCArray
4935template <typename T>
4936class CSCArray
4937{
4938private: // What ought to be private ?
4939 size_t dim1_, dim2_;
4940 size_t nnz_;
4941 std::shared_ptr <T []> array_;
4942 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> start_index_;
4943 std::shared_ptr <size_t[]> row_index_;
4944
4945 public:
4946
4951 CSCArray();
4952
4962 CSCArray(CArray<T> array, CArray<size_t> row_index, CArray<size_t> start_index, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
4963
4971 T &operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4972
4979 CSCArray &operator=(const CSCArray &temp);
4980
4981 T *pointer() const;
4982
4989 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
4990
4998 T &value(size_t i, size_t j) const;
4999
5005 size_t *get_starts() const;
5006
5012 size_t dim1() const;
5013
5019 size_t dim2() const;
5020
5027 T *begin(size_t i);
5028
5035 T *end(size_t i);
5036
5037 // iterator for the raw data at row i
5038 // i.e. return the index each element is the index in the 1 array
5039 // This as the use of providing a reasonable way to get the column
5040 // index and data value in the case you need both
5041 size_t begin_index(size_t i);
5042 size_t end_index (size_t i);
5043
5050 size_t nnz(size_t i);
5056 size_t nnz();
5057
5058 // Use the index into the 1d array to get what value is stored there and what is the corresponding row
5059 T &get_val_flat(size_t k);
5060 size_t get_row_flat(size_t k);
5061 // reverse map function from A(i,j) to what element of data/col_pt_ it corersponds to
5062 int flat_index(size_t i, size_t j);
5063 // Convertor
5064 int toCSR(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs);
5065 void to_dense(FArray<T> &A);
5066 // destructor
5067 ~CSCArray();
5068};
5069
5070template <typename T>
5071CSCArray<T>::CSCArray(CArray<T> array, CArray<size_t> row_index, CArray<size_t> start_index, size_t dim1, size_t dim2 ){
5072 dim1_ = dim1;
5073 dim2_ = dim2;
5074 size_t nnz = array.size();
5075 start_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[dim2_ + 1]);
5076 array_ = std::shared_ptr<T []> (new T[nnz+1]);
5077 row_index_ = std::shared_ptr<size_t []> (new size_t[nnz]);
5078 size_t i ;
5079 for(i = 0; i < nnz; i++){
5080 array_[i] = array(i);
5081 row_index_[i] = row_index(i);
5082 }
5083 for(i = 0; i < dim2_ + 1; i++){
5084 start_index_[i] = start_index(i);
5085 }
5086 nnz_ = nnz;
5087}
5088
5089
5090template<typename T>
5091T& CSCArray<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
5092 size_t col_start = start_index_[j];
5093 size_t col_end = start_index_[j + 1];
5094 size_t k;
5095 for(k =0; k < col_end - col_start;k++){
5096 if(row_index_[col_start + k] == i){
5097 return array_[col_start + k];
5098 }
5099 }
5100 array_[nnz_] = (T) NULL;
5101 return array_[nnz_];
5102}
5103
5104template<typename T>
5105T* CSCArray<T>::pointer() const {
5106 return array_.get();
5107}
5108
5109template<typename T>
5110T& CSCArray<T>::value(size_t i, size_t j) const {
5111 size_t col_start = start_index_[j];
5112 size_t col_end = start_index_[j + 1];
5113 size_t k;
5114 for(k =0; k < col_end - col_start;k++){
5115 if(row_index_[col_start + k] == i){
5116 return array_[col_start + k];
5117 }
5118 }
5119 array_[nnz_] = (T) NULL;
5120 return array_[nnz_];
5121}
5122
5123template<typename T>
5124size_t* CSCArray<T>::get_starts() const{
5125 return &start_index_[0];
5126}
5127
5128template<typename T>
5129CSCArray<T>& CSCArray<T>::operator=(const CSCArray &temp){
5130 if(this != temp) {
5131 nnz_ = temp.nnz_;
5132 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
5133 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;;
5134
5135 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
5136 row_index_ = temp.row_row_index_;
5137 array_ = temp.array_;
5138 }
5139 return *this;
5140}
5141
5142template<typename T>
5143size_t CSCArray<T>::stride(size_t i) const{
5144 assert(i < dim2_ && "i is out of bounds in CSCArray.stride()");
5145 return start_index_[i+1] - start_index_[i];
5146}
5147
5148
5149template<typename T>
5150void CSCArray<T>::to_dense(FArray<T>& A){
5151 size_t i,j;
5152 for (j = 0; j < dim2_; j++)
5153 {
5154 for(i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
5155 A(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
5156 }
5157 }
5158}
5159
5160template<typename T>
5161size_t CSCArray<T>::dim1() const {
5162 return dim1_;
5163}
5164
5165template<typename T>
5166size_t CSCArray<T>::dim2() const{
5167 return dim2_;
5168}
5169
5170template<typename T>
5171T* CSCArray<T>::begin(size_t i){
5172 assert(i <= dim2_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.begin()");
5173 size_t col_start = start_index_[i];
5174 return &array_[col_start];
5175}
5176
5177template<typename T>
5178T* CSCArray<T>::end(size_t i){
5179 assert(i <= dim2s_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.endt()");
5180 size_t col_start = start_index_[i+1];
5181 return &array_[col_start];
5182}
5183
5184template<typename T>
5185size_t CSCArray<T>::begin_index(size_t i){
5186 assert(i <= dim2s_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.begin_index()");
5187 return start_index_[i];
5188}
5189
5190template<typename T>
5191size_t CSCArray<T>::end_index(size_t i){
5192 assert(i <= dim2_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.end_index()");
5193 return start_index_[i + 1];
5194}
5195
5196template<typename T>
5197size_t CSCArray<T>::nnz(){
5198 return nnz_;
5199}
5200
5201template<typename T>
5202size_t CSCArray<T>::nnz(size_t i){
5203 return start_index_[i+1] - start_index_[i];
5204}
5205
5206template<typename T>
5207T& CSCArray<T>::get_val_flat(size_t k){
5208 return array_[k];
5209}
5210
5211template<typename T>
5212size_t CSCArray<T>::get_row_flat(size_t k){
5213 return row_index_[k];
5214}
5215
5216template<typename T>
5217int CSCArray<T>::flat_index(size_t i, size_t j){
5218 size_t col_start = start_index_[j];
5219 size_t col_end = start_index_[j+1];
5220 size_t k;
5221 for (k = 0; k < col_end - col_start; k++)
5222 {
5223 if(row_index_[col_start + k] == i){
5224 return col_start + k;
5225 }
5226 }
5227 return -1;
5228}
5229
5230// Assumes that data, col_ptrs, and row_ptrs
5231// have been allocated size already before this call
5232// Returns the data in this csr format but as represented as the appropriatte vectors
5233// for a csc format
5234template<typename T>
5235int CSCArray<T>::toCSR(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs ){
5236 int nnz_rows[dim1_ + 1];
5237 int row_counts[dim1_];
5238 int i = 0;
5239 // How many elements are each column
5240 for(i =0 ; i < dim1_; i++){
5241 nnz_rows[i] = 0;
5242 row_counts[i] = 0;
5243 }
5244 nnz_rows[dim1_] = 0;
5245 row_ptrs(i) = 0 ;
5246 for(i =0; i < nnz_; i++){
5247 nnz_rows[row_index_[i] + 1] += 1;
5248 }
5249 // What we actually care about is how many elements are
5250 // in all the columns preceeding this column.
5251 for(i = 1; i < dim1_; i++){
5252 nnz_rows[i] = nnz_rows[i-1] + nnz_rows[i];
5253 row_ptrs(i) = nnz_rows[i];
5254 }
5255 size_t col = 1;
5256 // if b is at A(i,j) stored in csr format
5257 // it needs to go where the where the ith column starts
5258 // + how many things we have put in the "window"
5259 // we allocated for this column already
5260 // For row we simply keep track of what row we are currently in
5261 // as we scan through the 1d array of data.
5262 for(i = 0; i < nnz_; i++){
5263 if(i >= start_index_[col]){
5264 col++;
5265 }
5266 int idx = nnz_rows[row_index_[i]] + row_counts[row_index_[i]];
5267 row_counts[row_index_[i]] += 1;
5268 data(idx) = array_[i];
5269 col_ptrs(idx) = col - 1;
5270 }
5271 // I return an int because I thought I might need to return an error code
5272 // Not sure that is true
5273 return 0;
5274}
5275
5276template <typename T>
5277CSCArray<T>::~CSCArray() {}
5278
5279// End of CSCArray
5280//=======================================================================
5281// end of standard MATAR data-types
5282//========================================================================
5283
5290// #ifdef HAVE_KOKKOS
5291template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
5292class FArrayKokkos {
5293
5294 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
5295
5296private:
5297 size_t dims_[7];
5298 size_t order_;
5299 size_t length_;
5300 TArray1D this_array_;
5301
5302public:
5303
5307 FArrayKokkos();
5308
5315 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5316
5324 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5325
5334 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5335
5336 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5337 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5338
5339 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5340 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5341
5342 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t sone_dim2, size_t dim2,
5343 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5344
5345 FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t sone_dim2, size_t dim2,
5346 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
5347 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
5348
5349 // Overload operator() to acces data
5350 // from 1D to 6D
5351
5352 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5353 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
5354
5355 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5356 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
5357
5358 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5359 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
5360
5361 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5362 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5363 size_t l) const;
5364
5365 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5366 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5367 size_t l, size_t m) const;
5368
5369 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5370 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5371 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n) const;
5372
5373 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5374 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5375 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const;
5376
5377 // Overload = operator
5378 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5379 FArrayKokkos& operator= (const FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp);
5380
5381 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5382 size_t size() const;
5383
5384 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5385 size_t extent() const;
5386
5387 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5388 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
5389
5390 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5391 size_t order() const;
5392
5393 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5394 T* pointer() const;
5395
5396 //return kokkos view
5397 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5398 TArray1D get_kokkos_view() const;
5399
5400 // Destructor
5401 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5402 ~FArrayKokkos();
5403
5404}; //end of FArrayKokkos declarations
5405
5406// Default constructor
5407template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5408FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos() {}
5409
5410// Overloaded 1D constructor
5411template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5412FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string){
5413 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5414 dims_[0] = dim0;
5415 order_ = 1;
5416 length_ = dim0;
5417 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5418}
5419
5420// Overloaded 2D constructor
5421template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5422FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
5423
5424 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5425
5426 dims_[0] = dim0;
5427 dims_[1] = dim1;
5428 order_ = 2;
5429 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
5430 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5431}
5432
5433// Overloaded 3D constructor
5434template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5435FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5436 size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
5437
5438 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5439
5440 dims_[0] = dim0;
5441 dims_[1] = dim1;
5442 dims_[2] = dim2;
5443 order_ = 3;
5444 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
5445 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5446}
5447
5448// Overloaded 4D constructor
5449template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5450FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5451 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
5452
5453 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5454
5455 dims_[0] = dim0;
5456 dims_[1] = dim1;
5457 dims_[2] = dim2;
5458 dims_[3] = dim3;
5459 order_ = 4;
5460 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
5461 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5462}
5463
5464// Overloaded 5D constructor
5465template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5466FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5467 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
5468 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
5469
5470 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5471
5472 dims_[0] = dim0;
5473 dims_[1] = dim1;
5474 dims_[2] = dim2;
5475 dims_[3] = dim3;
5476 dims_[4] = dim4;
5477 order_ = 5;
5478 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
5479 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5480}
5481
5482// Overloaded 6D constructor
5483template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5484FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5485 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
5486 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
5487
5488 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5489
5490 dims_[0] = dim0;
5491 dims_[1] = dim1;
5492 dims_[2] = dim2;
5493 dims_[3] = dim3;
5494 dims_[4] = dim4;
5495 dims_[5] = dim5;
5496 order_ = 6;
5497 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
5498 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5499}
5500
5501// Overloaded 7D constructor
5502template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5503FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5504 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
5505 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
5506 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
5507
5508 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5509
5510 dims_[0] = dim0;
5511 dims_[1] = dim1;
5512 dims_[2] = dim2;
5513 dims_[3] = dim3;
5514 dims_[4] = dim4;
5515 dims_[5] = dim5;
5516 dims_[6] = dim6;
5517 order_ = 7;
5518 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
5519 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
5520}
5521
5522// Definitions of overload operator()
5523// for 1D to 7D
5524// Note: the indices for array all start at 0
5525
5526// 1D
5527template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5528KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5529T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()( size_t i) const {
5530 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 1D!");
5531 assert( i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 1D!");
5532 return this_array_(i);
5533}
5534
5535// 2D
5536template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5537KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5538T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
5539 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 2D!");
5540 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 2D!");
5541 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 2D!");
5542 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0]));
5543}
5544
5545// 3D
5546template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5547KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5548T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
5549 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 3D!");
5550 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 3D!");
5551 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 3D!");
5552 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 3D!");
5553 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
5554 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
5555}
5556
5557// 4D
5558template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5559KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5560T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
5561 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 4D!");
5562 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 4D!");
5563 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 4D!");
5564 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 4D!");
5565 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 4D!");
5566 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
5567 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5568 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
5569}
5570
5571// 5D
5572template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5573KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5574T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
5575 size_t m) const {
5576 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5577 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5578 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5579 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5580 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5581 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 5D!");
5582 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
5583 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5584 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5585 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
5586}
5587
5588// 6D
5589template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5590KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5591T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
5592 size_t m, size_t n) const {
5593 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5594 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5595 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5596 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5597 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5598 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5599 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 6D!");
5600 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
5601 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5602 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5603 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
5604 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4]));
5605}
5606
5607// 7D
5608template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5609KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5610T& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
5611 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
5612 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5613 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5614 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5615 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5616 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5617 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5618 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5619 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in FArrayKokkos 7D!");
5620 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
5621 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5622 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5623 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
5624 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
5625 + (o * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5]));
5626}
5627
5628// Overload = operator
5629// for object assingment THIS = FArrayKokkos<> TEMP(n,m,,,,)
5630template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5631KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5632FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& temp) {
5633 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
5634
5635 if (this != &temp) {
5636 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
5637 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
5638 } // end for
5639
5640 order_ = temp.order_;
5641 length_ = temp.length_;
5642 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
5643 }
5644 return *this;
5645}
5646
5647template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5648KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5649size_t FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
5650 return length_;
5651}
5652
5653template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5654KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5655size_t FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
5656 return length_;
5657}
5658
5659template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5660KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5661size_t FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
5662 assert(i < order_ && "FArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
5663 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to FArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
5664 return dims_[i];
5665}
5666
5667template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5668KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5669size_t FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
5670 return order_;
5671}
5672
5673template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5674KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5675T* FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::pointer() const {
5676 return this_array_.data();
5677}
5678
5679//return the stored Kokkos view
5680template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5681KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5682Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() const {
5683 return this_array_;
5684}
5685
5686// Destructor
5687template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
5688KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5689FArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~FArrayKokkos() {}
5690
5692// End of FArrayKokkos
5694
5698template <typename T>
5699class ViewFArrayKokkos {
5700
5701private:
5702 size_t dims_[7];
5703 size_t order_;
5704 size_t length_;
5705 T* this_array_;
5706
5707public:
5708 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5709 ViewFArrayKokkos();
5710
5711 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5712 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0);
5713
5714 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5715 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1);
5716
5717 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5718 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
5719
5720 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5721 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5722 size_t dim3);
5723
5724 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5725 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5726 size_t dim3, size_t dim4);
5727
5728 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5729 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5730 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
5731
5732 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5733 ViewFArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
5734 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6);
5735
5736 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5737 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
5738
5739 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5740 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
5741
5742 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5743 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
5744
5745 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5746 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5747 size_t l) const;
5748
5749 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5750 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5751 size_t l, size_t m) const;
5752
5753 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5754 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5755 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n) const;
5756
5757 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5758 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5759 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const;
5760
5761
5762 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5763 size_t size() const;
5764
5765 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5766 size_t extent() const;
5767
5768 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5769 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
5770
5771 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5772 size_t order() const;
5773
5774 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5775 T* pointer() const;
5776
5777 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5778 ~ViewFArrayKokkos();
5779
5780}; // End of ViewFArrayKokkos declarations
5781
5782// Default constructor
5783template <typename T>
5784KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5785ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos() {}
5786
5787// Overloaded 1D constructor
5788template <typename T>
5789KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5790ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0) {
5791 dims_[0] = dim0;
5792 order_ = 1;
5793 length_ = dim0;
5794 this_array_ = some_array;
5795}
5796
5797// Overloaded 2D constructor
5798template <typename T>
5799KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5800ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1) {
5801 dims_[0] = dim0;
5802 dims_[1] = dim1;
5803 order_ = 2;
5804 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
5805 this_array_ = some_array;
5806}
5807
5808// Overloaded 3D constructor
5809template <typename T>
5810KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5811ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5812 size_t dim2) {
5813 dims_[0] = dim0;
5814 dims_[1] = dim1;
5815 dims_[2] = dim2;
5816 order_ = 3;
5817 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
5818 this_array_ = some_array;
5819}
5820
5821// Overloaded 4D constructor
5822template <typename T>
5823KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5824ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5825 size_t dim2, size_t dim3) {
5826 dims_[0] = dim0;
5827 dims_[1] = dim1;
5828 dims_[2] = dim2;
5829 dims_[3] = dim3;
5830 order_ = 4;
5831 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
5832 this_array_ = some_array;
5833}
5834
5835// Overloaded 5D constructor
5836template <typename T>
5837KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5838ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5839 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4) {
5840 dims_[0] = dim0;
5841 dims_[1] = dim1;
5842 dims_[2] = dim2;
5843 dims_[3] = dim3;
5844 dims_[4] = dim4;
5845 order_ = 5;
5846 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
5847 this_array_ = some_array;
5848}
5849
5850// Overloaded 6D constructor
5851template <typename T>
5852KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5853ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5854 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
5855 size_t dim5) {
5856 dims_[0] = dim0;
5857 dims_[1] = dim1;
5858 dims_[2] = dim2;
5859 dims_[3] = dim3;
5860 dims_[4] = dim4;
