5861 dims_[5] = dim5;
5862 order_ = 6;
5863 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
5864 this_array_ = some_array;
5865}
5866
5867// Overloaded 7D constructor
5868template <typename T>
5869KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5870ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::ViewFArrayKokkos(T *some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
5871 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
5872 size_t dim5, size_t dim6) {
5873 dims_[0] = dim0;
5874 dims_[1] = dim1;
5875 dims_[2] = dim2;
5876 dims_[3] = dim3;
5877 dims_[4] = dim4;
5878 dims_[5] = dim5;
5879 dims_[6] = dim6;
5880 order_ = 7;
5881 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
5882 this_array_ = some_array;
5883}
5884
5885// Overloaded operator() for 1D array access
5886template <typename T>
5887KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5888T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i) const {
5889 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 1D!");
5890 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 1D!");
5891 return this_array_[i];
5892}
5893
5894//2D
5895template <typename T>
5896KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5897T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
5898 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
5899 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
5900 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
5901 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])];
5902}
5903
5904//3D
5905template <typename T>
5906KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5907T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
5908 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
5909 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
5910 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
5911 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
5912 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])
5913 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])];
5914}
5915
5916//4D
5917template <typename T>
5918KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5919T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5920 size_t l) const {
5921 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
5922 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
5923 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
5924 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
5925 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
5926 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])
5927 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5928 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] *dims_[2])];
5929}
5930
5931//5D
5932template <typename T>
5933KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5934T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5935 size_t l, size_t m) const {
5936 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5937 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5938 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5939 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5940 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5941 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
5942 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])
5943 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5944 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5945 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])];
5946}
5947
5948//6D
5949template <typename T>
5950KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5951T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5952 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n) const {
5953 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5954 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5955 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5956 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5957 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5958 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5959 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
5960 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])
5961 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5962 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5963 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
5964 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])];
5965}
5966
5967//7D
5968template <typename T>
5969KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5970T& ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
5971 size_t l, size_t m, size_t n,
5972 size_t o) const {
5973 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5974 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5975 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5976 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5977 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5978 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5979 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5980 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
5981 return this_array_[i + (j * dims_[0])
5982 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
5983 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
5984 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
5985 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
5986 + (o * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5])];
5987}
5988
5989template <typename T>
5990KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5991size_t ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::size() const {
5992 return length_;
5993}
5994
5995template <typename T>
5996KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
5997size_t ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::extent() const {
5998 return length_;
5999}
6000
6001template <typename T>
6002KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6003size_t ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
6004 assert(i < order_ && "ViewFArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
6005 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewFArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
6006 return dims_[i];
6007}
6008
6009template <typename T>
6010KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6011size_t ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::order() const {
6012 return order_;
6013}
6014
6015template <typename T>
6016KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6017T* ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::pointer() const {
6018 return this_array_;
6019}
6020
6021template <typename T>
6022KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6023ViewFArrayKokkos<T>::~ViewFArrayKokkos() {}
6024
6026// End of ViewFArrayKokkos
6028
6032template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
6033class FMatrixKokkos {
6034
6035 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
6036
6037private:
6038
6039 size_t dims_[7];
6040 size_t order_;
6041 size_t length_;
6042 TArray1D this_matrix_;
6043
6044public:
6045 FMatrixKokkos();
6046
6047 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6048
6049 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6050
6051 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6052
6053 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6054 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6055
6056 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6057 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6058
6059 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6060 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6061
6062 FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6063 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
6064 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
6065
6066 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6067 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
6068
6069 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6070 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
6071
6072 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6073 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
6074
6075 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6076 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
6077
6078 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6079 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
6080
6081 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6082 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6083 size_t n) const;
6084
6085 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6086 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6087 size_t n, size_t o) const;
6088
6089 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6090 FMatrixKokkos& operator=(const FMatrixKokkos& temp);
6091
6092 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6093 size_t size() const;
6094
6095 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6096 size_t extent() const;
6097
6098 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6099 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
6100
6101 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6102 size_t order() const;
6103
6104 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6105 T* pointer() const;
6106
6107 //return kokkos view
6108 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6109 TArray1D get_kokkos_view() const;
6110
6111 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6112 ~FMatrixKokkos();
6113
6114}; // End of FMatrixKokkos
6115
6116// Default constructor
6117template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6118FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos() {}
6119
6120// Overloaded 1D constructor
6121template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6122FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
6123 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6124
6125 dims_[0] = dim1;
6126 order_ = 1;
6127 length_ = dim1;
6128 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6129}
6130
6131// Overloaded 2D constructor
6132template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6133FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
6134 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6135
6136 dims_[0] = dim1;
6137 dims_[1] = dim2;
6138 order_ = 2;
6139 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
6140 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6141}
6142
6143// Overloaded 3D constructor
6144template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6145FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6146 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
6147 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6148
6149 dims_[0] = dim1;
6150 dims_[1] = dim2;
6151 dims_[2] = dim3;
6152 order_ = 3;
6153 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
6154 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6155}
6156
6157// Overloaded 4D constructor
6158template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6159FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6160 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
6161 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6162
6163 dims_[0] = dim1;
6164 dims_[1] = dim2;
6165 dims_[2] = dim3;
6166 dims_[3] = dim4;
6167 order_ = 4;
6168 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
6169 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6170}
6171
6172// Overloaded 5D constructor
6173template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6174FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6175 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
6176 size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
6177 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6178
6179 dims_[0] = dim1;
6180 dims_[1] = dim2;
6181 dims_[2] = dim3;
6182 dims_[3] = dim4;
6183 dims_[4] = dim5;
6184 order_ = 5;
6185 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
6186 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6187}
6188
6189// Overloaded 5D constructor
6190template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6191FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6192 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
6193 size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
6194 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6195
6196 dims_[0] = dim1;
6197 dims_[1] = dim2;
6198 dims_[2] = dim3;
6199 dims_[3] = dim4;
6200 dims_[4] = dim5;
6201 dims_[5] = dim6;
6202 order_ = 6;
6203 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
6204 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6205}
6206
6207// Overloaded 5D constructor
6208template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6209FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::FMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6210 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
6211 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
6212 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string) {
6213 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
6214
6215 dims_[0] = dim1;
6216 dims_[1] = dim2;
6217 dims_[2] = dim3;
6218 dims_[3] = dim4;
6219 dims_[4] = dim5;
6220 dims_[5] = dim6;
6221 dims_[6] = dim7;
6222 order_ = 7;
6223 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
6224 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6225}
6226
6227template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6228KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6229T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
6230 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 1D!");
6231 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 1D!");
6232 return this_matrix_((i - 1));
6233}
6234
6235template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6236KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6237T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
6238 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 2D!");
6239 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 2D!");
6240 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 2D!");
6241 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0]));
6242}
6243
6244template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6245KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6246T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
6247 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 3D!");
6248 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 3D!");
6249 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 3D!");
6250 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 3D!");
6251 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6252 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
6253}
6254
6255template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6256KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6257T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
6258 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6259 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 4D!");
6260 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 4D!");
6261 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 4D!");
6262 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 4D!");
6263 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6264 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6265 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
6266}
6267
6268template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6269KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6270T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6271 size_t m) const {
6272 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6273 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 5D!");
6274 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 5D!");
6275 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 5D!");
6276 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 5D!");
6277 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 5D!");
6278 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6279 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6280 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6281 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
6282}
6283
6284template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6285KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6286T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6287 size_t m, size_t n) const {
6288 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6289 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6290 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6291 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6292 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6293 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6294 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 6D!");
6295 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6296 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6297 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6298 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
6299 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])];
6300}
6301
6302template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6303KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6304T& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6305 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
6306 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in FMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6307 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6308 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6309 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6310 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6311 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6312 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6313 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in FMatrixKokkos in 7D!");
6314 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6315 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6316 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6317 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
6318 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
6319 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5])];
6320}
6321
6322template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6323KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6324FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator=(const FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& temp) {
6325 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
6326 if (this != &temp) {
6327 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
6328 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
6329 } // end for
6330
6331 order_ = temp.order_;
6332 length_ = temp.length_;
6333 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
6334 }
6335 return *this;
6336}
6337
6338
6339
6340template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6341KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6342size_t FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
6343 return length_;
6344}
6345
6346template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6347KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6348size_t FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
6349 return length_;
6350}
6351
6352template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6353KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6354size_t FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
6355 i--;
6356 assert(i < order_ && "FMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
6357 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to FMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
6358 return dims_[i];
6359}
6360
6361template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6362KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6363size_t FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
6364 return order_;
6365}
6366
6367template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6368KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6369T* FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::pointer() const {
6370 return this_matrix_.data();
6371}
6372
6373//return the stored Kokkos view
6374template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6375KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6376Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() const {
6377 return this_matrix_;
6378}
6379
6380template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6381KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6382FMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~FMatrixKokkos() {}
6383
6385// End of FMatrixKokkos
6387
6391template <typename T>
6392class ViewFMatrixKokkos {
6393
6394private:
6395
6396 size_t dims_[7];
6397 size_t order_;
6398 size_t length_;
6399 T* this_matrix_;
6400
6401public:
6402
6403 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6404 ViewFMatrixKokkos();
6405
6406 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6407 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1);
6408
6409 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6410 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
6411
6412 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6413 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6414 size_t dim3);
6415
6416 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6417 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6418 size_t dim3, size_t dim4);
6419
6420 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6421 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6422 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
6423
6424 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6425 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6426 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6427 size_t dim6);
6428
6429 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6430 ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6431 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6432 size_t dim6, size_t dim7);
6433
6434 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6435 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
6436
6437 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6438 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
6439
6440 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6441 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
6442
6443 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6444 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
6445
6446 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6447 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
6448
6449 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6450 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6451 size_t n) const;
6452
6453 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6454 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6455 size_t n, size_t o) const;
6456
6457 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6458 size_t size() const;
6459
6460 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6461 size_t extent() const;
6462
6463 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6464 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
6465
6466 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6467 size_t order() const;
6468
6469 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6470 T* pointer() const;
6471
6472 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6473 ~ViewFMatrixKokkos();
6474
6475}; // end of ViewFMatrixKokkos
6476
6477// Default constructor
6478template <typename T>
6479KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6480ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos() {}
6481
6482// Overloaded 1D constructor
6483template <typename T>
6484KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6485ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1) {
6486 dims_[0] = dim1;
6487 order_ = 1;
6488 length_ = dim1;
6489 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6490}
6491
6492// Overloaded 2D constructor
6493template <typename T>
6494KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6495ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6496 size_t dim2) {
6497 dims_[0] = dim1;
6498 dims_[1] = dim2;
6499 order_ = 2;
6500 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
6501 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6502}
6503
6504// Overloaded 3D constructor
6505template <typename T>
6506KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6507ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6508 size_t dim2, size_t dim3) {
6509 dims_[0] = dim1;
6510 dims_[1] = dim2;
6511 dims_[2] = dim3;
6512 order_ = 3;
6513 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
6514 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6515}
6516
6517// Overloaded 4D constructor
6518template <typename T>
6519KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6520ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6521 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6522 size_t dim4) {
6523 dims_[0] = dim1;
6524 dims_[1] = dim2;
6525 dims_[2] = dim3;
6526 dims_[3] = dim4;
6527 order_ = 4;
6528 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
6529 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6530}
6531
6532// Overloaded 5D constructor
6533template <typename T>
6534KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6535ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6536 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6537 size_t dim4, size_t dim5) {
6538 dims_[0] = dim1;
6539 dims_[1] = dim2;
6540 dims_[2] = dim3;
6541 dims_[3] = dim4;
6542 dims_[4] = dim5;
6543 order_ = 5;
6544 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
6545 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6546}
6547
6548// Overloaded 6D constructor
6549template <typename T>
6550KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6551ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6552 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6553 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6554 size_t dim6) {
6555 dims_[0] = dim1;
6556 dims_[1] = dim2;
6557 dims_[2] = dim3;
6558 dims_[3] = dim4;
6559 dims_[4] = dim5;
6560 dims_[5] = dim6;
6561 order_ = 6;
6562 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
6563 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6564}
6565
6566// Overloaded 6D constructor
6567template <typename T>
6568KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6569ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewFMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
6570 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6571 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6572 size_t dim6, size_t dim7) {
6573 dims_[0] = dim1;
6574 dims_[1] = dim2;
6575 dims_[2] = dim3;
6576 dims_[3] = dim4;
6577 dims_[4] = dim5;
6578 dims_[5] = dim6;
6579 dims_[6] = dim7;
6580 order_ = 7;
6581 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
6582 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
6583}
6584
6585
6586template <typename T>
6587KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6588T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i) const {
6589 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
6590 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
6591 return this_matrix_[(i - 1)];
6592}
6593
6594template <typename T>
6595KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6596T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
6597 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
6598 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
6599 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
6600 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])];
6601}
6602
6603template <typename T>
6604KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6605T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const
6606{
6607 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
6608 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
6609 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
6610 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
6611
6612 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6613 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])];
6614}
6615
6616template <typename T>
6617KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6618T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
6619 size_t l) const {
6620 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6621 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6622 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6623 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6624 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
6625 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6626 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6627 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])];
6628}
6629
6630template <typename T>
6631KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6632T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6633 size_t m) const {
6634 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6635 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6636 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6637 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6638 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6639 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
6640 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6641 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6642 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6643 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])];
6644}
6645
6646template <typename T>
6647KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6648T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6649 size_t m, size_t n) const
6650{
6651 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6652 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6653 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6654 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6655 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6656 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6657 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
6658 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6659 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6660 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6661 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
6662 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])];
6663}
6664
6665template <typename T>
6666KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6667T& ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6668 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const
6669{
6670 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6671 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6672 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6673 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6674 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6675 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6676 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6677 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
6678 return this_matrix_[(i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
6679 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6680 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6681 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
6682 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
6683 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5])];
6684}
6685
6686template <typename T>
6687KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6688size_t ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::size() const {
6689 return length_;
6690}
6691
6692template <typename T>
6693KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6694size_t ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::extent() const {
6695 return length_;
6696}
6697
6698template <typename T>
6699KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6700size_t ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
6701 i--;
6702 assert(i < order_ && "ViewFMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
6703 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewFMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
6704 return dims_[i];
6705}
6706
6707template <typename T>
6708KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6709size_t ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::order() const {
6710 return order_;
6711}
6712
6713template <typename T>
6714KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6715T* ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::pointer() const {
6716 return this_matrix_;
6717}
6718
6719template <typename T>
6720KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6721ViewFMatrixKokkos<T>::~ViewFMatrixKokkos() {}
6722
6724// End of ViewFMatrixKokkos
6726
6727
6729// DFArrayKokkos: Dual type for managing data on both CPU and GPU.
6731template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
6732class DFArrayKokkos {
6733
6734 // this is manage
6735 using TArray1D = Kokkos::DualView<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
6736
6737private:
6738 size_t dims_[7];
6739 size_t length_;
6740 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
6741 TArray1D this_array_;
6742
6743public:
6744 DFArrayKokkos();
6745
6746 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6747
6748 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6749
6750 DFArrayKokkos (size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6751
6752 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6753 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6754
6755 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6756 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6757
6758 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6759 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6760
6761 DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
6762 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6763 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
6764
6765 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6766 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
6767
6768 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6769 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
6770
6771 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6772 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
6773
6774 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6775 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
6776
6777 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6778 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
6779
6780 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6781 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6782 size_t n) const;
6783
6784 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6785 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
6786 size_t n, size_t o) const;
6787
6788 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6789 DFArrayKokkos& operator=(const DFArrayKokkos& temp);
6790
6791 // GPU Method
6792 // Method that returns size
6793 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6794 size_t size() const;
6795
6796 // Host Method
6797 // Method that returns size
6798 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6799 size_t extent() const;
6800
6801 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6802 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
6803
6804 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6805 size_t order() const;
6806
6807 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos DualView
6808 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6809 T* device_pointer() const;
6810
6811 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos DualView
6812 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6813 T* host_pointer() const;
6814
6815 // Data member to access host view
6816 ViewFArray <T> host;
6817
6818 // Method that update host view
6819 void update_host();
6820
6821 // Method that update device view
6822 void update_device();
6823
6824 // Deconstructor
6825 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6826 ~DFArrayKokkos ();
6827
6828}; // End of DFArrayKokkos declarations
6829
6830// Default constructor
6831template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6832DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos() {}
6833
6834// Overloaded 1D constructor
6835template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6836DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string) {
6837
6838 dims_[0] = dim0;
6839 order_ = 1;
6840 length_ = dim0;
6841 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6842 // Create host ViewFArray
6843 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0);
6844}
6845
6846// Overloaded 2D constructor
6847template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6848DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
6849
6850 dims_[0] = dim0;
6851 dims_[1] = dim1;
6852 order_ = 2;
6853 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
6854 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6855 // Create host ViewFArray
6856 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1);
6857}
6858
6859template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6860DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
6861 size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
6862
6863 dims_[0] = dim0;
6864 dims_[1] = dim1;
6865 dims_[2] = dim2;
6866 order_ = 3;
6867 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
6868 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6869 // Create host ViewFArray
6870 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2);
6871}
6872
6873template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6874DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
6875 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
6876
6877 dims_[0] = dim0;
6878 dims_[1] = dim1;
6879 dims_[2] = dim2;
6880 dims_[3] = dim3;
6881 order_ = 4;
6882 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
6883 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6884 // Create host ViewFArray
6885 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3);
6886}
6887
6888template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6889DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
6890 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6891 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
6892
6893 dims_[0] = dim0;
6894 dims_[1] = dim1;
6895 dims_[2] = dim2;
6896 dims_[3] = dim3;
6897 dims_[4] = dim4;
6898 order_ = 5;
6899 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
6900 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6901 // Create host ViewFArray
6902 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
6903}
6904
6905template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6906DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
6907 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6908 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
6909
6910 dims_[0] = dim0;
6911 dims_[1] = dim1;
6912 dims_[2] = dim2;
6913 dims_[3] = dim3;
6914 dims_[4] = dim4;
6915 dims_[5] = dim5;
6916 order_ = 6;
6917 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
6918 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6919 // Create host ViewFArray
6920 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
6921}
6922
6923template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6924DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
6925 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
6926 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
6927 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
6928
6929 dims_[0] = dim0;
6930 dims_[1] = dim1;
6931 dims_[2] = dim2;
6932 dims_[3] = dim3;
6933 dims_[4] = dim4;
6934 dims_[5] = dim5;
6935 dims_[6] = dim6;
6936 order_ = 7;
6937 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
6938 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
6939 // Create host ViewFArray
6940 host = ViewFArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
6941}
6942
6943template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6944KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6945T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
6946 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 1D!");
6947 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 1D!");
6948 return this_array_.d_view(i);
6949}
6950
6951template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6952KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6953T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
6954 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 2D!");
6955 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 2D!");
6956 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 2D!");
6957 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0]));
6958}
6959
6960template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6961KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6962T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
6963 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 3D!");
6964 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 3D!");
6965 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 3D!");
6966 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 3D!");
6967 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0])
6968 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
6969}
6970
6971template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6972KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6973T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
6974 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 4D!");
6975 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 4D!");
6976 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 4D!");
6977 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 4D!");
6978 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 4D!");
6979 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0])
6980 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6981 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
6982}
6983
6984template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
6985KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
6986T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
6987 size_t m) const {
6988 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6989 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6990 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6991 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6992 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6993 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 5D!");
6994 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0])
6995 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
6996 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
6997 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
6998}
6999
7000template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7001KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7002T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7003 size_t m, size_t n) const {
7004 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7005 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7006 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7007 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7008 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7009 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7010 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7011 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0])
7012 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7013 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7014 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7015 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4]));
7016}
7017
7018template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7019KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7020T& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7021 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
7022 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7023 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7024 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7025 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7026 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7027 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7028 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7029 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7030 return this_array_.d_view(i + (j * dims_[0])
7031 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7032 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7033 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7034 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
7035 + (o * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5]));
7036}
7037
7038template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7039KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7040DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DFArrayKokkos& temp) {
7041
7042 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
7043 if (this != &temp) {
7044 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
7045 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
7046 } // end for
7047
7048 order_ = temp.order_;
7049 length_ = temp.length_;
7050 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
7051 host = temp.host;
7052 }
7053
7054 return *this;
7055}
7056
7057// Return size
7058template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7059KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7060size_t DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
7061 return length_;
7062}
7063
7064template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7065KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7066size_t DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
7067 return length_;
7068}
7069
7070template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7071KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7072size_t DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
7073 assert(i < order_ && "DFArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
7074 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DFArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
7075 return dims_[i];
7076}
7077
7078template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7079KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7080size_t DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
7081 return order_;
7082}
7083
7084template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7085KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7086T* DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
7087 return this_array_.d_view.data();
7088}
7089
7090template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7091KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7092T* DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
7093 return this_array_.h_view.data();
7094}
7095
7096template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7097void DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
7098
7099 this_array_.template modify<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
7100 this_array_.template sync<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
7101}
7102
7103template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7104void DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
7105
7106 this_array_.template modify<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
7107 this_array_.template sync<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
7108}
7109
7110template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7111KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7112DFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DFArrayKokkos() {}
7113// End DFArrayKokkos
7114
7115
7117// DViewFArrayKokkos: The DView means dual view of the data, where data is on both CPU and GPU.
7118//
7119// This MATAR type is for accepting a pointer to data on the CPU via the constructor and then it copies the data
7120// data to the GPU where the member functions and overloads access the data on the GPU. The corresponding
7121// FArrayKokkos type creates memory on the GPU; likewise, the viewFArrayKokkos accesses data already on the GPU.
7122// To emphasize, the data must be on the CPU prior to calling the constructor for the DView data type.
7124template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
7125class DViewFArrayKokkos {
7126
7127 // this is always unmanaged
7128 using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
7129 // this is manage
7130 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
7131
7132private:
7133 size_t dims_[7];
7134 size_t length_;
7135 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
7136 TArray1D this_array_;
7137 TArray1DHost this_array_host_;
7138 T * temp_inp_array_;
7139
7140public:
7141 DViewFArrayKokkos();
7142
7143 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0);
7144
7145 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1);
7146
7147 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
7148
7149 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7150 size_t dim3);
7151
7152 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7153 size_t dim3, size_t dim4);
7154
7155 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7156 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
7157
7158 DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7159 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
7160 size_t dim6);
7161
7162 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7163 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
7164
7165 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7166 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
7167
7168 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7169 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
7170
7171 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7172 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
7173
7174 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7175 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
7176
7177 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7178 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
7179 size_t n) const;
7180
7181 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7182 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
7183 size_t n, size_t o) const;
7184
7185 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7186 DViewFArrayKokkos& operator=(const DViewFArrayKokkos& temp);
7187
7188 // GPU Method
7189 // Method that returns size
7190 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7191 size_t size() const;
7192
7193 // Host Method
7194 // Method that returns size
7195 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7196 size_t extent() const;
7197
7198 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7199 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
7200
7201 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7202 size_t order() const;
7203
7204 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos View
7205 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7206 T* device_pointer() const;
7207
7208 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos View
7209 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7210 T* host_pointer() const;
7211
7212 // Data member to access host view
7213 ViewFArray <T> host;
7214
7215 // Method that update host view
7216 void update_host();
7217
7218 // Method that update device view
7219 void update_device();
7220
7221 // Deconstructor
7222 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7223 ~DViewFArrayKokkos ();
7224}; // End of DViewFArrayKokkos
7225
7226
7227// Default constructor
7228template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7229DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos() {}
7230
7231// Overloaded 1D constructor
7232template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7233DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0) {
7234 //using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
7235 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
7236
7237 dims_[0] = dim0;
7238 order_ = 1;
7239 length_ = dim0;
7240 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7241 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7242 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7243 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7244 // Create a device copy of that host view
7245 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7246 // Create host ViewFArray. Note: inp_array and this_array_host_.data() are the same pointer
7247 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0);
7248}
7249
7250// Overloaded 2D constructor
7251template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7252DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1) {
7253 //using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
7254 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
7255 //using TArray1Dtemp = TArray1D::HostMirror;
7256
7257 dims_[0] = dim0;
7258 dims_[1] = dim1;
7259 order_ = 2;
7260 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
7261 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7262 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7263 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7264 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7265 // Create a device copy of that host view
7266 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7267 // Create host ViewFArray
7268 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1);
7269}
7270
7271template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7272DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
7273 size_t dim2) {
7274 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
7275
7276 dims_[0] = dim0;
7277 dims_[1] = dim1;
7278 dims_[2] = dim2;
7279 order_ = 3;
7280 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
7281 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7282 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7283 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7284 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7285 // Create a device copy of that host view
7286 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7287 // Create host ViewFArray
7288 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2);
7289}
7290
7291template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7292DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
7293 size_t dim2, size_t dim3) {
7294 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
7295
7296 dims_[0] = dim0;
7297 dims_[1] = dim1;
7298 dims_[2] = dim2;
7299 dims_[3] = dim3;
7300 order_ = 4;
7301 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
7302 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7303 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7304 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7305 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7306 // Create a device copy of that host view
7307 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7308 // Create host ViewFArray
7309 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3);
7310}
7311
7312template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7313DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
7314 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7315 size_t dim4) {
7316
7317 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
7318
7319 dims_[0] = dim0;
7320 dims_[1] = dim1;
7321 dims_[2] = dim2;
7322 dims_[3] = dim3;
7323 dims_[4] = dim4;
7324 order_ = 5;
7325 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
7326 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7327 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7328 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7329 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7330 // Create a device copy of that host view
7331 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7332 // Create host ViewFArray
7333 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
7334}
7335
7336template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7337DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
7338 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7339 size_t dim4, size_t dim5) {
7340 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
7341
7342 dims_[0] = dim0;
7343 dims_[1] = dim1;
7344 dims_[2] = dim2;
7345 dims_[3] = dim3;
7346 dims_[4] = dim4;
7347 dims_[5] = dim5;
7348 order_ = 6;
7349 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
7350 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7351 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7352 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7353 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7354 // Create a device copy of that host view
7355 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7356 // Create host ViewFArray
7357 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
7358}
7359
7360template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7361DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
7362 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7363 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
7364 size_t dim6) {
7365 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
7366
7367 dims_[0] = dim0;
7368 dims_[1] = dim1;
7369 dims_[2] = dim2;
7370 dims_[3] = dim3;
7371 dims_[4] = dim4;
7372 dims_[5] = dim5;
7373 dims_[6] = dim6;
7374 order_ = 7;
7375 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
7376 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
7377 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
7378 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
7379 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
7380 // Create a device copy of that host view
7381 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
7382 // Create host ViewFArray
7383 host = ViewFArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
7384}
7385
7386template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7387KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7388T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
7389 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 1D!");
7390 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 1D!");
7391 return this_array_(i);
7392}
7393
7394template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7395KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7396T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
7397 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
7398 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
7399 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 2D!");
7400 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0]));
7401}
7402
7403template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7404KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7405T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
7406 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
7407 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
7408 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
7409 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 3D!");
7410 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
7411 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
7412}
7413
7414template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7415KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7416T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
7417 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
7418 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
7419 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
7420 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
7421 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 4D!");
7422 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
7423 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7424 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
7425}
7426
7427template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7428KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7429T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7430 size_t m) const {
7431 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7432 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7433 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7434 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7435 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7436 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 5D!");
7437 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
7438 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7439 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7440 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
7441}
7442
7443template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7444KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7445T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7446 size_t m, size_t n) const {
7447 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7448 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7449 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7450 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7451 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7452 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7453 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 6D!");
7454 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
7455 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7456 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7457 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7458 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4]));
7459}
7460
7461template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7462KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7463T& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7464 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
7465 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7466 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7467 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7468 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7469 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7470 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7471 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7472 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DViewFArrayKokkos 7D!");
7473 return this_array_(i + (j * dims_[0])
7474 + (k * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7475 + (l * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7476 + (m * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7477 + (n * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
7478 + (o * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5]));
7479}
7480
7481template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7482KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7483DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DViewFArrayKokkos& temp) {
7484
7485 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
7486 if (this != &temp) {
7487 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
7488 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
7489 } // end for
7490
7491 order_ = temp.order_;
7492 length_ = temp.length_;
7493 temp_inp_array_ = temp.temp_inp_array_;
7494 this_array_host_ = temp.this_array_host_;
7495 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
7496 host = temp.host;
7497 }
7498
7499 return *this;
7500}
7501
7502// Return size
7503template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7504KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7505size_t DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
7506 return length_;
7507}
7508
7509template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7510KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7511size_t DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
7512 return length_;
7513}
7514
7515template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7516KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7517size_t DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
7518 assert(i < order_ && "DViewFArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
7519 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DViewFArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
7520 return dims_[i];
7521}
7522
7523template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7524KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7525size_t DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
7526 return order_;
7527}
7528
7529template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7530KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7531T* DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
7532 return this_array_.data();
7533}
7534
7535template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7536KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7537T* DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
7538 return this_array_host_.data();
7539}
7540
7541template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7542void DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
7543 // Deep copy of device view to host view
7544 deep_copy(this_array_host_, this_array_);
7545}
7546
7547template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7548void DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
7549 // Deep copy of host view to device view
7550 deep_copy(this_array_, this_array_host_);
7551}
7552
7553template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7554KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7555DViewFArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DViewFArrayKokkos() {}
7556// End DViewFArrayKokkos
7557
7558
7560// DFMatrixKokkos
7562template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
7563class DFMatrixKokkos {
7564
7565 // this is manage
7566 using TArray1D = Kokkos::DualView<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
7567
7568private:
7569 size_t dims_[7];
7570 size_t length_;
7571 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
7572 TArray1D this_matrix_;
7573
7574public:
7575 DFMatrixKokkos();
7576
7577 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7578
7579 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7580
7581 DFMatrixKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7582
7583 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7584 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7585
7586 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7587 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7588
7589 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7590 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7591
7592 DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7593 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
7594 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
7595
7596 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7597 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
7598
7599 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7600 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
7601
7602 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7603 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
7604
7605 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7606 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
7607
7608 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7609 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
7610
7611 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7612 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
7613 size_t n) const;
7614
7615 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7616 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
7617 size_t n, size_t o) const;
7618
7619 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7620 DFMatrixKokkos& operator=(const DFMatrixKokkos& temp);
7621
7622 // GPU Method
7623 // Method that returns size
7624 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7625 size_t size() const;
7626
7627 // Host Method
7628 // Method that returns size
7629 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7630 size_t extent() const;
7631
7632 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7633 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
7634
7635 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7636 size_t order() const;
7637
7638 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos DualView
7639 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7640 T* device_pointer() const;
7641
7642 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos DualView
7643 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7644 T* host_pointer() const;
7645
7646 // Data member to access host view
7647 ViewFMatrix <T> host;
7648
7649 // Method that update host view
7650 void update_host();
7651
7652 // Method that update device view
7653 void update_device();
7654
7655 // Deconstructor
7656 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7657 ~DFMatrixKokkos ();
7658}; // End of DFMatrixKokkos declarations
7659
7660// Default constructor
7661template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7662DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos() {}
7663
7664// Overloaded 1D constructor
7665template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7666DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
7667
7668 dims_[0] = dim1;
7669 order_ = 1;
7670 length_ = dim1;
7671 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7672 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7673 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1);
7674}
7675
7676// Overloaded 2D constructor
7677template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7678DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
7679
7680 dims_[0] = dim1;
7681 dims_[1] = dim2;
7682 order_ = 2;
7683 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
7684 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7685 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7686 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2);
7687}
7688
7689template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7690DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7691 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
7692
7693 dims_[0] = dim1;
7694 dims_[1] = dim2;
7695 dims_[2] = dim3;
7696 order_ = 3;
7697 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
7698 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7699 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7700 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3);
7701}
7702
7703template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7704DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7705 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
7706
7707 dims_[0] = dim1;
7708 dims_[1] = dim2;
7709 dims_[2] = dim3;
7710 dims_[3] = dim4;
7711 order_ = 4;
7712 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
7713 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7714 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7715 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
7716}
7717
7718template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7719DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7720 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
7721 size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
7722
7723 dims_[0] = dim1;
7724 dims_[1] = dim2;
7725 dims_[2] = dim3;
7726 dims_[3] = dim4;
7727 dims_[4] = dim5;
7728 order_ = 5;
7729 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
7730 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7731 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7732 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
7733}
7734
7735template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7736DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7737 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
7738 size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
7739
7740 dims_[0] = dim1;
7741 dims_[1] = dim2;
7742 dims_[2] = dim3;
7743 dims_[3] = dim4;
7744 dims_[4] = dim5;
7745 dims_[5] = dim6;
7746 order_ = 6;
7747 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
7748 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7749 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7750 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
7751}
7752
7753template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7754DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DFMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
7755 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
7756 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
7757 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string) {
7758
7759 dims_[0] = dim1;
7760 dims_[1] = dim2;
7761 dims_[2] = dim3;
7762 dims_[3] = dim4;
7763 dims_[4] = dim5;
7764 dims_[5] = dim6;
7765 dims_[6] = dim7;
7766 order_ = 7;
7767 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
7768 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
7769 // Create host ViewFMatrix
7770 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6, dim7);
7771}
7772
7773template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7774KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7775T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
7776 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
7777 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
7778 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1));
7779}
7780
7781template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7782KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7783T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
7784 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
7785 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
7786 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
7787 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0]));
7788}
7789
7790template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7791KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7792T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
7793 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
7794 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
7795 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
7796 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
7797 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
7798 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
7799}
7800
7801template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7802KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7803T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
7804 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
7805 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
7806 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
7807 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
7808 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
7809 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
7810 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7811 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
7812}
7813
7814template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7815KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7816T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7817 size_t m) const {
7818 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
7819 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
7820 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
7821 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
7822 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
