7823 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
7824 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
7825 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7826 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7827 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
7828}
7829
7830template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7831KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7832T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7833 size_t m, size_t n) const {
7834 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7835 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7836 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7837 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7838 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7839 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7840 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
7841 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
7842 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7843 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7844 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7845 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4]));
7846}
7847
7848template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7849KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7850T& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
7851 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
7852 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7853 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7854 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7855 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7856 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7857 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7858 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7859 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
7860 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
7861 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
7862 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
7863 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
7864 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
7865 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5]));
7866}
7867
7868template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7869KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7870DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DFMatrixKokkos& temp) {
7871
7872 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
7873 if (this != &temp) {
7874 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
7875 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
7876 } // end for
7877
7878 order_ = temp.order_;
7879 length_ = temp.length_;
7880 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
7881 host = temp.host;
7882 }
7883
7884 return *this;
7885}
7886
7887// Return size
7888template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7889KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7890size_t DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
7891 return length_;
7892}
7893
7894template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7895KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7896size_t DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
7897 return length_;
7898}
7899
7900template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7901KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7902size_t DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
7903 i--;
7904 assert(i < order_ && "DFMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
7905 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DFMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
7906 return dims_[i];
7907}
7908
7909template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7910KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7911size_t DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
7912 return order_;
7913}
7914
7915template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7916KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7917T* DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
7918 return this_matrix_.d_view.data();
7919}
7920
7921template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7922KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7923T* DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
7924 return this_matrix_.h_view.data();
7925}
7926
7927template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7928void DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
7929
7930 this_matrix_.template modify<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
7931 this_matrix_.template sync<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
7932}
7933
7934template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7935void DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
7936
7937 this_matrix_.template modify<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
7938 this_matrix_.template sync<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
7939}
7940
7941template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
7942KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7943DFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DFMatrixKokkos() {}
7944// End DFMatrixKokkos
7945
7946
7948// DViewFMatrixKokkos
7950template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
7951class DViewFMatrixKokkos {
7952
7953 // this is always unmanaged
7954 using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
7955 // this is manage
7956 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
7957
7958private:
7959 size_t dims_[7];
7960 size_t length_;
7961 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
7962 TArray1D this_matrix_;
7963 TArray1DHost this_matrix_host_;
7964 T * temp_inp_matrix_;
7965
7966public:
7967 DViewFMatrixKokkos();
7968
7969 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1);
7970
7971 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
7972
7973 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3);
7974
7975 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7976 size_t dim4);
7977
7978 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7979 size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
7980
7981 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7982 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6);
7983
7984 DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
7985 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
7986 size_t dim7);
7987
7988 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7989 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
7990
7991 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7992 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
7993
7994 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7995 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
7996
7997 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
7998 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
7999
8000 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8001 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
8002
8003 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8004 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8005 size_t n) const;
8006
8007 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8008 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8009 size_t n, size_t o) const;
8010
8011 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8012 DViewFMatrixKokkos& operator=(const DViewFMatrixKokkos& temp);
8013
8014 // GPU Method
8015 // Method that returns size
8016 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8017 size_t size() const;
8018
8019 // Host Method
8020 // Method that returns size
8021 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8022 size_t extent() const;
8023
8024 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8025 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
8026
8027 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8028 size_t order() const;
8029
8030 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos View
8031 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8032 T* device_pointer() const;
8033
8034 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos View
8035 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8036 T* host_pointer() const;
8037
8038 // Data member to access host view
8039 ViewFMatrix <T> host;
8040
8041 // Method that update host view
8042 void update_host();
8043
8044 // Method that update device view
8045 void update_device();
8046
8047 // Deconstructor
8048 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8049 ~DViewFMatrixKokkos ();
8050}; // End of DViewFMatrixKokkos
8051
8052
8053// Default constructor
8054template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8055DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos() {}
8056
8057// Overloaded 1D constructor
8058template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8059DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1) {
8060
8061 dims_[0] = dim1;
8062 order_ = 1;
8063 length_ = dim1;
8064 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8065 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8066 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8067 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8068 // Create a device copy of that host view
8069 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8070 // Create host ViewFMatrix. Note: inp_matrix and this_matrix_host_.data() are the same pointer
8071 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1);
8072}
8073
8074// Overloaded 2D constructor
8075template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8076DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2) {
8077
8078 dims_[0] = dim1;
8079 dims_[1] = dim2;
8080 order_ = 2;
8081 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
8082 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8083 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8084 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8085 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8086 // Create a device copy of that host view
8087 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8088 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8089 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2);
8090}
8091
8092template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8093DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8094 size_t dim3) {
8095
8096 dims_[0] = dim1;
8097 dims_[1] = dim2;
8098 dims_[2] = dim3;
8099 order_ = 3;
8100 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
8101 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8102 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8103 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8104 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8105 // Create a device copy of that host view
8106 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8107 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8108 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3);
8109}
8110
8111template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8112DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8113 size_t dim3, size_t dim4) {
8114
8115 dims_[0] = dim1;
8116 dims_[1] = dim2;
8117 dims_[2] = dim3;
8118 dims_[3] = dim4;
8119 order_ = 4;
8120 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
8121 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8122 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8123 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8124 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8125 // Create a device copy of that host view
8126 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8127 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8128 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
8129}
8130
8131template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8132DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8133 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8134 size_t dim5) {
8135
8136 dims_[0] = dim1;
8137 dims_[1] = dim2;
8138 dims_[2] = dim3;
8139 dims_[3] = dim4;
8140 dims_[4] = dim5;
8141 order_ = 5;
8142 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
8143 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8144 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8145 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8146 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8147 // Create a device copy of that host view
8148 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8149 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8150 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
8151}
8152
8153template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8154DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8155 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8156 size_t dim5, size_t dim6) {
8157
8158 dims_[0] = dim1;
8159 dims_[1] = dim2;
8160 dims_[2] = dim3;
8161 dims_[3] = dim4;
8162 dims_[4] = dim5;
8163 dims_[5] = dim6;
8164 order_ = 6;
8165 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
8166 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8167 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8168 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8169 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8170 // Create a device copy of that host view
8171 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8172 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8173 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
8174}
8175
8176template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8177DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewFMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8178 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8179 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
8180 size_t dim7) {
8181
8182 dims_[0] = dim1;
8183 dims_[1] = dim2;
8184 dims_[2] = dim3;
8185 dims_[3] = dim4;
8186 dims_[4] = dim5;
8187 dims_[5] = dim6;
8188 dims_[6] = dim7;
8189 order_ = 7;
8190 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
8191 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
8192 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
8193 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
8194 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
8195 // Create a device copy of that host view
8196 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
8197 // Create host ViewFMatrix
8198 host = ViewFMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6, dim7);
8199}
8200
8201template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8202KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8203T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
8204 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
8205 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 1D!");
8206 return this_matrix_((i - 1));
8207}
8208
8209template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8210KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8211T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
8212 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
8213 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
8214 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 2D!");
8215 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0]));
8216}
8217
8218template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8219KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8220T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
8221 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
8222 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
8223 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
8224 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 3D!");
8225 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
8226 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1]));
8227}
8228
8229template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8230KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8231T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
8232 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
8233 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
8234 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
8235 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
8236 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 4D!");
8237 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
8238 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
8239 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2]));
8240}
8241
8242template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8243KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8244T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8245 size_t m) const {
8246 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8247 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8248 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8249 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8250 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8251 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 5D!");
8252 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
8253 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
8254 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
8255 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3]));
8256}
8257
8258template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8259KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8260T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8261 size_t m, size_t n) const {
8262 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8263 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8264 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8265 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8266 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8267 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8268 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 6D!");
8269 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
8270 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
8271 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
8272 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
8273 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4]));
8274}
8275
8276template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8277KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8278T& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8279 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
8280 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8281 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8282 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8283 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8284 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8285 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8286 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8287 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DViewFMatrixKokkos 7D!");
8288 return this_matrix_((i - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[0])
8289 + ((k - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1])
8290 + ((l - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2])
8291 + ((m - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3])
8292 + ((n - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4])
8293 + ((o - 1) * dims_[0] * dims_[1] * dims_[2] * dims_[3] * dims_[4] * dims_[5]));
8294}
8295
8296template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8297KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8298DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DViewFMatrixKokkos& temp) {
8299
8300 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
8301 if (this != &temp) {
8302 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
8303 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
8304 } // end for
8305
8306 order_ = temp.order_;
8307 length_ = temp.length_;
8308 temp_inp_matrix_ = temp.temp_inp_matrix_;
8309 this_matrix_host_ = temp.this_matrix_host_;
8310 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
8311 host = temp.host;
8312 }
8313
8314 return *this;
8315}
8316
8317// Return size
8318template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8319KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8320size_t DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
8321 return length_;
8322}
8323
8324template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8325KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8326size_t DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
8327 return length_;
8328}
8329
8330template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8331KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8332size_t DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
8333 i--;
8334 assert(i < order_ && "DViewFMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
8335 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DViewFMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
8336 return dims_[i];
8337}
8338
8339template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8340KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8341size_t DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
8342 return order_;
8343}
8344
8345template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8346KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8347T* DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
8348 return this_matrix_.data();
8349}
8350
8351template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8352KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8353T* DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
8354 return this_matrix_host_.data();
8355}
8356
8357template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8358void DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
8359 // Deep copy of device view to host view
8360 deep_copy(this_matrix_host_, this_matrix_);
8361}
8362
8363template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8364void DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
8365 // Deep copy of host view to device view
8366 deep_copy(this_matrix_, this_matrix_host_);
8367}
8368
8369template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8370KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8371DViewFMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DViewFMatrixKokkos() {}
8372// End DViewFMatrixKokkos
8373
8374
8378template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
8379class CArrayKokkos {
8380
8381 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
8382
8383private:
8384 size_t dims_[7];
8385 size_t order_;
8386 size_t length_;
8387 TArray1D this_array_;
8388
8389public:
8390 CArrayKokkos();
8391
8392 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8393
8394 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8395
8396 CArrayKokkos (size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8397
8398 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8399 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8400
8401 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8402 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8403
8404 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8405 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8406
8407 CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8408 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
8409 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
8410
8411 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8412 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
8413
8414 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8415 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
8416
8417 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8418 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
8419
8420 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8421 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
8422
8423 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8424 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
8425
8426 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8427 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8428 size_t n) const;
8429
8430 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8431 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8432 size_t n, size_t o) const;
8433
8434 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8435 CArrayKokkos& operator=(const CArrayKokkos& temp);
8436
8437 // GPU Method
8438 // Method that returns size
8439 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8440 size_t size() const;
8441
8442 // Host Method
8443 // Method that returns size
8444 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8445 size_t extent() const;
8446
8447 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8448 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
8449
8450 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8451 size_t order() const;
8452
8453 // Methods returns the raw pointer (most likely GPU) of the Kokkos View
8454 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8455 T* pointer() const;
8456
8457 //return the view
8458 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8459 TArray1D get_kokkos_view() const;
8460
8461 // Deconstructor
8462 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8463 ~CArrayKokkos ();
8464}; // End of CArrayKokkos
8465
8466// Default constructor
8467template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8468CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos() {}
8469
8470// Overloaded 1D constructor
8471template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8472CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string) {
8473 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
8474
8475 dims_[0] = dim0;
8476 order_ = 1;
8477 length_ = dim0;
8478 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8479}
8480
8481// Overloaded 2D constructor
8482template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8483CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
8484 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
8485
8486 dims_[0] = dim0;
8487 dims_[1] = dim1;
8488 order_ = 2;
8489 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
8490 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8491}
8492
8493template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8494CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8495 size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
8496 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
8497
8498 dims_[0] = dim0;
8499 dims_[1] = dim1;
8500 dims_[2] = dim2;
8501 order_ = 3;
8502 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
8503 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8504}
8505
8506template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8507CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8508 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
8509 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
8510
8511 dims_[0] = dim0;
8512 dims_[1] = dim1;
8513 dims_[2] = dim2;
8514 dims_[3] = dim3;
8515 order_ = 4;
8516 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
8517 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8518}
8519
8520template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8521CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8522 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
8523 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
8524
8525 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
8526
8527 dims_[0] = dim0;
8528 dims_[1] = dim1;
8529 dims_[2] = dim2;
8530 dims_[3] = dim3;
8531 dims_[4] = dim4;
8532 order_ = 5;
8533 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
8534 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8535}
8536
8537template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8538CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8539 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
8540 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
8541 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
8542
8543 dims_[0] = dim0;
8544 dims_[1] = dim1;
8545 dims_[2] = dim2;
8546 dims_[3] = dim3;
8547 dims_[4] = dim4;
8548 dims_[5] = dim5;
8549 order_ = 6;
8550 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
8551 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8552}
8553
8554template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8555CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8556 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
8557 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
8558 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
8559 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
8560
8561 dims_[0] = dim0;
8562 dims_[1] = dim1;
8563 dims_[2] = dim2;
8564 dims_[3] = dim3;
8565 dims_[4] = dim4;
8566 dims_[5] = dim5;
8567 dims_[6] = dim6;
8568 order_ = 7;
8569 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
8570 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
8571}
8572
8573template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8574KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8575T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
8576 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 1D!");
8577 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 1D!");
8578 return this_array_(i);
8579}
8580
8581template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8582KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8583T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
8584 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 2D!");
8585 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 2D!");
8586 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 2D!");
8587 return this_array_(j + (i * dims_[1]));
8588}
8589
8590template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8591KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8592T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
8593 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 3D!");
8594 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 3D!");
8595 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 3D!");
8596 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 3D!");
8597 return this_array_(k + (j * dims_[2])
8598 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
8599}
8600
8601template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8602KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8603T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
8604 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 4D!");
8605 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 4D!");
8606 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 4D!");
8607 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 4D!");
8608 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 4D!");
8609 return this_array_(l + (k * dims_[3])
8610 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8611 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
8612}
8613
8614template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8615KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8616T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8617 size_t m) const {
8618 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8619 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8620 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8621 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8622 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8623 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 5D!");
8624 return this_array_(m + (l * dims_[4])
8625 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
8626 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8627 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
8628}
8629
8630template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8631KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8632T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8633 size_t m, size_t n) const {
8634 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8635 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8636 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8637 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8638 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8639 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8640 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 6D!");
8641 return this_array_(n + (m * dims_[5])
8642 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
8643 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
8644 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8645 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
8646}
8647
8648template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8649KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8650T& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8651 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
8652 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8653 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8654 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8655 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8656 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8657 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8658 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8659 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in CArrayKokkos 7D!");
8660 return this_array_(o + (n * dims_[6])
8661 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
8662 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
8663 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
8664 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8665 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
8666}
8667
8668template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8669KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8670CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& temp) {
8671 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
8672
8673 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
8674 if (this != &temp) {
8675 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
8676 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
8677 } // end for
8678
8679 order_ = temp.order_;
8680 length_ = temp.length_;
8681 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
8682 }
8683
8684 return *this;
8685}
8686
8687// Return size
8688template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8689KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8690size_t CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
8691 return length_;
8692}
8693
8694template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8695KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8696size_t CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
8697 return length_;
8698}
8699
8700template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8701KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8702size_t CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
8703 assert(i < order_ && "CArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
8704 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to CArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
8705 return dims_[i];
8706}
8707
8708template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8709KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8710size_t CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
8711 return order_;
8712}
8713
8714template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8715KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8716T* CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::pointer() const {
8717 return this_array_.data();
8718}
8719
8720//return the stored Kokkos view
8721template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8722KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8723Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() const {
8724 return this_array_;
8725}
8726
8727template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
8728KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8729CArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~CArrayKokkos() {}
8730
8732// End of CArrayKokkos
8734
8738template <typename T>
8739class ViewCArrayKokkos {
8740
8741private:
8742 size_t dims_[7];
8743 size_t order_;
8744 size_t length_; // Length of 1D array
8745 T* this_array_;
8746
8747public:
8748 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8749 ViewCArrayKokkos();
8750
8751 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8752 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0);
8753
8754 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8755 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1);
8756
8757 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8758 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8759 size_t dim2);
8760
8761 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8762 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8763 size_t dim2, size_t dim3);
8764
8765 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8766 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8767 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4);
8768
8769 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8770 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8771 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8772 size_t dim5);
8773
8774 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8775 ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
8776 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8777 size_t dim5, size_t dim6);;
8778
8779 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8780 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
8781
8782 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8783 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
8784
8785 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8786 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
8787
8788 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8789 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
8790
8791 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8792 T& operator() (size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
8793
8794 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8795 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8796 size_t n) const;
8797
8798 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8799 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
8800 size_t n, size_t o) const;
8801
8802 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8803 size_t size() const;
8804
8805 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8806 size_t extent() const;
8807
8808 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8809 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
8810
8811 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8812 size_t order() const;
8813
8814 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8815 T* pointer() const;
8816
8817 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8818 ~ViewCArrayKokkos();
8819
8820}; // end of ViewCArrayKokkos
8821
8822// Default constructor
8823template <typename T>
8824KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8825ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos() {}
8826
8827// Overloaded 1D constructor
8828template <typename T>
8829KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8830ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0) {
8831 dims_[0] = dim0;
8832 order_ = 1;
8833 length_ = dim0;
8834 this_array_ = some_array;
8835}
8836
8837// Overloaded 2D constructor
8838template <typename T>
8839KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8840ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8841 size_t dim1) {
8842 dims_[0] = dim0;
8843 dims_[1] = dim1;
8844 order_ = 2;
8845 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
8846 this_array_ = some_array;
8847}
8848
8849// Overloaded 3D constructor
8850template <typename T>
8851KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8852ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8853 size_t dim1, size_t dim2) {
8854 dims_[0] = dim0;
8855 dims_[1] = dim1;
8856 dims_[2] = dim2;
8857 order_ = 3;
8858 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
8859 this_array_ = some_array;
8860}
8861
8862// Overloaded 4D constructor
8863template <typename T>
8864KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8865ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8866 size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8867 size_t dim3) {
8868 dims_[0] = dim0;
8869 dims_[1] = dim1;
8870 dims_[2] = dim2;
8871 dims_[3] = dim3;
8872 order_ = 4;
8873 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
8874 this_array_ = some_array;
8875}
8876
8877// Overloaded 5D constructor
8878template <typename T>
8879KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8880ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8881 size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8882 size_t dim3, size_t dim4) {
8883 dims_[0] = dim0;
8884 dims_[1] = dim1;
8885 dims_[2] = dim2;
8886 dims_[3] = dim3;
8887 dims_[4] = dim4;
8888 order_ = 5;
8889 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
8890 this_array_ = some_array;
8891}
8892
8893// Overloaded 6D constructor
8894template <typename T>
8895KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8896ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8897 size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8898 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8899 size_t dim5) {
8900 dims_[0] = dim0;
8901 dims_[1] = dim1;
8902 dims_[2] = dim2;
8903 dims_[3] = dim3;
8904 dims_[4] = dim4;
8905 dims_[5] = dim5;
8906 order_ = 6;
8907 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
8908 this_array_ = some_array;
8909}
8910
8911// Overloaded 7D constructor
8912template <typename T>
8913KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8914ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::ViewCArrayKokkos(T* some_array, size_t dim0,
8915 size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
8916 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
8917 size_t dim5, size_t dim6) {
8918 dims_[0] = dim0;
8919 dims_[1] = dim1;
8920 dims_[2] = dim2;
8921 dims_[3] = dim3;
8922 dims_[4] = dim4;
8923 dims_[5] = dim5;
8924 dims_[6] = dim6;
8925 order_ = 7;
8926 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
8927 this_array_ = some_array;
8928}
8929
8930template <typename T>
8931KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8932T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i) const {
8933 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 1D!");
8934 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 1D!");
8935 return this_array_[i];
8936}
8937
8938template <typename T>
8939KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8940T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
8941 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
8942 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
8943 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
8944 return this_array_[j + (i * dims_[1])];
8945}
8946
8947template <typename T>
8948KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8949T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
8950 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
8951 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
8952 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
8953 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
8954 return this_array_[k + (j * dims_[2])
8955 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
8956}
8957
8958template <typename T>
8959KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8960T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k,
8961 size_t l) const {
8962 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
8963 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
8964 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
8965 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
8966 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
8967 return this_array_[l + (k * dims_[3])
8968 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8969 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
8970}
8971
8972template <typename T>
8973KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8974T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8975 size_t m) const {
8976 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8977 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8978 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8979 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8980 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8981 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
8982 return this_array_[m + (l * dims_[4])
8983 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
8984 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
8985 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
8986}
8987
8988template <typename T>
8989KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
8990T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
8991 size_t m, size_t n) const {
8992 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8993 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8994 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8995 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8996 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8997 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8998 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
8999 return this_array_[n + (m * dims_[5])
9000 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9001 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9002 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9003 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9004}
9005
9006template <typename T>
9007KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9008T& ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9009 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
9010 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9011 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9012 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9013 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9014 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9015 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9016 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9017 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in ViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
9018 return this_array_[o + (n * dims_[6])
9019 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
9020 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9021 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9022 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9023 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9024}
9025
9026template <typename T>
9027KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9028size_t ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::size() const {
9029 return length_;
9030}
9031
9032template <typename T>
9033KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9034size_t ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::extent() const {
9035 return length_;
9036}
9037
9038template <typename T>
9039KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9040size_t ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
9041 assert(i < order_ && "ViewCArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
9042 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewCArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
9043 return dims_[i];
9044}
9045
9046template <typename T>
9047KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9048size_t ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::order() const {
9049 return order_;
9050}
9051
9052template <typename T>
9053KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9054T* ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::pointer() const {
9055 return this_array_;
9056}
9057
9058template <typename T>
9059KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9060ViewCArrayKokkos<T>::~ViewCArrayKokkos() {}
9061
9063// End of ViewCArrayKokkos
9065
9069template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
9070class CMatrixKokkos {
9071
9072 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
9073
9074private:
9075 size_t dims_[7];
9076 size_t order_;
9077 size_t length_;
9078 TArray1D this_matrix_;
9079
9080public:
9081 CMatrixKokkos();
9082
9083 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9084
9085 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9086
9087 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9088
9089 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9090 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9091
9092 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9093 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9094
9095 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9096 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9097
9098 CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9099 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
9100 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
9101
9102 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9103 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
9104
9105 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9106 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
9107
9108 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9109 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
9110
9111 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9112 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
9113
9114 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9115 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
9116
9117 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9118 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
9119 size_t n) const;
9120
9121 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9122 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
9123 size_t n, size_t o) const;
9124
9125 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9126 CMatrixKokkos& operator=(const CMatrixKokkos &temp);
9127
9128 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9129 size_t size() const;
9130
9131 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9132 size_t extent() const;
9133
9134 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9135 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
9136
9137 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9138 size_t order() const;
9139
9140 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9141 T* pointer() const;
9142
9143 //return the view
9144 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9145 TArray1D get_kokkos_view() const;
9146
9147 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9148 ~CMatrixKokkos();
9149
9150}; // End of CMatrixKokkos
9151
9152// Default constructor
9153template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9154CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos() {}
9155
9156// Overloaded 1D constructor
9157template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9158CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
9159 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9160
9161 dims_[0] = dim1;
9162 order_ = 1;
9163 length_ = dim1;
9164 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9165}
9166
9167// Overloaded 2D constructor
9168template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9169CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
9170 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9171
9172 dims_[0] = dim1;
9173 dims_[1] = dim2;
9174 order_ = 2;
9175 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
9176 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9177}
9178
9179// Overloaded 3D constructor
9180template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9181CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9182 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
9183 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9184
9185 dims_[0] = dim1;
9186 dims_[1] = dim2;
9187 dims_[2] = dim3;
9188 order_ = 3;
9189 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
9190 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9191}
9192
9193// Overloaded 4D constructor
9194template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9195CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9196 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
9197 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9198
9199 dims_[0] = dim1;
9200 dims_[1] = dim2;
9201 dims_[2] = dim3;
9202 dims_[3] = dim4;
9203 order_ = 4;
9204 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
9205 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9206}
9207
9208// Overloaded 5D constructor
9209template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9210CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9211 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
9212 size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
9213
9214 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9215
9216 dims_[0] = dim1;
9217 dims_[1] = dim2;
9218 dims_[2] = dim3;
9219 dims_[3] = dim4;
9220 dims_[4] = dim5;
9221 order_ = 5;
9222 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
9223 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9224}
9225
9226// Overloaded 6D constructor
9227template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9228CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9229 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
9230 size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
9231 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9232
9233 dims_[0] = dim1;
9234 dims_[1] = dim2;
9235 dims_[2] = dim3;
9236 dims_[3] = dim4;
9237 dims_[4] = dim5;
9238 dims_[5] = dim6;
9239 order_ = 6;
9240 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
9241 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9242}
9243
9244// Overloaded 7D constructor
9245template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9246CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9247 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
9248 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
9249 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string) {
9250 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9251
9252 dims_[0] = dim1;
9253 dims_[1] = dim2;
9254 dims_[2] = dim3;
9255 dims_[3] = dim4;
9256 dims_[4] = dim5;
9257 dims_[5] = dim6;
9258 dims_[6] = dim7;
9259 order_ = 7;
9260 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
9261 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9262}
9263
9264template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9265KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9266T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
9267 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 1D!");
9268 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 1D!");
9269 return this_matrix_((i - 1));
9270}
9271
9272template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9273KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9274T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
9275 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9276 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9277 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9278 return this_matrix_((j - 1) + ((i - 1) * dims_[1]));
9279}
9280
9281template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9282KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9283T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
9284 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9285 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9286 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9287 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9288 return this_matrix_((k - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[2])
9289 + ((i - 1) * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9290}
9291
9292template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9293KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9294T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
9295 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9296 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9297 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9298 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9299 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9300 return this_matrix_((l - 1) + ((k - 1) * dims_[3])
9301 + ((j - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9302 + ((i - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9303}
9304
9305template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9306KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9307T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9308 size_t m) const {
9309 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9310 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9311 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9312 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9313 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9314 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9315 return this_matrix_((m - 1) + ((l - 1) * dims_[4])
9316 + ((k - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9317 + ((j - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9318 + ((i - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9319}
9320
9321template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9322KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9323T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9324 size_t m, size_t n) const {
9325 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9326 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9327 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9328 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9329 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9330 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9331 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9332 return this_matrix_((n - 1) + ((m - 1) * dims_[5])
9333 + ((l - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9334 + ((k - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9335 + ((j - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9336 + ((i - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9337}
9338
9339template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9340KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9341T& CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9342 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
9343 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9344 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9345 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9346 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9347 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9348 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9349 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9350 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in CMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9351 return this_matrix_((o-1) + ((n - 1) * dims_[6])
9352 + ((m - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
9353 + ((l - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9354 + ((k - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9355 + ((j - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9356 + ((i - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9357}
9358
9359// Overload = operator
9360// for object assignment THIS = CMatrixKokkos <> temp
9361template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9362KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9363CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> & CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator=(const CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp) {
9364 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
9365
9366 if( this != &temp) {
9367 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
9368 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
9369 } // end for
9370
9371 order_ = temp.order_;
9372 length_ = temp.length_;
9373 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
9374 }
9375
9376 return *this;
9377}
9378
9379template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9380KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9381size_t CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
9382 return length_;
9383}
9384
9385template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9386KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9387size_t CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
9388 return length_;
9389}
9390
9391template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9392KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9393size_t CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
9394 i--;
9395 assert(i < order_ && "CMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
9396 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to CMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
9397 return dims_[i];
9398}
9399
9400template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9401KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9402size_t CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
9403 return order_;
9404}
9405
9406template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9407KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9408T* CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::pointer() const {
9409 return this_matrix_.data();
9410}
9411
9412//return the stored Kokkos view
9413template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9414KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9415Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() const {
9416 return this_matrix_;
9417}
9418
9419// Deconstructor
9420template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9421KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9422CMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~CMatrixKokkos() {}
9423
9425// End of CMatrixKokkos
9427
9431template <typename T>
9432class ViewCMatrixKokkos {
9433
9434private:
9435 size_t dims_[7];
9436 size_t order_;
9437 size_t length_;
9438 T* this_matrix_;
9439
9440public:
9441 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9442 ViewCMatrixKokkos();
9443
9444 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9445 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1);
9446
9447 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9448 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
9449
9450 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9451 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3);
9452
9453 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9454 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9455 size_t dim4);
9456
9457 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9458 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9459 size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
9460
9461 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9462 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9463 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6);
9464
9465 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9466 ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9467 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6, size_t dim7);
9468
9469 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9470 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
9471
9472 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9473 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
9474
9475 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9476 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j , size_t k) const;
9477
9478 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9479 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k , size_t l) const;
9480
9481 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9482 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
9483
9484 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9485 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m, size_t n) const;
9486
9487 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9488 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const;
9489
9490 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9491 size_t size() const;
9492
9493 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9494 size_t extent() const;
9495
9496 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9497 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
9498
9499 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9500 size_t order() const;
9501
9502 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9503 T* pointer() const;
9504
9505 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9506 ~ViewCMatrixKokkos();
9507
9508}; // End of ViewCMatrixKokkos
9509
9510// Default constructor
9511template <typename T>
9512KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9513ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(){ }
9514
9515// Overloaded 1D constructor
9516template <typename T>
9517KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9518ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1) {
9519 dims_[0] = dim1;
9520 order_ = 1;
9521 length_ = dim1;
9522 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9523}
9524
9525// Overloaded 2D constructor
9526template <typename T>
9527KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9528ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1,
9529 size_t dim2) {
9530 dims_[0] = dim1;
9531 dims_[1] = dim2;
9532 order_ = 2;
9533 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
9534 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9535}
9536
9537// Overloaded 3D constructor
9538template <typename T>
9539KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9540ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9541 size_t dim3) {
9542 dims_[0] = dim1;
9543 dims_[1] = dim2;
9544 dims_[2] = dim3;
9545 order_ = 3;
9546 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
9547 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9548}
9549
9550// Overloaded 4D constructor
9551template <typename T>
9552KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9553ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9554 size_t dim3, size_t dim4) {
9555 dims_[0] = dim1;
9556 dims_[1] = dim2;
9557 dims_[2] = dim3;
9558 dims_[3] = dim4;
9559 order_ = 4;
9560 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
9561 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9562}
9563
9564// Overloaded 5D constructor
9565template <typename T>
9566KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9567ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9568 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5) {
9569 dims_[0] = dim1;
9570 dims_[1] = dim2;
9571 dims_[2] = dim3;
9572 dims_[3] = dim4;
9573 dims_[4] = dim5;
9574 order_ = 5;
9575 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
9576 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9577}
9578
9579// Overloaded 6D constructor
9580template <typename T>
9581KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9582ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9583 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
9584 size_t dim6) {
9585 dims_[0] = dim1;
9586 dims_[1] = dim2;
9587 dims_[2] = dim3;
9588 dims_[3] = dim4;
9589 dims_[4] = dim5;
9590 dims_[5] = dim6;
9591 order_ = 6;
9592 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
9593 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9594}
9595
9596// Overloaded 7D constructor
9597template <typename T>
9598KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9599ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::ViewCMatrixKokkos(T* some_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9600 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
9601 size_t dim6, size_t dim7) {
9602 dims_[0] = dim1;
9603 dims_[1] = dim2;
9604 dims_[2] = dim3;
9605 dims_[3] = dim4;
9606 dims_[4] = dim5;
9607 dims_[5] = dim6;
9608 dims_[6] = dim7;
9609 order_ = 7;
9610 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
9611 this_matrix_ = some_matrix;
9612}
9613
9614template <typename T>
9615KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9616T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i) const {
9617 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
9618 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
9619 return this_matrix_[(i - 1)];
9620}
9621
9622template <typename T>
9623KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9624T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
9625 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9626 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9627 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
9628 return this_matrix_[(j - 1) + ((i - 1) * dims_[1])];
9629}
9630
9631template <typename T>
9632KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9633T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
9634 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9635 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9636 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9637 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
9638 return this_matrix_[(k - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[2])
9639 + ((i - 1) * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9640}
9641
9642template <typename T>
9643KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9644T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j , size_t k, size_t l) const {
9645 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9646 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9647 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9648 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9649 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in ViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
9650 return this_matrix_[(l - 1) + ((k - 1) * dims_[3])
9651 + ((j - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9652 + ((i - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9653}
9654
9655template <typename T>
9656KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9657T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9658 size_t m) const {
9659 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9660 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9661 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9662 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9663 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9664 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
9665 return this_matrix_[(m - 1) + ((l - 1) * dims_[4])
9666 + ((k - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9667 + ((j - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9668 + ((i - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9669}
9670
9671template <typename T>
9672KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9673T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9674 size_t m, size_t n) const {
9675 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9676 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9677 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9678 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9679 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9680 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9681 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
9682 return this_matrix_[(n - 1) + ((m - 1) * dims_[5])
9683 + ((l - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9684 + ((k - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9685 + ((j - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9686 + ((i - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9687}
9688
9689template <typename T>
9690KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9691T& ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
9692 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
9693 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9694 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9695 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9696 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9697 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9698 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9699 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9700 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds for ViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
9701 return this_matrix_[o + ((n - 1) * dims_[6])
9702 + ((m - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
9703 + ((l - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
9704 + ((k - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
9705 + ((j - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
9706 + ((i - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1])];
9707}
9708
9709
9710template <typename T>
9711KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9712size_t ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::size() const {
9713 return length_;
9714}
9715
9716template <typename T>
9717KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9718size_t ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::extent() const {
9719 return length_;
9720}
9721
9722template <typename T>
9723KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9724size_t ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::dims(size_t i) const {
9725 i--;
9726 assert(i < order_ && "ViewCMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
9727 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to ViewCMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
9728 return dims_[i];
9729}
9730
9731template <typename T>
9732KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9733size_t ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::order() const {
9734 return order_;
9735}
9736
9737template <typename T>
9738KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9739T* ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::pointer() const {
9740 return this_matrix_;
9741}
9742
9743template <typename T>
9744KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9745ViewCMatrixKokkos<T>::~ViewCMatrixKokkos() {}
9746
9748// End of ViewCMatrixKokkos
9750
9752// DCArrayKokkos: Dual type for managing data on both CPU and GPU.
9754template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
9755class DCArrayKokkos {
9756
9757 // this is manage
9758 using TArray1D = Kokkos::DualView <T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
9759
9760private:
9761 size_t dims_[7];
9762 size_t length_;
9763 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
9764 TArray1D this_array_;
9765
9766public:
9767 DCArrayKokkos();
9768
9769 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9770
9771 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9772
9773 DCArrayKokkos (size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9774
9775 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9776 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9777
9778 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9779 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9780
9781 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9782 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9783
9784 DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
9785 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
9786 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
9787
9788 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9789 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
9790
9791 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9792 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
9793
9794 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9795 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
9796
9797 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9798 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
9799
9800 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9801 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
9802
9803 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9804 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
9805 size_t n) const;
9806
9807 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9808 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
9809 size_t n, size_t o) const;
9810
9811 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9812 DCArrayKokkos& operator=(const DCArrayKokkos& temp);
9813
9814 // GPU Method
9815 // Method that returns size
9816 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9817 size_t size() const;
9818
9819 // Host Method
9820 // Method that returns size
9821 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9822 size_t extent() const;
9823
9824 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9825 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
9826
9827 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
