9828 size_t order() const;
9829
9830 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos DualView
9831 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9832 T* device_pointer() const;
9833
9834 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos DualView
9835 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9836 T* host_pointer() const;
9837
9838 // Method returns kokkos dual view
9839 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9840 TArray1D get_kokkos_dual_view() const;
9841
9842 // Data member to access host view
9843 ViewCArray <T> host;
9844
9845 // Method that update host view
9846 void update_host();
9847
9848 // Method that update device view
9849 void update_device();
9850
9851 // Deconstructor
9852 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9853 ~DCArrayKokkos ();
9854}; // End of DCArrayKokkos
9855
9856
9857// Default constructor
9858template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9859DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos() {}
9860
9861// Overloaded 1D constructor
9862template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9863DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, const std::string& tag_string) {
9864
9865 dims_[0] = dim0;
9866 order_ = 1;
9867 length_ = dim0;
9868 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9869 // Create host ViewCArray
9870 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0);
9871}
9872
9873// Overloaded 2D constructor
9874template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9875DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
9876
9877 dims_[0] = dim0;
9878 dims_[1] = dim1;
9879 order_ = 2;
9880 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
9881 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9882 // Create host ViewCArray
9883 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1);
9884}
9885
9886template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9887DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
9888 size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
9889
9890 dims_[0] = dim0;
9891 dims_[1] = dim1;
9892 dims_[2] = dim2;
9893 order_ = 3;
9894 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
9895 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9896 // Create host ViewCArray
9897 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2);
9898}
9899
9900template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9901DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
9902 size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
9903
9904 dims_[0] = dim0;
9905 dims_[1] = dim1;
9906 dims_[2] = dim2;
9907 dims_[3] = dim3;
9908 order_ = 4;
9909 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
9910 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9911 // Create host ViewCArray
9912 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3);
9913}
9914
9915template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9916DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
9917 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9918 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
9919
9920 dims_[0] = dim0;
9921 dims_[1] = dim1;
9922 dims_[2] = dim2;
9923 dims_[3] = dim3;
9924 dims_[4] = dim4;
9925 order_ = 5;
9926 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
9927 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9928 // Create host ViewCArray
9929 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
9930}
9931
9932template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9933DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
9934 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9935 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
9936
9937 dims_[0] = dim0;
9938 dims_[1] = dim1;
9939 dims_[2] = dim2;
9940 dims_[3] = dim3;
9941 dims_[4] = dim4;
9942 dims_[5] = dim5;
9943 order_ = 6;
9944 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
9945 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9946 // Create host ViewCArray
9947 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
9948}
9949
9950template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9951DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCArrayKokkos(size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
9952 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
9953 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
9954 size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
9955
9956 dims_[0] = dim0;
9957 dims_[1] = dim1;
9958 dims_[2] = dim2;
9959 dims_[3] = dim3;
9960 dims_[4] = dim4;
9961 dims_[5] = dim5;
9962 dims_[6] = dim6;
9963 order_ = 7;
9964 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
9965 this_array_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
9966 // Create host ViewCArray
9967 host = ViewCArray <T> (this_array_.h_view.data(), dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
9968}
9969
9970template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9971KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9972T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
9973 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 1D!");
9974 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 1D!");
9975 return this_array_.d_view(i);
9976}
9977
9978template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9979KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9980T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
9981 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 2D!");
9982 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 2D!");
9983 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 2D!");
9984 return this_array_.d_view(j + (i * dims_[1]));
9985}
9986
9987template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9988KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
9989T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
9990 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 3D!");
9991 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 3D!");
9992 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 3D!");
9993 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 3D!");
9994 return this_array_.d_view(k + (j * dims_[2])
9995 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
9996}
9997
9998template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
9999KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10000T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
10001 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10002 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10003 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10004 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10005 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10006 return this_array_.d_view(l + (k * dims_[3])
10007 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10008 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10009}
10010
10011template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10012KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10013T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10014 size_t m) const {
10015 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10016 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10017 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10018 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10019 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10020 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10021 return this_array_.d_view(m + (l * dims_[4])
10022 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10023 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10024 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10025}
10026
10027template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10028KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10029T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10030 size_t m, size_t n) const {
10031 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10032 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10033 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10034 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10035 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10036 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10037 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10038 return this_array_.d_view(n + (m * dims_[5])
10039 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10040 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10041 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10042 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10043}
10044
10045template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10046KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10047T& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10048 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
10049 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10050 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10051 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10052 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10053 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10054 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10055 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10056 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10057 return this_array_.d_view(o + (n * dims_[6])
10058 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
10059 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10060 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10061 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10062 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10063}
10064
10065template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10066KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10067DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DCArrayKokkos& temp) {
10068
10069 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
10070 if (this != &temp) {
10071 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
10072 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
10073 } // end for
10074
10075 order_ = temp.order_;
10076 length_ = temp.length_;
10077 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
10078 host = temp.host;
10079 }
10080
10081 return *this;
10082}
10083
10084// Return size
10085template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10086KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10087size_t DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
10088 return length_;
10089}
10090
10091template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10092KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10093size_t DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
10094 return length_;
10095}
10096
10097template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10098KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10099size_t DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
10100 assert(i < order_ && "DCArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
10101 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DCArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
10102 return dims_[i];
10103}
10104
10105template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10106KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10107size_t DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
10108 return order_;
10109}
10110
10111template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10112KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10113T* DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
10114 return this_array_.d_view.data();
10115}
10116
10117template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10118KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10119T* DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
10120 return this_array_.h_view.data();
10121}
10122
10123template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10124KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10125Kokkos::DualView <T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_dual_view() const {
10126 return this_array_;
10127}
10128
10129template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10130void DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
10131
10132 this_array_.template modify<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
10133 this_array_.template sync<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
10134}
10135
10136template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10137void DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
10138
10139 this_array_.template modify<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
10140 this_array_.template sync<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
10141}
10142
10143template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10144KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10145DCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DCArrayKokkos() {}
10146// End DCArrayKokkos
10147
10148
10150// DViewCArrayKokkos
10152template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
10153class DViewCArrayKokkos {
10154
10155 // this is always unmanaged
10156 using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
10157 // this is manage
10158 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
10159
10160private:
10161 size_t dims_[7];
10162 size_t length_;
10163 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
10164 TArray1D this_array_;
10165 TArray1DHost this_array_host_;
10166 T * temp_inp_array_;
10167 //typename Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>::HostMirror h_this_array_;
10168
10169public:
10170 DViewCArrayKokkos();
10171
10172 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0);
10173
10174 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1);
10175
10176 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
10177
10178 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10179 size_t dim3);
10180
10181 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10182 size_t dim3, size_t dim4);
10183
10184 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10185 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
10186
10187 DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10188 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
10189 size_t dim6);
10190
10191 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10192 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
10193
10194 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10195 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
10196
10197 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10198 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
10199
10200 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10201 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
10202
10203 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10204 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
10205
10206 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10207 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
10208 size_t n) const;
10209
10210 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10211 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
10212 size_t n, size_t o) const;
10213
10214 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10215 DViewCArrayKokkos& operator=(const DViewCArrayKokkos& temp);
10216
10217 // GPU Method
10218 // Method that returns size
10219 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10220 size_t size() const;
10221
10222 // Host Method
10223 // Method that returns size
10224 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10225 size_t extent() const;
10226
10227 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10228 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
10229
10230 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10231 size_t order() const;
10232
10233 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos View
10234 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10235 T* device_pointer() const;
10236
10237 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos View
10238 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10239 T* host_pointer() const;
10240
10241 // Data member to access host view
10242 ViewCArray <T> host;
10243
10244 // Method that update host view
10245 void update_host();
10246
10247 // Method that update device view
10248 void update_device();
10249
10250 // Deconstructor
10251 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10252 ~DViewCArrayKokkos ();
10253}; // End of DViewCArrayKokkos
10254
10255
10256// Default constructor
10257template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10258DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos() {}
10259
10260// Overloaded 1D constructor
10261template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10262DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0) {
10263 //using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
10264 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
10265
10266 dims_[0] = dim0;
10267 order_ = 1;
10268 length_ = dim0;
10269 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10270 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10271 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10272 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10273 // Create a device copy of that host view
10274 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10275 // Create host ViewCArray. Note: inp_array and this_array_host_.data() are the same pointer
10276 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0);
10277}
10278
10279// Overloaded 2D constructor
10280template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10281DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1) {
10282 //using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
10283 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
10284 //using TArray1Dtemp = TArray1D::HostMirror;
10285
10286 dims_[0] = dim0;
10287 dims_[1] = dim1;
10288 order_ = 2;
10289 length_ = (dim0 * dim1);
10290 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10291 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10292 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10293 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10294 // Create a device copy of that host view
10295 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10296 // Create host ViewCArray
10297 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1);
10298}
10299
10300template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10301DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
10302 size_t dim2) {
10303 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
10304
10305 dims_[0] = dim0;
10306 dims_[1] = dim1;
10307 dims_[2] = dim2;
10308 order_ = 3;
10309 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2);
10310 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10311 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10312 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10313 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10314 // Create a device copy of that host view
10315 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10316 // Create host ViewCArray
10317 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2);
10318}
10319
10320template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10321DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
10322 size_t dim2, size_t dim3) {
10323 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
10324
10325 dims_[0] = dim0;
10326 dims_[1] = dim1;
10327 dims_[2] = dim2;
10328 dims_[3] = dim3;
10329 order_ = 4;
10330 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
10331 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10332 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10333 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10334 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10335 // Create a device copy of that host view
10336 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10337 // Create host ViewCArray
10338 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3);
10339}
10340
10341template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10342DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
10343 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10344 size_t dim4) {
10345
10346 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
10347
10348 dims_[0] = dim0;
10349 dims_[1] = dim1;
10350 dims_[2] = dim2;
10351 dims_[3] = dim3;
10352 dims_[4] = dim4;
10353 order_ = 5;
10354 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
10355 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10356 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10357 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10358 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10359 // Create a device copy of that host view
10360 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10361 // Create host ViewCArray
10362 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
10363}
10364
10365template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10366DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
10367 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10368 size_t dim4, size_t dim5) {
10369 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
10370
10371 dims_[0] = dim0;
10372 dims_[1] = dim1;
10373 dims_[2] = dim2;
10374 dims_[3] = dim3;
10375 dims_[4] = dim4;
10376 dims_[5] = dim5;
10377 order_ = 6;
10378 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
10379 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10380 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10381 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10382 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10383 // Create a device copy of that host view
10384 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10385 // Create host ViewCArray
10386 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
10387}
10388
10389template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10390DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCArrayKokkos(T * inp_array, size_t dim0, size_t dim1,
10391 size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10392 size_t dim4, size_t dim5,
10393 size_t dim6) {
10394 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
10395
10396 dims_[0] = dim0;
10397 dims_[1] = dim1;
10398 dims_[2] = dim2;
10399 dims_[3] = dim3;
10400 dims_[4] = dim4;
10401 dims_[5] = dim5;
10402 dims_[6] = dim6;
10403 order_ = 7;
10404 length_ = (dim0 * dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
10405 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
10406 this_array_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_array, length_);
10407 // Assign temp point to inp_array pointer that is passed in
10408 temp_inp_array_ = inp_array;
10409 // Create a device copy of that host view
10410 this_array_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_array_host_);
10411 // Create host ViewCArray
10412 host = ViewCArray <T> (inp_array, dim0, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
10413}
10414
10415template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10416KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10417T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
10418 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 1D!");
10419 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 1D!");
10420 return this_array_(i);
10421}
10422
10423template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10424KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10425T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
10426 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
10427 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
10428 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 2D!");
10429 return this_array_(j + (i * dims_[1]));
10430}
10431
10432template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10433KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10434T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
10435 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
10436 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
10437 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
10438 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 3D!");
10439 return this_array_(k + (j * dims_[2])
10440 + (i * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10441}
10442
10443template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10444KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10445T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
10446 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10447 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10448 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10449 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10450 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 4D!");
10451 return this_array_(l + (k * dims_[3])
10452 + (j * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10453 + (i * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10454}
10455
10456template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10457KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10458T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10459 size_t m) const {
10460 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10461 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10462 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10463 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10464 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10465 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 5D!");
10466 return this_array_(m + (l * dims_[4])
10467 + (k * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10468 + (j * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10469 + (i * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10470}
10471
10472template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10473KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10474T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10475 size_t m, size_t n) const {
10476 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10477 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10478 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10479 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10480 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10481 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10482 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 6D!");
10483 return this_array_(n + (m * dims_[5])
10484 + (l * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10485 + (k * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10486 + (j * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10487 + (i * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10488}
10489
10490template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10491KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10492T& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10493 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
10494 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10495 assert(i >= 0 && i < dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10496 assert(j >= 0 && j < dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10497 assert(k >= 0 && k < dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10498 assert(l >= 0 && l < dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10499 assert(m >= 0 && m < dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10500 assert(n >= 0 && n < dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10501 assert(o >= 0 && o < dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DViewCArrayKokkos 7D!");
10502 return this_array_(o + (n * dims_[6])
10503 + (m * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
10504 + (l * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10505 + (k * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10506 + (j * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10507 + (i * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10508}
10509
10510template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10511KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10512DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DViewCArrayKokkos& temp) {
10513 //using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
10514
10515 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
10516 if (this != &temp) {
10517 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
10518 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
10519 } // end for
10520
10521 order_ = temp.order_;
10522 length_ = temp.length_;
10523 temp_inp_array_ = temp.temp_inp_array_;
10524 this_array_host_ = temp.this_array_host_;
10525 this_array_ = temp.this_array_;
10526 host = temp.host;
10527 }
10528
10529 return *this;
10530}
10531
10532// Return size
10533template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10534KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10535size_t DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
10536 return length_;
10537}
10538
10539template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10540KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10541size_t DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
10542 return length_;
10543}
10544
10545template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10546KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10547size_t DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
10548 assert(i < order_ && "DViewCArrayKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
10549 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DViewCArrayKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
10550 return dims_[i];
10551}
10552
10553template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10554KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10555size_t DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
10556 return order_;
10557}
10558
10559template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10560KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10561T* DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
10562 return this_array_.data();
10563}
10564
10565template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10566KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10567T* DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
10568 return this_array_host_.data();
10569}
10570
10571template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10572void DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
10573 // Deep copy of device view to host view
10574 deep_copy(this_array_host_, this_array_);
10575}
10576
10577template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10578void DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
10579 // Deep copy of host view to device view
10580 deep_copy(this_array_, this_array_host_);
10581}
10582
10583template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10584KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10585DViewCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DViewCArrayKokkos() {}
10586// End DViewCArrayKokkos
10587
10588
10590// DCMatrixKokkos
10592template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
10593class DCMatrixKokkos {
10594
10595 // this is manage
10596 using TArray1D = Kokkos::DualView<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
10597
10598private:
10599 size_t dims_[7];
10600 size_t length_;
10601 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
10602 TArray1D this_matrix_;
10603
10604public:
10605 DCMatrixKokkos();
10606
10607 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10608
10609 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10610
10611 DCMatrixKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10612
10613 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10614 size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10615
10616 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10617 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10618
10619 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10620 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10621
10622 DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
10623 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
10624 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGMATRIX);
10625
10626 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10627 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
10628
10629 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10630 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
10631
10632 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10633 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
10634
10635 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10636 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
10637
10638 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10639 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
10640
10641 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10642 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
10643 size_t n) const;
10644
10645 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10646 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
10647 size_t n, size_t o) const;
10648
10649 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10650 DCMatrixKokkos& operator=(const DCMatrixKokkos& temp);
10651
10652 // GPU Method
10653 // Method that returns size
10654 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10655 size_t size() const;
10656
10657 // Host Method
10658 // Method that returns size
10659 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10660 size_t extent() const;
10661
10662 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10663 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
10664
10665 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10666 size_t order() const;
10667
10668 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos DualView
10669 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10670 T* device_pointer() const;
10671
10672 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos DualView
10673 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10674 T* host_pointer() const;
10675
10676 // Data member to access host view
10677 ViewCMatrix <T> host;
10678
10679 // Method that update host view
10680 void update_host();
10681
10682 // Method that update device view
10683 void update_device();
10684
10685 // Deconstructor
10686 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10687 ~DCMatrixKokkos ();
10688
10689}; // End of DCMatrixKokkos declarations
10690
10691// Default constructor
10692template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10693DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos() {}
10694
10695// Overloaded 1D constructor
10696template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10697DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, const std::string& tag_string) {
10698
10699 dims_[0] = dim1;
10700 order_ = 1;
10701 length_ = dim1;
10702 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10703 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10704 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1);
10705}
10706
10707// Overloaded 2D constructor
10708template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10709DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
10710
10711 dims_[0] = dim1;
10712 dims_[1] = dim2;
10713 order_ = 2;
10714 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
10715 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10716 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10717 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2);
10718}
10719
10720template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10721DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10722 size_t dim3, const std::string& tag_string) {
10723
10724 dims_[0] = dim1;
10725 dims_[1] = dim2;
10726 dims_[2] = dim3;
10727 order_ = 3;
10728 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
10729 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10730 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10731 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3);
10732}
10733
10734template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10735DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10736 size_t dim3, size_t dim4, const std::string& tag_string) {
10737
10738 dims_[0] = dim1;
10739 dims_[1] = dim2;
10740 dims_[2] = dim3;
10741 dims_[3] = dim4;
10742 order_ = 4;
10743 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
10744 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10745 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10746 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
10747}
10748
10749template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10750DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10751 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
10752 size_t dim5, const std::string& tag_string) {
10753
10754 dims_[0] = dim1;
10755 dims_[1] = dim2;
10756 dims_[2] = dim3;
10757 dims_[3] = dim4;
10758 dims_[4] = dim5;
10759 order_ = 5;
10760 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
10761 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10762 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10763 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
10764}
10765
10766template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10767DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10768 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
10769 size_t dim5, size_t dim6, const std::string& tag_string) {
10770
10771 dims_[0] = dim1;
10772 dims_[1] = dim2;
10773 dims_[2] = dim3;
10774 dims_[3] = dim4;
10775 dims_[4] = dim5;
10776 dims_[5] = dim6;
10777 order_ = 6;
10778 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
10779 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10780 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10781 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
10782}
10783
10784template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10785DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DCMatrixKokkos(size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
10786 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
10787 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
10788 size_t dim7, const std::string& tag_string) {
10789
10790 dims_[0] = dim1;
10791 dims_[1] = dim2;
10792 dims_[2] = dim3;
10793 dims_[3] = dim4;
10794 dims_[4] = dim5;
10795 dims_[5] = dim6;
10796 dims_[6] = dim7;
10797 order_ = 7;
10798 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
10799 this_matrix_ = TArray1D(tag_string, length_);
10800 // Create host ViewCMatrix
10801 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (this_matrix_.h_view.data(), dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6, dim7);
10802}
10803
10804template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10805KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10806T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
10807 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
10808 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
10809 return this_matrix_.d_view((i - 1));
10810}
10811
10812template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10813KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10814T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
10815 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
10816 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
10817 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
10818 return this_matrix_.d_view((j - 1) + ((i - 1) * dims_[1]));
10819}
10820
10821template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10822KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10823T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
10824 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
10825 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
10826 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
10827 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
10828 return this_matrix_.d_view((k - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[2])
10829 + ((i - 1) * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10830}
10831
10832template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10833KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10834T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
10835 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
10836 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
10837 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
10838 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
10839 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
10840 return this_matrix_.d_view((l - 1) + ((k - 1) * dims_[3])
10841 + ((j - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10842 + ((i - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10843}
10844
10845template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10846KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10847T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10848 size_t m) const {
10849 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10850 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10851 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10852 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10853 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10854 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
10855 return this_matrix_.d_view((m - 1) + ((l - 1) * dims_[4])
10856 + ((k - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10857 + ((j - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10858 + ((i - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10859}
10860
10861template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10862KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10863T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10864 size_t m, size_t n) const {
10865 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10866 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10867 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10868 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10869 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10870 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10871 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
10872 return this_matrix_.d_view((n - 1) + ((m - 1) * dims_[5])
10873 + ((l - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10874 + ((k - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10875 + ((j - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10876 + ((i - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10877}
10878
10879template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10880KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10881T& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
10882 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
10883 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10884 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10885 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10886 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10887 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10888 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10889 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10890 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
10891 return this_matrix_.d_view((o-1) + ((n - 1) * dims_[6])
10892 + ((m - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
10893 + ((l - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
10894 + ((k - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
10895 + ((j - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
10896 + ((i - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
10897}
10898
10899template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10900KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10901DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DCMatrixKokkos& temp) {
10902
10903 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
10904 if (this != &temp) {
10905 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
10906 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
10907 } // end for
10908
10909 order_ = temp.order_;
10910 length_ = temp.length_;
10911 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
10912 host = temp.host;
10913 }
10914
10915 return *this;
10916}
10917
10918// Return size
10919template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10920KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10921size_t DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
10922 return length_;
10923}
10924
10925template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10926KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10927size_t DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
10928 return length_;
10929}
10930
10931template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10932KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10933size_t DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
10934 i--;
10935 assert(i < order_ && "DCMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
10936 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DCMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
10937 return dims_[i];
10938}
10939
10940template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10941KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10942size_t DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
10943 return order_;
10944}
10945
10946template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10947KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10948T* DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
10949 return this_matrix_.d_view.data();
10950}
10951
10952template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10953KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10954T* DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
10955 return this_matrix_.h_view.data();
10956}
10957
10958template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10959void DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
10960
10961 this_matrix_.template modify<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
10962 this_matrix_.template sync<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
10963}
10964
10965template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10966void DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
10967
10968 this_matrix_.template modify<typename TArray1D::host_mirror_space>();
10969 this_matrix_.template sync<typename TArray1D::execution_space>();
10970}
10971
10972template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
10973KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
10974DCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DCMatrixKokkos() {}
10975// End DCMatrixKokkos
10976
10977
10979// DViewCMatrixKokkos
10981template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
10982class DViewCMatrixKokkos {
10983
10984 // this is always unmanaged
10985 using TArray1DHost = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, HostSpace, MemoryUnmanaged>;
10986 // this is manage
10987 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
10988
10989private:
10990 size_t dims_[7];
10991 size_t length_;
10992 size_t order_; // tensor order (rank)
10993 TArray1D this_matrix_;
10994 TArray1DHost this_matrix_host_;
10995 T * temp_inp_matrix_;
10996
10997public:
10998 DViewCMatrixKokkos();
10999
11000 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1);
11001
11002 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2);
11003
11004 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3);
11005
11006 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
11007 size_t dim4);
11008
11009 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
11010 size_t dim4, size_t dim5);
11011
11012 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
11013 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6);
11014
11015 DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2, size_t dim3,
11016 size_t dim4, size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
11017 size_t dim7);
11018
11019 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11020 T& operator()(size_t i) const;
11021
11022 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11023 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
11024
11025 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11026 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
11027
11028 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11029 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const;
11030
11031 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11032 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m) const;
11033
11034 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11035 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
11036 size_t n) const;
11037
11038 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11039 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l, size_t m,
11040 size_t n, size_t o) const;
11041
11042 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11043 DViewCMatrixKokkos& operator=(const DViewCMatrixKokkos& temp);
11044
11045 // GPU Method
11046 // Method that returns size
11047 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11048 size_t size() const;
11049
11050 // Host Method
11051 // Method that returns size
11052 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11053 size_t extent() const;
11054
11055 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11056 size_t dims(size_t i) const;
11057
11058 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11059 size_t order() const;
11060
11061 // Method returns the raw device pointer of the Kokkos View
11062 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11063 T* device_pointer() const;
11064
11065 // Method returns the raw host pointer of the Kokkos View
11066 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11067 T* host_pointer() const;
11068
11069 // Data member to access host view
11070 ViewCMatrix <T> host;
11071
11072 // Method that update host view
11073 void update_host();
11074
11075 // Method that update device view
11076 void update_device();
11077
11078 // Deconstructor
11079 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11080 ~DViewCMatrixKokkos ();
11081}; // End of DViewCMatrixKokkos
11082
11083
11084// Default constructor
11085template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11086DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos() {}
11087
11088// Overloaded 1D constructor
11089template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11090DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1) {
11091
11092 dims_[0] = dim1;
11093 order_ = 1;
11094 length_ = dim1;
11095 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11096 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11097 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11098 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11099 // Create a device copy of that host view
11100 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11101 // Create host ViewCMatrix. Note: inp_matrix and this_matrix_host_.data() are the same pointer
11102 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1);
11103}
11104
11105// Overloaded 2D constructor
11106template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11107DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2) {
11108
11109 dims_[0] = dim1;
11110 dims_[1] = dim2;
11111 order_ = 2;
11112 length_ = (dim1 * dim2);
11113 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11114 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11115 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11116 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11117 // Create a device copy of that host view
11118 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11119 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11120 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2);
11121}
11122
11123template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11124DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
11125 size_t dim3) {
11126
11127 dims_[0] = dim1;
11128 dims_[1] = dim2;
11129 dims_[2] = dim3;
11130 order_ = 3;
11131 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3);
11132 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11133 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11134 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11135 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11136 // Create a device copy of that host view
11137 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11138 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11139 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3);
11140}
11141
11142template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11143DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
11144 size_t dim3, size_t dim4) {
11145
11146 dims_[0] = dim1;
11147 dims_[1] = dim2;
11148 dims_[2] = dim3;
11149 dims_[3] = dim4;
11150 order_ = 4;
11151 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4);
11152 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11153 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11154 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11155 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11156 // Create a device copy of that host view
11157 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11158 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11159 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4);
11160}
11161
11162template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11163DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
11164 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
11165 size_t dim5) {
11166
11167 dims_[0] = dim1;
11168 dims_[1] = dim2;
11169 dims_[2] = dim3;
11170 dims_[3] = dim4;
11171 dims_[4] = dim5;
11172 order_ = 5;
11173 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5);
11174 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11175 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11176 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11177 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11178 // Create a device copy of that host view
11179 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11180 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11181 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5);
11182}
11183
11184template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11185DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
11186 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
11187 size_t dim5, size_t dim6) {
11188
11189 dims_[0] = dim1;
11190 dims_[1] = dim2;
11191 dims_[2] = dim3;
11192 dims_[3] = dim4;
11193 dims_[4] = dim5;
11194 dims_[5] = dim6;
11195 order_ = 6;
11196 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6);
11197 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11198 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11199 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11200 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11201 // Create a device copy of that host view
11202 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11203 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11204 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6);
11205}
11206
11207template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11208DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DViewCMatrixKokkos(T * inp_matrix, size_t dim1, size_t dim2,
11209 size_t dim3, size_t dim4,
11210 size_t dim5, size_t dim6,
11211 size_t dim7) {
11212
11213 dims_[0] = dim1;
11214 dims_[1] = dim2;
11215 dims_[2] = dim3;
11216 dims_[3] = dim4;
11217 dims_[4] = dim5;
11218 dims_[5] = dim6;
11219 dims_[6] = dim7;
11220 order_ = 7;
11221 length_ = (dim1 * dim2 * dim3 * dim4 * dim5 * dim6 * dim7);
11222 // Create a 1D host view of the external allocation
11223 this_matrix_host_ = TArray1DHost(inp_matrix, length_);
11224 // Assign temp point to inp_matrix pointer that is passed in
11225 temp_inp_matrix_ = inp_matrix;
11226 // Create a device copy of that host view
11227 this_matrix_ = create_mirror_view_and_copy(ExecSpace(), this_matrix_host_);
11228 // Create host ViewCMatrix
11229 host = ViewCMatrix <T> (inp_matrix, dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, dim6, dim7);
11230}
11231
11232template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11233KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11234T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i) const {
11235 assert(order_ == 1 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
11236 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 1D!");
11237 return this_matrix_((i - 1));
11238}
11239
11240template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11241KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11242T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
11243 assert(order_ == 2 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
11244 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
11245 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 2D!");
11246 return this_matrix_((j - 1) + ((i - 1) * dims_[1]));
11247}
11248
11249template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11250KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11251T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
11252 assert(order_ == 3 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
11253 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
11254 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
11255 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 3D!");
11256 return this_matrix_((k - 1) + ((j - 1) * dims_[2])
11257 + ((i - 1) * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
11258}
11259
11260template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11261KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11262T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l) const {
11263 assert(order_ == 4 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
11264 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
11265 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
11266 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
11267 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 4D!");
11268 return this_matrix_((l - 1) + ((k - 1) * dims_[3])
11269 + ((j - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
11270 + ((i - 1) * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
11271}
11272
11273template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11274KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11275T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
11276 size_t m) const {
11277 assert(order_ == 5 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11278 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11279 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11280 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11281 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11282 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 5D!");
11283 return this_matrix_((m - 1) + ((l - 1) * dims_[4])
11284 + ((k - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
11285 + ((j - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
11286 + ((i - 1) * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
11287}
11288
11289template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11290KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11291T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
11292 size_t m, size_t n) const {
11293 assert(order_ == 6 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11294 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11295 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11296 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11297 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11298 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11299 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 6D!");
11300 return this_matrix_((n - 1) + ((m - 1) * dims_[5])
11301 + ((l - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
11302 + ((k - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
11303 + ((j - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
11304 + ((i - 1) * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
11305}
11306
11307template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11308KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11309T& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k, size_t l,
11310 size_t m, size_t n, size_t o) const {
11311 assert(order_ == 7 && "Tensor order (rank) does not match constructor in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11312 assert(i >= 1 && i <= dims_[0] && "i is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11313 assert(j >= 1 && j <= dims_[1] && "j is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11314 assert(k >= 1 && k <= dims_[2] && "k is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11315 assert(l >= 1 && l <= dims_[3] && "l is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11316 assert(m >= 1 && m <= dims_[4] && "m is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11317 assert(n >= 1 && n <= dims_[5] && "n is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11318 assert(o >= 1 && o <= dims_[6] && "o is out of bounds in DViewCMatrixKokkos 7D!");
11319 return this_matrix_(o + ((n - 1) * dims_[6])
11320 + ((m - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5])
11321 + ((l - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4])
11322 + ((k - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3])
11323 + ((j - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2])
11324 + ((i - 1) * dims_[6] * dims_[5] * dims_[4] * dims_[3] * dims_[2] * dims_[1]));
11325}
11326
11327template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11328KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11329DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>& DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DViewCMatrixKokkos& temp) {
11330
11331 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
11332 if (this != &temp) {
11333 for (int iter = 0; iter < temp.order_; iter++){
11334 dims_[iter] = temp.dims_[iter];
11335 } // end for
11336
11337 order_ = temp.order_;
11338 length_ = temp.length_;
11339 temp_inp_matrix_ = temp.temp_inp_matrix_;
11340 this_matrix_host_ = temp.this_matrix_host_;
11341 this_matrix_ = temp.this_matrix_;
11342 host = temp.host;
11343 }
11344
11345 return *this;
11346}
11347
11348// Return size
11349template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11350KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11351size_t DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const {
11352 return length_;
11353}
11354
11355template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11356KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11357size_t DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::extent() const {
11358 return length_;
11359}
11360
11361template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11362KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11363size_t DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::dims(size_t i) const {
11364 i--;
11365 assert(i < order_ && "DViewCMatrixKokkos order (rank) does not match constructor, dim[i] does not exist!");
11366 assert(i >= 0 && dims_[i]>0 && "Access to DViewCMatrixKokkos dims is out of bounds!");
11367 return dims_[i];
11368}
11369
11370template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11371KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11372size_t DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::order() const {
11373 return order_;
11374}
11375
11376template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11377KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11378T* DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::device_pointer() const {
11379 return this_matrix_.data();
11380}
11381
11382template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11383KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11384T* DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::host_pointer() const {
11385 return this_matrix_host_.data();
11386}
11387
11388template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11389void DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_host() {
11390 // Deep copy of device view to host view
11391 deep_copy(this_matrix_host_, this_matrix_);
11392}
11393
11394template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11395void DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::update_device() {
11396 // Deep copy of host view to device view
11397 deep_copy(this_matrix_, this_matrix_host_);
11398}
11399
11400template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
11401KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11402DViewCMatrixKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DViewCMatrixKokkos() {}
11403// End DViewCMatrixKokkos
11404
11405
11409template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace,
11410 typename MemoryTraits = void, typename ILayout = Layout>
11411class RaggedRightArrayKokkos {
11412
11413 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11414 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11415 using Strides1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,ILayout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11416
11417private:
11418 TArray1D array_;
11419
11420 size_t dim1_;
11421 size_t length_;
11422
11423public:
11424 // Default constructor
11425 RaggedRightArrayKokkos();
11426
11427 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
11428
11429 // Overload constructor for a CArrayKokkos
11430 RaggedRightArrayKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11431
11432 // Overload constructor for a DCArrayKokkos
11433 RaggedRightArrayKokkos(DCArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11434
11435 // Overload constructor for a ViewCArray
11436 RaggedRightArrayKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11437
11438 // Overloaded constructor for a traditional array
11439 RaggedRightArrayKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim1, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11440
11441 // A method to return the stride size
11442 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11443 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
11444
11445 // Host method to return the stride size
11446 size_t stride_host(size_t i) const;
11447
11448 // A method to increase the number of column entries, i.e.,
11449 // the stride size. Used with the constructor for building
11450 // the stride_array dynamically.
11451 // DO NOT USE with the constructures with a strides_array
11452 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11453 size_t& build_stride(const size_t i) const;
11454
11455 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11456 void stride_finalize() const;
11457
11458 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
11459 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
11460 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11461 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
11462
11463 // method to return total size
11464 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11465 size_t size(){
11466 return length_;
11467 }
11468
11469 //setup start indices
11470 void data_setup(const std::string& tag_string);
11471
11472 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11473 T* pointer();
11474
11475 //return the view
11476 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11477 TArray1D get_kokkos_view();
11478
11479 // Kokkos views of strides and start indices
11480 Strides1D mystrides_;
11481 SArray1D start_index_;
11482
11483 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11484 RaggedRightArrayKokkos& operator= (const RaggedRightArrayKokkos &temp);
11485
11486 //initialize start indices view
11487 class init_start_indices_functor{
11488 public:
11489 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11490 init_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
11491 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11492 }
11493 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
11494 mystart_index_(index) = 0;
11495 }
11496 };
11497
11498 //setup start indices view
11499 class setup_start_indices_functor{
11500 public:
11501 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11502 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
11503 setup_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_, Strides1D temp_strides_){
11504 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11505 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
11506 }
11507 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, int& update, bool final) const {
11508 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11509 const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index);
11510 update += count;
11511 if (final) {
11512 mystart_index_((index+1)) = update;
11513 }
11514 }
11515 };
11516
11517 //setup length of view
11518 class setup_length_functor{
11519 public:
11520 //kokkos needs this typedef named
11521 typedef size_t value_type;
11522 // This is helpful for determining the right index type,
11523 // especially if you expect to need a 64-bit index.
11524 //typedef Kokkos::View<size_t*>::size_type size_type;
11525 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
11526 setup_length_functor(Strides1D temp_strides_){
11527 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
11528 }
11529 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, size_t& update) const {
11530 //const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index);
11531 update += mytemp_strides_(index);
11532 }
11533 };
11534
11535 //sets final 1D array size
11536 class finalize_stride_functor{
11537 public:
11538 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11539 finalize_stride_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
11540 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11541 }
11542 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, int& update, bool final) const {
11543 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11544 const size_t count = mystart_index_(index+1);
11545 update += count;
11546 if (final) {
11547 mystart_index_((index+1)) = update;
11548 }
11549 }
11550 };
11551
11552 // Destructor
11553 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11554 ~RaggedRightArrayKokkos ( );
11555}; // End of RaggedRightArray
11556
11557template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11558RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayKokkos() {}
11559
11560// Overloaded constructor
11561template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11562RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &strides_array,
11563 const std::string& tag_string) {
11564 mystrides_ = strides_array.get_kokkos_view();
11565 dim1_ = strides_array.extent();
11566 data_setup(tag_string);
11567} // End constructor
11568
11569// Overloaded constructor
11570template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11571RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayKokkos(DCArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &strides_array,
11572 const std::string& tag_string) {
11573 mystrides_ = strides_array.get_kokkos_dual_view().d_view;
11574 dim1_ = strides_array.extent();
11575 data_setup(tag_string);
11576} // End constructor
11577
11578// Overloaded constructor
11579template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11580RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array,
11581 const std::string& tag_string) {
11582} // End constructor
11583
11584// Overloaded constructor
11585template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11586RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim1,
11587 const std::string& tag_string) {
11588 mystrides_.assign_data(strides_array);
11589 dim1_ = some_dim1;
11590 data_setup(tag_string);
11591} // End constructor
11592
11593//setup start indices
11594template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11595void RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::data_setup(const std::string& tag_string) {
11596 //allocate start indices
11597 std::string append_indices_string("start_indices");
11598 std::string append_array_string("array");
11599 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
11600 std::string start_index_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_indices_string);
11601 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
11602 std::string array_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_array_string);
11603
11604 start_index_ = SArray1D(start_index_tag_string,dim1_ + 1);
11605 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
11606 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
11607 start_index_((i) = 0;
11608 });
11609 #else
11610 init_start_indices_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
11611 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1,execution_functor);
11612 #endif
11613
11614 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
11615 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update, const bool final) {
11616 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11617 const size_t count = mystrides_(i);
11618 update += count;
11619 if (final) {
11620 start_index_((i+1)) = update;
11621 }
11622
11623 });
11624 #else
11625 setup_start_indices_functor setup_execution_functor(start_index_, mystrides_);
11626 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim1_,setup_execution_functor);
11627 #endif
11628
11629 //compute length of the storage
11630 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
11631 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update) {
11632 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11633 update += mystrides_(i);
11634 }, length_);
11635 #else
11636 setup_length_functor length_functor(mystrides_);
11637 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim1_, length_functor, length_);
11638 #endif
11639
11640 //allocate view
11641 array_ = TArray1D(array_tag_string, length_);
11642}
11643
11644// A method to return the stride size
11645template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11646KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11647size_t RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::stride(size_t i) const {
11648 // Ensure that i is within bounds
11649 assert(i < (dim1_) && "i is greater than dim1_ in RaggedRightArray");
11650 return mystrides_(i);
11651}
11652
11653// Method to build the stride (non-Kokkos push back)
11654template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11655KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11656size_t& RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::build_stride(const size_t i) const {
11657 return start_index_(i+1);
11658}
11659
11660// Method to finalize stride
11661template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11662KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11663void RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::stride_finalize() const {
11664
11665 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
