11666 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update, const bool final) {
11667 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11668 const size_t count = start_index_(i+1);
11669 update += count;
11670 if (final) {
11671 start_index_((i+1)) = update;
11672 }
11673
11674 });
11675 #else
11676 finalize_stride_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
11677 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim1_,execution_functor);
11678 #endif
11679 Kokkos::fence();
11680}
11681
11682
11683// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
11684// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
11685template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11686KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11687T& RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
11688 // Get the 1D array index
11689 size_t start = start_index_(i);
11690
11691 // asserts
11692 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in RaggedRightArrayKokkos"); // die if >= dim1
11693 assert(j < stride(i) && "j is out of stride bounds in RaggedRightArrayKokkos"); // die if >= stride
11694
11695 return array_(j + start);
11696} // End operator()
11697
11698template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11699KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11700T* RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::pointer() {
11701 return array_.data();
11702}
11703
11704
11705template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11706KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11707RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout> & RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::
11708 operator= (const RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout> &temp) {
11709
11710 if (this != &temp) {
11711 /*
11712 SArray1D tempdim = SArray1D("tempdim", 1);
11713 auto h_tempdim = HostMirror(tempdim);
11714 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideDim", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
11715 tempdim(0) = strides_array.size();
11716 //dim1_ = strides_array.size();
11717 });
11718 Kokkos::fence();
11719 deep_copy(h_tempdim, tempdim);
11720 dim1_ = h_tempdim(0);
11721 */
11722 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
11723
11724 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
11725 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
11726 //start_index_(0) = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
11727
11728 /*
11729 size_t * h_start_index = new size_t [dim1_+1];
11730 h_start_index[0] = 0;
11731 size_t * herenow = new size_t [2];
11732 herenow[0] = 1;
11733 herenow[1] = 2;
11734 size_t count = 0;
11735 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
11736 count += herenow[i];
11737 h_start_index[(i + 1)] = count;
11738 printf("%d) Start check %ld\n", i, h_start_index[i]);
11739 } // end for i
11740 */
11741 /*
11742 SArray1D templen = SArray1D("templen", 1);
11743 auto h_templen = Kokkos::create_mirror_view(templen);
11744 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
11745 Kokkos::parallel_for("ArrayLength", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
11746 templen(0) = start_index_(dim1_);
11747 //length_ = start_index_(dim1_);
11748 });
11749 #else
11750 templen_functor templen_execution_functor(templen);
11751 Kokkos::parallel_for("ArrayLength", 1, templen_execution_functor);
11752 #endif
11753 Kokkos::fence();
11754 Kokkos::deep_copy(h_templen, templen);
11755 if (h_templen(0) != 0)
11756 length_ = h_templen(0);
11757 else
11758 */
11759 length_ = temp.length_;
11760
11761
11762 //printf("Length %ld\n", length_);
11763
11764 //Kokkos::parallel_for("StartCheck", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
11765 // printf("%d) Start %ld\n", i, start_index_(i));
11766 // });
11767 //Kokkos::fence();
11768
11769 array_ = temp.array_;
11770 mystrides_ = temp.mystrides_;
11771
11772 /*
11773 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
11774 length_ = temp.length_;
11775 start_index_ = SArray1D("start_index_", dim1_ + 1);
11776 Kokkos::parallel_for("EqualOperator", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int j) {
11777 start_index_(j) = temp.start_index_(j);
11778 });
11779 //for (int j = 0; j < dim1_; j++) {
11780 // start_index_(j) = temp.start_index_(j);
11781 //}
11782 array_ = TArray1D("array_", length_);
11783 */
11784 }
11785
11786 return *this;
11787}
11788
11789//return the stored Kokkos view
11790template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11791KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11792Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::get_kokkos_view() {
11793 return array_;
11794}
11795
11796// Destructor
11797template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11798KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11799RaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::~RaggedRightArrayKokkos() { }
11800
11802// End of RaggedRightArrayKokkos
11804
11808template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void, typename ILayout = Layout>
11809class RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos {
11810
11811 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11812 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11813 using Strides1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,ILayout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
11814
11815private:
11816 TArray1D array_;
11817
11818 size_t dim1_, vector_dim_;
11819 size_t length_;
11820
11821public:
11822 // Default constructor
11823 RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos();
11824
11825 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
11826
11827 // Overload constructor for a CArrayKokkos
11828 RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim,
11829 const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY );
11830
11831 // Overload constructor for a ViewCArray
11832 RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11833
11834 // Overloaded constructor for a traditional array
11835 RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim1, size_t vector_dim, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
11836
11837 // A method to return the stride size
11838 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11839 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
11840
11841 // A method to increase the number of column entries, i.e.,
11842 // the stride size. Used with the constructor for building
11843 // the stride_array dynamically.
11844 // DO NOT USE with the constructures with a strides_array
11845 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11846 size_t& build_stride(const size_t i) const;
11847
11848 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11849 void stride_finalize() const;
11850
11851 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
11852 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
11853 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11854 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const;
11855
11856 // method to return total size
11857 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11858 size_t size(){
11859 return length_;
11860 }
11861
11862 //setup start indices
11863 void data_setup(const std::string& tag_string);
11864
11865 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11866 T* pointer();
11867
11868 //return the view
11869 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11870 TArray1D get_kokkos_view();
11871
11872 // Kokkos views of strides and start indices
11873 Strides1D mystrides_;
11874 SArray1D start_index_;
11875
11876 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11877 RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos& operator= (const RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos &temp);
11878
11879 //functors for kokkos execution policies
11880 // initialize start indices view
11881 class init_start_indices_functor{
11882 public:
11883 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11884 init_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
11885 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11886 }
11887 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
11888 mystart_index_(index) = 0;
11889 }
11890 };
11891
11892 //setup start indices view
11893 class setup_start_indices_functor{
11894 public:
11895 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11896 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
11897 size_t myvector_dim_;
11898 setup_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_, Strides1D temp_strides_, size_t myvector_dim){
11899 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11900 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
11901 myvector_dim_ = myvector_dim;
11902 }
11903 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, int& update, bool final) const {
11904 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11905 const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index)*myvector_dim_;
11906 update += count;
11907 if (final) {
11908 mystart_index_((index+1)) = update;
11909 }
11910 }
11911 };
11912
11913 //setup length of view
11914 class setup_length_functor{
11915 public:
11916 //kokkos needs this typedef named
11917 typedef size_t value_type;
11918 // This is helpful for determining the right index type,
11919 // especially if you expect to need a 64-bit index.
11920 //typedef Kokkos::View<size_t*>::size_type size_type;
11921
11922 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
11923 size_t myvector_dim_;
11924
11925 setup_length_functor(Strides1D temp_strides_, size_t myvector_dim){
11926 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
11927 myvector_dim_ = myvector_dim;
11928 }
11929 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, size_t& update) const {
11930 //const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index)*myvector_dim_;
11931 update += mytemp_strides_(index)*myvector_dim_;;
11932 }
11933 };
11934
11935 //sets final 1D array size
11936 class finalize_stride_functor{
11937 public:
11938 SArray1D mystart_index_;
11939 finalize_stride_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
11940 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
11941 }
11942 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, int& update, bool final) const {
11943 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
11944 const size_t count = mystart_index_(index+1);
11945 update += count;
11946 if (final) {
11947 mystart_index_((index+1)) = update;
11948 }
11949 }
11950 };
11951
11952 // Destructor
11953 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
11954 ~RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos ( );
11955}; // End of RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos
11956
11957template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11958RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos() {}
11959
11960// Overloaded constructor
11961template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11962RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t,ILayout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>
11963 &strides_array, size_t vector_dim,
11964 const std::string& tag_string) {
11965 //mystrides_.assign_data(strides_array.pointer());
11966 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
11967 mystrides_ = strides_array.get_kokkos_view();
11968 dim1_ = strides_array.extent();
11969 data_setup(tag_string);
11970} // End constructor
11971
11972/*
11973template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11974RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t,Kokkos::LayoutLeft,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>
11975 &strides_array, size_t vector_dim) {
11976 //mystrides_.assign_data(strides_array.pointer());
11977 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
11978 mystrides_ = strides_array;
11979 dim1_ = strides_array.extent();
11980} // End constructor
11981*/
11982
11983// Overloaded constructor
11984template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11985RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, size_t vector_dim,
11986 const std::string& tag_string) {
11987} // End constructor
11988
11989// Overloaded constructor
11990template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
11991RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim1, size_t vector_dim,
11992 const std::string& tag_string) {
11993 vector_dim_ = vector_dim;
11994 mystrides_.assign_data(strides_array);
11995 dim1_ = some_dim1;
11996 data_setup(tag_string);
11997} // End constructor
11998
11999//setup start indices
12000template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12001void RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::data_setup(const std::string& tag_string) {
12002
12003 //allocate start indices
12004 std::string append_indices_string("start_indices");
12005 std::string append_array_string("array");
12006 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12007 std::string start_index_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_indices_string);
12008 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12009 std::string array_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_array_string);
12010
12011 start_index_ = SArray1D(start_index_tag_string,dim1_ + 1);
12012 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12013 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
12014 start_index_((i) = 0;
12015 });
12016 #else
12017 init_start_indices_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
12018 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1,execution_functor);
12019 #endif
12020
12021 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12022 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update, const bool final) {
12023 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12024 const size_t count = mystrides_(i)*vector_dim_;
12025 update += count;
12026 if (final) {
12027 start_index_((i+1)) = update;
12028 }
12029
12030 });
12031 #else
12032 setup_start_indices_functor setup_execution_functor(start_index_, mystrides_, vector_dim_);
12033 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim1_,setup_execution_functor);
12034 #endif
12035
12036 //compute length of the storage
12037 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12038 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update) {
12039 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12040 update += mystrides_(i)*vector_dim_;
12041 }, length_);
12042 #else
12043 setup_length_functor length_functor(mystrides_, vector_dim_);
12044 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim1_, length_functor,length_);
12045 #endif
12046
12047 //allocate view
12048 array_ = TArray1D(array_tag_string, length_);
12049}
12050
12051// A method to return the stride size
12052template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12053KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12054size_t RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::stride(size_t i) const {
12055 // Ensure that i is within bounds
12056 assert(i < (dim1_) && "i is greater than dim1_ in RaggedRightArray");
12057 return mystrides_(i);
12058}
12059
12060// Method to build the stride (non-Kokkos push back)
12061template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12062KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12063size_t& RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::build_stride(const size_t i) const {
12064 return start_index_(i+1);
12065}
12066
12067// Method to finalize stride
12068template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12069KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12070void RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::stride_finalize() const {
12071
12072 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12073 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update, const bool final) {
12074 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12075 const size_t count = start_index_(i+1);
12076 update += count;
12077 if (final) {
12078 start_index_((i+1)) = update;
12079 }
12080
12081 });
12082 #else
12083 finalize_stride_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
12084 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim1_,execution_functor);
12085 #endif
12086 Kokkos::fence();
12087}
12088
12089
12090// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
12091// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
12092template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12093KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12094T& RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j, size_t k) const {
12095 // Get the 1D array index
12096 size_t start = start_index_(i);
12097
12098 // asserts
12099 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in RaggedRightArrayKokkos"); // die if >= dim1
12100 assert(j < stride(i) && "j is out of stride bounds in RaggedRightArrayKokkos"); // die if >= stride
12101 assert(j < vector_dim_ && "k is out of vector_dim bounds in RaggedRightArrayKokkos"); // die if >= vector_dim
12102
12103 return array_(j*vector_dim_ + start + k);
12104} // End operator()
12105
12106template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12107KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12108T* RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::pointer() {
12109 return array_.data();
12110}
12111
12112
12113template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12114KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12115RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout> & RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::
12116 operator= (const RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout> &temp) {
12117
12118 if (this != &temp) {
12119 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
12120 vector_dim_ = temp.vector_dim_;
12121
12122 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
12123 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
12124 length_ = temp.length_;
12125
12126 array_ = temp.array_;
12127 mystrides_ = temp.mystrides_;
12128 }
12129
12130 return *this;
12131}
12132
12133//return the stored Kokkos view
12134template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12135KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12136Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::get_kokkos_view() {
12137 return array_;
12138}
12139
12140// Destructor
12141template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12142KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12143RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::~RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos() { }
12144
12146// End of RaggedRightArrayofVectorsKokkos
12148
12152template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace,
12153 typename MemoryTraits = void, typename ILayout = Layout>
12154class RaggedDownArrayKokkos {
12155
12156 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12157 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12158 using Strides1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *, ILayout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12159
12160private:
12161 TArray1D array_;
12162
12163 size_t dim2_;
12164 size_t length_;
12165
12166public:
12167 // Default constructor
12168 RaggedDownArrayKokkos();
12169
12170 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
12171
12172 // Overload constructor for a CArray
12173 RaggedDownArrayKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
12174
12175 // Overload constructor for a ViewCArray
12176 RaggedDownArrayKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
12177
12178 // Overloaded constructor for a traditional array
12179 RaggedDownArrayKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
12180
12181 // A method to return the stride size
12182 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12183 size_t stride(size_t j) const;
12184
12185 //setup start indices
12186 void data_setup(const std::string& tag_string);
12187
12188 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
12189 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
12190 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12191 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
12192
12193 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12194 T* pointer();
12195
12196 //return the view
12197 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12198 TArray1D get_kokkos_view();
12199
12200 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12201 RaggedDownArrayKokkos& operator= (const RaggedDownArrayKokkos &temp);
12202
12203 // Kokkos views of strides and start indices
12204 Strides1D mystrides_;
12205 SArray1D start_index_;
12206
12207 //functors for kokkos execution policies
12208 //initialize start indices view
12209 class init_start_indices_functor{
12210 public:
12211 SArray1D mystart_index_;
12212 init_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
12213 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
12214 }
12215 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
12216 mystart_index_(index) = 0;
12217 }
12218 };
12219
12220 //setup start indices view
12221 class setup_start_indices_functor{
12222 public:
12223 SArray1D mystart_index_;
12224 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
12225 setup_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_, Strides1D temp_strides_){
12226 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
12227 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
12228 }
12229 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, int& update, bool final) const {
12230 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12231 const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index);
12232 update += count;
12233 if (final) {
12234 mystart_index_((index+1)) = update;
12235 }
12236 }
12237 };
12238
12239 //setup length of view
12240 class setup_length_functor{
12241 public:
12242 //kokkos needs this typedef named
12243 typedef size_t value_type;
12244 // This is helpful for determining the right index type,
12245 // especially if you expect to need a 64-bit index.
12246 //typedef Kokkos::View<size_t*>::size_type size_type;
12247 Strides1D mytemp_strides_;
12248 setup_length_functor(Strides1D temp_strides_){
12249 mytemp_strides_ = temp_strides_;
12250 }
12251 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index, size_t& update) const {
12252 //const size_t count = mytemp_strides_(index);
12253 update += mytemp_strides_(index);
12254 }
12255 };
12256
12257 // Destructor
12258 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12259 ~RaggedDownArrayKokkos ( );
12260}; // End of RaggedDownArray
12261
12262template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12263RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedDownArrayKokkos() {}
12264
12265// Overloaded constructor
12266template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12267RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedDownArrayKokkos(CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &strides_array,
12268 const std::string& tag_string) {
12269 mystrides_ = strides_array.get_kokkos_view();
12270 dim2_ = strides_array.extent();
12271 data_setup(tag_string);
12272} // End constructor
12273
12274// Overloaded constructor
12275template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12276RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedDownArrayKokkos(ViewCArray<size_t> &strides_array, const std::string& tag_string) {
12277} // End constructor
12278
12279// Overloaded constructor
12280template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12281RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::RaggedDownArrayKokkos(size_t* strides_array, size_t some_dim2,
12282 const std::string& tag_string) {
12283 mystrides_.assign_data(strides_array);
12284 dim2_ = some_dim2;
12285 data_setup(tag_string);
12286} // End constructor
12287
12288
12289//setup start indices
12290template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12291void RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::data_setup(const std::string& tag_string) {
12292 //allocate start indices
12293 std::string append_indices_string("start_indices");
12294 std::string append_array_string("array");
12295 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12296 std::string start_index_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_indices_string);
12297 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12298 std::string array_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_array_string);
12299
12300 start_index_ = SArray1D(start_index_tag_string,dim2_ + 1);
12301 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12302 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim2_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
12303 start_index_((i) = 0;
12304 });
12305 #else
12306 init_start_indices_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
12307 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim2_+1,execution_functor);
12308 #endif
12309
12310 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12311 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim2_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update, const bool final) {
12312 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12313 const size_t count = mystrides_(i);
12314 update += count;
12315 if (final) {
12316 start_index_((i+1)) = update;
12317 }
12318
12319 });
12320 #else
12321 setup_start_indices_functor setup_execution_functor(start_index_, mystrides_);
12322 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValuesSetup", dim2_,setup_execution_functor);
12323 #endif
12324
12325 //compute length of the storage
12326 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12327 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim2_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i, int& update) {
12328 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12329 update += mystrides_(i);
12330 }, length_);
12331 #else
12332 setup_length_functor length_functor(mystrides_);
12333 Kokkos::parallel_reduce("LengthSetup", dim2_, length_functor, length_);
12334 #endif
12335
12336 //allocate view
12337 array_ = TArray1D(array_tag_string, length_);
12338}
12339
12340// A method to return the stride size
12341template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12342KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12343size_t RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::stride(size_t j) const {
12344 // Ensure that j is within bounds
12345 assert(j < (dim2_) && "j is greater than dim1_ in RaggedDownArray");
12346
12347 return mystrides_(j);
12348}
12349
12350// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j)
12351// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
12352template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12353KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12354T& RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
12355 // Get the 1D array index
12356 size_t start = start_index_(j);
12357
12358 // asserts
12359 assert(i < stride(j) && "i is out of stride bounds in RaggedDownArrayKokkos"); // die if >= stride
12360 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is out of dim1 bounds in RaggedDownArrayKokkos"); // die if >= dim1
12361
12362 return array_(i + start);
12363} // End operator()
12364
12365template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12366KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12367RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>& RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::
12368operator= (const RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout> &temp) {
12369
12370 if (this != &temp) {
12371 /*
12372 SArray1D tempdim = SArray1D("tempdim", 1);
12373 auto h_tempdim = HostMirror(tempdim);
12374 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideDim", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
12375 tempdim(0) = strides_array.size();
12376 //dim1_ = strides_array.size();
12377 });
12378 Kokkos::fence();
12379 deep_copy(h_tempdim, tempdim);
12380 dim1_ = h_tempdim(0);
12381 */
12382 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
12383
12384 // Create and initialize the starting index of the entries in the 1D array
12385 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
12386 /*
12387 //start_index_(0) = 0; // the 1D array starts at 0
12388 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12389 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartFirst", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
12390 start_index_(0) = 0;
12391 });
12392 #else
12393 assignment_init_functor init_execution_functor;
12394 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartFirst", 1, init_execution_functor);
12395 #endif
12396 Kokkos::fence();
12397
12398 // Loop over to find the total length of the 1D array to
12399 // represent the ragged-right array and set the starting 1D index
12400 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12401 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim2_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int j, double& update, const bool final) {
12402 // Load old value in case we update it before accumulating
12403 const size_t count = temp.mystrides_[j];
12404 update += count;
12405 if (final) {
12406 start_index_((j+1)) = update;
12407 }
12408
12409 });
12410 #else
12411 assignment_scan_functor scan_execution_functor(temp);
12412 Kokkos::parallel_scan("StartValues", dim2_, scan_execution_functor);
12413 #endif
12414 Kokkos::fence();
12415 */
12416 /*
12417 size_t * h_start_index = new size_t [dim1_+1];
12418 h_start_index[0] = 0;
12419 size_t * herenow = new size_t [2];
12420 herenow[0] = 1;
12421 herenow[1] = 2;
12422 size_t count = 0;
12423 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
12424 count += herenow[i];
12425 h_start_index[(i + 1)] = count;
12426 printf("%d) Start check %ld\n", i, h_start_index[i]);
12427 } // end for i
12428 */
12429 /*
12430 SArray1D templen = SArray1D("templen", 1);
12431 auto h_templen = Kokkos::create_mirror_view(templen);
12432 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12433 Kokkos::parallel_for("ArrayLength", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
12434 templen(0) = start_index_(dim2_);
12435 //length_ = start_index_(dim2_);
12436 });
12437 #else
12438 templen_functor templen_execution_functor(templen);
12439 Kokkos::parallel_for("ArrayLength", 1, templen_execution_functor);
12440 #endif
12441 Kokkos::fence();
12442 deep_copy(h_templen, templen);
12443 length_ = h_templen(0);
12444
12445 printf("Length %ld\n", length_);
12446
12447 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12448 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartCheck", dim2_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int j) {
12449 printf("%d) Start %ld\n", j, start_index_(j));
12450 });
12451 #else
12452 stride_check_functor check_execution_functor;
12453 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartCheck", dim2_+1, check_execution_functor);
12454 #endif
12455 Kokkos::fence();
12456 */
12457 length_ = temp.length_;
12458 array_ = temp.length_;
12459 mystrides_ = temp.mystrides_;
12460
12461 /*
12462 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
12463 length_ = temp.length_;
12464 start_index_ = SArray1D("start_index_", dim1_ + 1);
12465 Kokkos::parallel_for("EqualOperator", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int j) {
12466 start_index_(j) = temp.start_index_(j);
12467 });
12468 //for (int j = 0; j < dim1_; j++) {
12469 // start_index_(j) = temp.start_index_(j);
12470 //}
12471 array_ = TArray1D("array_", length_);
12472 */
12473 }
12474
12475 return *this;
12476}
12477
12478//return the stored Kokkos view
12479template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12480KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12481Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::get_kokkos_view() {
12482 return array_;
12483}
12484
12485// Destructor
12486template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits, typename ILayout>
12487KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12488RaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits,ILayout>::~RaggedDownArrayKokkos() { }
12489
12491// End of RaggedDownArrayKokkos
12493
12494//11. DynamicRaggedRightArray
12495template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
12496class DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos {
12497
12498 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12499 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12500
12501private:
12502 // THIS WILL BE A GPU POINTER!
12503 SArray1D stride_;
12504 TArray1D array_;
12505
12506 size_t dim1_;
12507 size_t dim2_;
12508 size_t length_;
12509
12510public:
12511 // Default constructor
12512 DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos ();
12513
12514 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
12515
12516 // overload constructor
12517 DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
12518
12519 // A method to return or set the stride size
12520 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12521 size_t& stride(size_t i) const;
12522
12523 // A method to return the size
12524 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12525 size_t size() const;
12526
12527 //return the view
12528 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12529 TArray1D get_kokkos_view();
12530
12531 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
12532 // where i=[0:N-1], j=[stride(i)]
12533 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12534 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
12535
12536 // Overload copy assignment operator
12537 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12538 DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos& operator= (const DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos &temp);
12539
12540 //kokkos policy functors
12541
12542 //functors for kokkos execution policies
12543 //set strides to a constant value
12544 class set_strides_functor{
12545 public:
12546 SArray1D functor_strides_;
12547 size_t init_stride_;
12548 set_strides_functor(size_t init_stride, SArray1D temp_strides_){
12549 init_stride_ = init_stride;
12550 functor_strides_ = temp_strides_;
12551 }
12552 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
12553 functor_strides_(index) = init_stride_;
12554 }
12555 };
12556
12557 // Destructor
12558 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12559 ~DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos ();
12560};
12561
12562//nothing
12563template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12564DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos () {}
12565
12566// Overloaded constructor
12567template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12568DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
12569 // The dimensions of the array;
12570 dim1_ = dim1;
12571 dim2_ = dim2;
12572 length_ = dim1*dim2;
12573
12574 std::string append_stride_string("strides");
12575 std::string append_array_string("array");
12576 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12577 std::string strides_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_stride_string);
12578 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12579 std::string array_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_array_string);
12580
12581 stride_ = SArray1D(strides_tag_string, dim1_);
12582 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12583 Kokkos::parallel_for("StridesInit", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
12584 strides_((i) = 0;
12585 });
12586 #else
12587 set_strides_functor execution_functor(0, stride_);
12588 Kokkos::parallel_for("StridesInit", dim1_,execution_functor);
12589 #endif
12590
12591 //allocate view
12592 array_ = TArray1D(array_tag_string, length_);
12593}
12594
12595// A method to set the stride size for row i
12596template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12597KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12598size_t& DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::stride(size_t i) const {
12599 return stride_(i);
12600}
12601
12602//return size
12603template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12604KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12605size_t DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const{
12606 return length_;
12607}
12608
12609// Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
12610// where i=[0:N-1], j=[0:stride(i)]
12611template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12612KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12613T& DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
12614 // Asserts
12615 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of dim1 bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= dim1
12616 assert(j < stride_(i) && "j is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= dim2
12617 // Cannot assert on Kokkos View
12618 //assert(j < stride_[i] && "j is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedRight"); // die if >= stride
12619
12620 return array_(j + i*dim2_);
12621}
12622
12623//overload = operator
12624template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12625KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12626DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>&
12627 DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp)
12628{
12629
12630 if( this != &temp) {
12631 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
12632 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
12633 length_ = temp.length_;
12634 stride_ = temp.stride_;
12635 array_ = temp.array_;
12636 /*
12637 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12638 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideZeroOut", dim1_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
12639 stride_(i) = 0;
12640 });
12641 #else
12642 stride_zero_functor execution_functor;
12643 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideZeroOut", dim1_, execution_functor);
12644 #endif
12645 */
12646 }
12647
12648 return *this;
12649}
12650
12651//return the stored Kokkos view
12652template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12653KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12654Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() {
12655 return array_;
12656}
12657
12658// Destructor
12659template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12660KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12661DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DynamicRaggedRightArrayKokkos() {
12662}
12663
12664
12665
12666
12667//----end DynamicRaggedRightArray class definitions----
12668
12669
12670//12. DynamicRaggedDownArray
12671
12672template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
12673class DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos {
12674
12675 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12676 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t *,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12677
12678private:
12679 SArray1D stride_;
12680 TArray1D array_;
12681
12682 size_t dim1_;
12683 size_t dim2_;
12684 size_t length_;
12685
12686public:
12687 // Default constructor
12688 DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos ();
12689
12690 //--- 2D array access of a ragged right array ---
12691
12692 // overload constructor
12693 DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string = DEFAULTSTRINGARRAY);
12694
12695 // A method to return or set the stride size
12696 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12697 size_t& stride(size_t j) const;
12698
12699 // A method to return the size
12700 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12701 size_t size() const;
12702
12703 //return the view
12704 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12705 TArray1D get_kokkos_view();
12706
12707 // Overload operator() to access data as array(i,j),
12708 // where i=[stride(j)], j=[0:N-1]
12709 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12710 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
12711
12712 // Overload copy assignment operator
12713 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12714 DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos& operator= (const DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos &temp);
12715
12716 //kokkos policy functors
12717 //set strides to 0 functor
12718 //set strides to a constant value
12719 class set_strides_functor{
12720 public:
12721 SArray1D functor_strides_;
12722 size_t init_stride_;
12723 set_strides_functor(size_t init_stride, SArray1D temp_strides_){
12724 init_stride_ = init_stride;
12725 functor_strides_ = temp_strides_;
12726 }
12727 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
12728 functor_strides_(index) = init_stride_;
12729 }
12730 };
12731
12732 // Destructor
12733 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12734 ~DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos ();
12735};
12736
12737//nothing
12738template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12739DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos () {}
12740
12741// Overloaded constructor
12742template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12743DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos (size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string& tag_string) {
12744 // The dimensions of the array;
12745 dim1_ = dim1;
12746 dim2_ = dim2;
12747 length_ = dim1*dim2;
12748
12749 std::string append_stride_string("strides");
12750 std::string append_array_string("array");
12751 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12752 std::string strides_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_stride_string);
12753 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
12754 std::string array_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_array_string);
12755
12756 stride_ = SArray1D(strides_tag_string, dim2_);
12757 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12758 Kokkos::parallel_for("StridesInit", dim2_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
12759 strides_((i) = 0;
12760 });
12761 #else
12762 set_strides_functor execution_functor(0, stride_);
12763 Kokkos::parallel_for("StridesInit", dim2_,execution_functor);
12764 #endif
12765
12766 //allocate view
12767 array_ = TArray1D(array_tag_string, length_);
12768}
12769
12770// A method to set the stride size for column j
12771template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12772KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12773size_t& DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::stride(size_t j) const {
12774 return stride_(j);
12775}
12776
12777//return size
12778template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12779KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12780size_t DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::size() const{
12781 return length_;
12782}
12783
12784// overload operator () to access data as an array(i,j)
12785// Note: i = 0:stride(j), j = 0:N-1
12786
12787template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12788KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12789T& DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
12790 // Asserts
12791 assert(j < dim2_ && "j is out of dim2 bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos"); // die if >= dim2
12792 assert(i < stride(j) && "i is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos"); // die if >= stride(j)
12793 // Can't do this assert with a Kokkos View
12794 //assert(i < stride_[j] && "i is out of stride bounds in DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos"); // die if >= stride
12795
12796 return array_(i + j*dim1_);
12797}
12798
12799//overload = operator
12800template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12801KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12802DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>&
12803 DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator= (const DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp)
12804{
12805
12806 if( this != &temp) {
12807 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
12808 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
12809 length_ = temp.length_;
12810 stride_ = temp.stride_;
12811 array_ = temp.array_;
12812 /*
12813 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
12814 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideZeroOut", dim2_, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int j) {
12815 stride_(j) = 0;
12816 });
12817 #else
12818 stride_zero_functor execution_functor;
12819 Kokkos::parallel_for("StrideZeroOut", dim2_, execution_functor);
12820 #endif
12821 */
12822 }
12823
12824 return *this;
12825}
12826
12827//return the stored Kokkos view
12828template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12829KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12830Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_kokkos_view() {
12831 return array_;
12832}
12833
12834// Destructor
12835template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
12836KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12837DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~DynamicRaggedDownArrayKokkos() {
12838}
12839
12841
12842// KokkosCSRArray
12843template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
12844class CSRArrayKokkos {
12845
12846 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12847 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
12848
12849 private: // What ought to be private ?
12850 size_t dim1_, dim2_;
12851 size_t nnz_;
12852 TArray1D array_;
12853 SArray1D column_index_;
12854 SArray1D start_index_;
12855 TArray1D miss_;
12856 public:
12857
12862 CSRArrayKokkos();
12863 //CSRArray(CArray<T> data, CArray<T> col_ptrs, CArray<T> row_ptrs, size_t rows, size_t cols);
12864
12865 CSRArrayKokkos(
12866 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &start_index,
12867 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array,
12868 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &colum_index,
12869 size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string & tag_string);
12870
12871
12875 //KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12876 CSRArrayKokkos(const CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &dense, const size_t dim1, const size_t dim2);
12877
12878 void data_setup(const std::string& tag_string);
12886 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12887 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
12888
12896 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12897 T& value(size_t i, size_t j) const;
12898
12904 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12905 CSRArrayKokkos& operator=(const CSRArrayKokkos &temp);
12906
12907
12912 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12913 T* pointer() const;
12914
12919 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12920 size_t* get_starts() const;
12921
12922
12928 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12929 size_t dim2() const ;
12930
12936 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12937 size_t dim1() const;
12938
12945 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12946 T* begin(size_t i);
12947
12954 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12955 T* end(size_t i);
12956
12963 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12964 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
12965
12966
12967 /*
12968 * @brief get values from dense array
12969 */
12970 void from_dense(CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &starts,
12971 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &columns,
12972 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array);
12973
12974 /*
12975 * iterator for the raw data at row i
12976 * i.e. return the index each element is the index in the 1 array
12977 * This as the use of providing a reasonable way to get the column
12978 * index and data value in the case you need both
12979 */
12980 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12981 size_t begin_index(size_t i);
12982 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12983 size_t end_index(size_t i);
12984
12988 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12989 size_t nnz(size_t i);
12990
12994 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
12995 size_t nnz() const ;
12996
12997 // Use the index into the 1d array to get what value is stored there and what is the corresponding row
12998 T& get_val_flat(size_t k);
12999 size_t get_col_flat(size_t k);
13000 // reverse map function from A(i,j) to what element of data/col_pt_ it corersponds to
13001 int flat_index(size_t i, size_t j);
13002 // Convertor
13003
13004 // int toCSC(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs);
13005
13006 void to_dense(CArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>& A);
13007
13008 class init_start_indices_functor{
13009 public:
13010 SArray1D mystart_index_;
13011 init_start_indices_functor(SArray1D tempstart_index_){
13012 mystart_index_ = tempstart_index_;
13013 }
13014 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void operator()(const int index) const {
13015 mystart_index_(index) = 0;
13016 }
13017 };
13018 //destructor
13019 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13020 ~CSRArrayKokkos();
13021
13022
13023};
13024
13025template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13026CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout,ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::CSRArrayKokkos() {}
13027
13028template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13029CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CSRArrayKokkos(
13030 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &start_index,
13031 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array,
13032 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &colum_index,
13033 size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string & tag_string){
13034 dim1_ = dim1;
13035 dim2_ = dim2;
13036 start_index_ = start_index.get_kokkos_view();
13037 array_ = array.get_kokkos_view();
13038 column_index_ = colum_index.get_kokkos_view();
13039 nnz_ = colum_index.extent();
13040 miss_ = TArray1D("miss", 1);
13041}
13042
13043/*
13044template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13045KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13046CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::CSRArrayKokkos(const CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &dense, const size_t dim1, const size_t dim2){
13047 dim1_ = dim1;
13048 dim2_ = dim2;
13049 miss_ = TArray1D("miss",1);
13050 start_index_ = Kokkos::View<size_t*>("start indices", dim1 + 1);
13051 nnz_ = 0;
13052
13053
13054 start_index_(0) = 0;
13055 // TODO MAKE parallel
13056 for(size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
13057 start_index_(i+1) = 0;
13058 for(size_t j =0; j < dim2_; j++){
13059 if(dense(i,j) != 0){
13060 start_index_(i+1) ++;
13061 nnz_++;
13062 }
13063 }
13064 }
13065
13066
13067 for(size_t i = 1; i < dim1_ + 1; i++){
13068 start_index_(i) = start_index_[i] + start_index_[i-1];
13069 }
13070
13071 column_index_ = Kokkos::View<size_t*>("column Indices", nnz_);
13072 array_ = Kokkos::View<T*>("array elements", nnz_);
13073 size_t next = 0 ;
13074 for(size_t i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
13075 for(size_t j =0 ; j < dim2_; j++){
13076 if(dense(i,j) != 0){
13077 // column_index_(next) = j;
13078 // array_(next) = dense(i,j);
13079 next++;
13080 }
13081 }
13082 }
13083}
13084*/
13085
13086//setup start indices
13087template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13088void CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::data_setup(const std::string& tag_string) {
13089 //allocate start indices
13090 std::string append_indices_string("start_indices");
13091 std::string temp_copy_string = tag_string;
13092 std::string start_index_tag_string = temp_copy_string.append(append_indices_string);
13093 temp_copy_string = tag_string;
13094
13095 start_index_ = SArray1D(start_index_tag_string, dim1_ + 1);
13096 #ifdef HAVE_CLASS_LAMBDA
13097 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int i) {
13098 start_index_(i) = 0;
13099 });
13100 #else
13101 init_start_indices_functor execution_functor(start_index_);
13102 Kokkos::parallel_for("StartValuesInit", dim1_+1,execution_functor);
13103 #endif
13104
13105}
13106
13107template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13108KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13109T& CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
13110 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
13111 size_t row_end = start_index_[i+1];
13112 size_t k;
13113 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
13114 if(column_index_[row_start + k] == j){
13115 return array_.data()[row_start + k];
13116 }
13117 }
13118 miss_[0] = (T) NULL;
13119 return miss_[0];
13120}
13121
13122
13123template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13124KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13125T& CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::value(size_t i, size_t j) const {
13126 size_t row_start = start_index_[i];
13127 size_t row_end = start_index_[i+1];
13128 size_t k;
13129 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
13130 if(column_index_[row_start + k] == j){
13131 return array_.data()[row_start + k];
13132 }
13133 }
13134 miss_[0] = (T) NULL;
13135 return miss_[0];
13136}
13137
13138template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13139KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13140T* CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::pointer() const{
13141 return array_.data();
13142}
13143
13144template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13145KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13146size_t* CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::get_starts() const {
13147 return start_index_.data();
13148}
13149
13150template<typename T,typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13151KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13152CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>& CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::operator=(const CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp){
13153 if(this != temp) {
13154 nnz_ = temp.nnz_;
13155 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
13156 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
13157
13158 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
13159 column_index_ = temp.column_index_;
13160 array_ = temp.array_;
13161 }
13162 return *this;
13163}
13164
13165template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13166void CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::to_dense(CArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>& A){
13167 size_t i,j;
13168 for(i = 0; i < dim1_; i++){
13169 for(j = 0; j < dim2_; j++){
13170 A(i,j) = (*this)(i,j);
13171 }
13172 }
13173}
13174
13175template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13176size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::stride(size_t i) const {
13177 assert(i <= dim1_ && "Index i out of bounds in CSRArray.stride()");
13178 return start_index_.data()[i+i] - start_index_.data()[i];
13179}
13180
13181
13182template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13183size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::dim2() const {
13184 return dim2_;
13185}
13186
13187template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13188size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::dim1() const{
13189 return dim1_;
13190}
13191
13192template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13193T* CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::begin(size_t i){
13194 assert(i <= dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin()");
13195 size_t row_start = start_index_.data()[i];
13196 return &array_.data()[row_start];
13197}
13198template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13199KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13200T* CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::end(size_t i){
13201 assert(i <= dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.end()");
13202 size_t row_start = start_index_.data()[i+1];
13203 return &array_.data()[row_start];
13204}
13205
13206template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13207KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13208size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::begin_index(size_t i){
13209 assert(i <= dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin_index()");
13210 return start_index_.data()[i];
13211}
13212
13213template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13214KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13215size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::end_index(size_t i){
13216 assert(i <= dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in CSRArray.begin_index()");
13217 return start_index_.data()[i+1];
13218}
13219
13220template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13221KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13222size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::nnz() const{
13223 return nnz_;
13224}
13225
13226template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13227KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13228size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::nnz(size_t i){
13229 assert(i <= nrows_ && "Index i out of bounds in CSRArray.stride()");
13230 return start_index_.data()[i+1] - start_index_.data()[i];
13231}
13232
13233template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13234T& CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::get_val_flat(size_t k){
13235 assert(k < nnz_ && "Index k is out of bounds in CSRArray.get_val_flat()");
13236 return array_.data()[k];
13237}
13238
13239template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13240size_t CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::get_col_flat(size_t k){
13241 assert(k < nnz_f && "Index k is out of bounds in CSRArray.get_col_lat()");
13242 return column_index_.data()[k];
13243}
13244
13245
13246template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13247int CSRArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::flat_index(size_t i, size_t j){
13248 size_t k;
13249 size_t row_start = start_index_.data()[i];
13250 size_t row_end = start_index_.data()[i+1];
13251 for(k = 0; k < row_end - row_start; k++){
13252 if(column_index_.data()[row_start+k] == j){
13253 return row_start+k;
13254 }
13255 }
13256 return -1;
13257}
13258
13259//template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13260//void CSRArrrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::from_dense(CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &starts,
13261// CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &columns,
13262// CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array);
13263
13264 /*
13265int CSRArray<T>::toCSC(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs ){
13266 int nnz_cols[ncols_ + 1];
13267 int col_counts[ncols_];
13268 int i = 0;
13269 // How many elements are each column
13270 for(i =0 ; i < ncols_; i++){
13271 nnz_cols[i] = 0;
13272 col_counts[i] = 0;
13273 }
13274 nnz_cols[ncols_] = 0;
13275 col_ptrs(0) = 0;
13276 for(i =0; i < nnz_; i++){
13277 nnz_cols[column_index_[i] + 1] += 1;
13278 }
13279 // What we actually care about is how many elements are
13280 // in all the columns preceeding this column.
13281 for(i = 1; i <= ncols_; i++){
13282 nnz_cols[i] = nnz_cols[i-1] + nnz_cols[i];
13283 col_ptrs(i) = nnz_cols[i];
13284 }
13285 size_t row = 1;
13286 // if b is at A(i,j) stored in csr format
13287 // it needs to go where the where the ith column starts
13288 // + how many things we have put in the "window"
13289 // we allocated for this column already
13290 // For row we simply keep track of what row we are currently in
13291 // as we scan through the 1d array of data.
13292 for(i = 0; i < nnz_; i++){
13293 if(i >= start_index_[row]){
13294 row++;
13295 }
13296 int idx = nnz_cols[column_index_[i]] + col_counts[column_index_[i]];
13297 col_counts[column_index_[i]] += 1;
13298 data(idx) = array_[i];
13299 row_ptrs(idx) = row - 1;
13300 }
13301 // I return an int because I thought I might need to return an error code
13302 // Not sure that is true
13303 return 0;
13304}
13305*/
13306
13307template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13308CSRArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::~CSRArrayKokkos() {}
13309
13310// 16 CSCArrayKokkos
13311template <typename T, typename Layout = DefaultLayout, typename ExecSpace = DefaultExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits = void>
13312class CSCArrayKokkos
13313{
13314
13315 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
13316 using SArray1D = Kokkos::View<size_t*, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>;
13317private: // What ought to be private ?
13318 size_t dim1_, dim2_;
13319 size_t nnz_;
13320 TArray1D array_;
13321 TArray1D miss_;
13322 SArray1D start_index_;
13323 SArray1D row_index_;
13324
13325 public:
13326
13331 CSCArrayKokkos();
13332
13342 CSCArrayKokkos(
13343 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &start_index,
13344 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array,
13345 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &row_index,
13346 size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string & tag_string);
13347
13348
13356 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13357 T &operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const;
13358
13365 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13366 CSCArrayKokkos &operator=(const CSCArrayKokkos &temp);
13367
13372 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13373 T *pointer() const;
13374
13381 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13382 size_t stride(size_t i) const;
13383
13391 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13392 T &value(size_t i, size_t j) const;
13393
13399 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13400 size_t *get_starts() const;
13401
13407 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13408 size_t dim1() const;
13409
13415 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13416 size_t dim2() const;
13417
13424 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13425 T *begin(size_t i);
13426
13433 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13434 T *end(size_t i);
13435
13436 // iterator for the raw data at row i
13437 // i.e. return the index each element is the index in the 1 array
13438 // This as the use of providing a reasonable way to get the column
13439 // index and data value in the case you need both
13440 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13441 size_t begin_index(size_t i);
13442
13443 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13444 size_t end_index(size_t i);
13445
13452 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13453 size_t nnz(size_t i);
13454
13460 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13461 size_t nnz() const;
13462
13463 // Use the index into the 1d array to get what value is stored there and what is the corresponding row
13464 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13465 T &get_val_flat(size_t k);
13466
13467 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13468 size_t get_row_flat(size_t k);
13469
13470 // reverse map function from A(i,j) to what element of data/col_pt_ it corersponds to
13471 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13472 int flat_index(size_t i, size_t j);
13473
13474 // Convertor
13475 //int toCSR(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs);
13476 //void to_dense(FArray<T> &A);
13477 // destructor
13478 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13479 ~CSCArrayKokkos();
13480};
13481
13482template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13483CSCArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::CSCArrayKokkos() {}
13484
13485
13486template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13487CSCArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::CSCArrayKokkos(
13488 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &start_index,
13489 CArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &array,
13490 CArrayKokkos<size_t, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits> &row_index,
13491 size_t dim1, size_t dim2, const std::string & tag_string){
13492
13493 dim1_ = dim1;
13494 dim2_ = dim2;
13495 start_index_ = start_index.get_kokkos_view();
13496 array_ = array.get_kokkos_view();
13497 row_index_ = row_index.get_kokkos_view();
13498 nnz_ = row_index.extent();
13499 miss_ = TArray1D("miss", 1);
13500}
13501
13502
13503template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13504KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13505T& CSCArrayKokkos<T, Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::operator()(size_t i, size_t j) const {
13506 size_t col_start = start_index_[j];
13507 size_t col_end = start_index_[j + 1];
13508 size_t k;
13509 for(k =0; k < col_end - col_start;k++){
13510 if(row_index_[col_start + k] == i){
13511 return array_.data()[col_start + k];
13512 }
13513 }
13514 //return array_.data()[nnz_];
13515 miss_[0] = (T) NULL;
13516 return miss_[0];
13517}
13518
13519template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13520KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13521T* CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::pointer() const {
13522 return array_.data();
13523}
13524
13525
13526template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13527KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13528T& CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::value(size_t i, size_t j) const {
13529 size_t col_start = start_index_.data()[j];
13530 size_t col_end = start_index_.data()[j + 1];
13531 size_t k;
13532 for(k =0; k < col_end - col_start;k++){
13533 if(row_index_.data()[col_start + k] == i){
13534 return array_.data()[col_start + k];
13535 }
13536 }
13537 miss_[0] = (T) NULL;
13538 return miss_[0];
13539}
13540
13541template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13542KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13543size_t* CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::get_starts() const{
13544 return &start_index_.data()[0];
13545}
13546
13547template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13548KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13549CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>& CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::operator=(const CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits> &temp){
13550 if(this != temp) {
13551 nnz_ = temp.nnz_;
13552 dim2_ = temp.dim2_;
13553 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;;
13554
13555 start_index_ = temp.start_index_;
13556 row_index_ = temp.row_row_index_;
13557 array_ = temp.array_;
13558 }
13559 return *this;
13560}
13561
13562template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13563KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13564size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::stride(size_t i) const{
13565 assert(i < dim2_ && "i is out of bounds in CSCArray.stride()");
13566 return start_index_.data()[i+1] - start_index_.data()[i];
13567}
13568
13569
13570template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13571KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13572size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::dim1() const {
13573 return dim1_;
13574}
13575
13576template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13577KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13578size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::dim2() const{
13579 return dim2_;
13580}
13581
13582template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13583KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13584T* CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::begin(size_t i){
13585 assert(i <= dim2_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.begin()");
13586 size_t col_start = start_index_.data()[i];
13587 return &array_.data()[col_start];
13588}
13589
13590template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13591KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13592T* CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::end(size_t i){
13593 assert(i <= dim2s_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.endt()");
13594 size_t col_start = start_index_.data()[i+1];
13595 return &array_.data()[col_start];
13596}
13597
13598template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13599KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13600size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::begin_index(size_t i){
13601 assert(i <= dim2s_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.begin_index()");
13602 return start_index_.data()[i];
13603}
13604
13605template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13606KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13607size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::end_index(size_t i){
13608 assert(i <= dim2_ && "index i out of bounds at CSCArray.end_index()");
13609 return start_index_.data()[i + 1];
13610}
13611
13612template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13613KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13614size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::nnz() const{
13615 return nnz_;
13616}
13617
13618template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13619KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13620size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::nnz(size_t i){
13621 return start_index_.data()[i+1] - start_index_.data()[i];
13622}
13623
13624template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13625KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13626T& CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::get_val_flat(size_t k){
13627 return array_.data()[k];
13628}
13629
13630template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13631KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13632size_t CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::get_row_flat(size_t k){
13633 return row_index_.data()[k];
13634}
13635
13636template<typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13637KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13638int CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout, ExecSpace, MemoryTraits>::flat_index(size_t i, size_t j){
13639 size_t col_start = start_index_.data()[j];
13640 size_t col_end = start_index_.data()[j+1];
13641 size_t k;
13642 for (k = 0; k < col_end - col_start; k++)
13643 {
13644 if(row_index_.data()[col_start + k] == i){
13645 return col_start + k;
13646 }
13647 }
13648 return -1;
13649}
13650
13651// Assumes that data, col_ptrs, and row_ptrs
13652// have been allocated size already before this call
13653// Returns the data in this csr format but as represented as the appropriatte vectors
13654// for a csc format
13655/*template<typename T>
13656int CSCArray<T>::toCSR(CArray<T> &data, CArray<size_t> &col_ptrs, CArray<size_t> &row_ptrs ){
13657 int nnz_rows[dim1_ + 1];
13658 int row_counts[dim1_];
13659 int i = 0;
13660 // How many elements are each column
13661 for(i =0 ; i < dim1_; i++){
13662 nnz_rows[i] = 0;
13663 row_counts[i] = 0;
13664 }
13665 nnz_rows[dim1_] = 0;
13666 row_ptrs(i) = 0 ;
13667 for(i =0; i < nnz_; i++){
13668 nnz_rows[row_index_[i] + 1] += 1;
13669 }
13670 // What we actually care about is how many elements are
13671 // in all the columns preceeding this column.
13672 for(i = 1; i < dim1_; i++){
13673 nnz_rows[i] = nnz_rows[i-1] + nnz_rows[i];
13674 row_ptrs(i) = nnz_rows[i];
13675 }
13676 size_t col = 1;
13677 // if b is at A(i,j) stored in csr format
13678 // it needs to go where the where the ith column starts
13679 // + how many things we have put in the "window"
13680 // we allocated for this column already
13681 // For row we simply keep track of what row we are currently in
13682 // as we scan through the 1d array of data.
13683 for(i = 0; i < nnz_; i++){
13684 if(i >= start_index_[col]){
13685 col++;
13686 }
13687 int idx = nnz_rows[row_index_[i]] + row_counts[row_index_[i]];
13688 row_counts[row_index_[i]] += 1;
13689 data(idx) = array_[i];
13690 col_ptrs(idx) = col - 1;
13691 }
13692 // I return an int because I thought I might need to return an error code
13693 // Not sure that is true
13694 return 0;
13695}
13696*/
13697
13698template <typename T, typename Layout, typename ExecSpace, typename MemoryTraits>
13699CSCArrayKokkos<T,Layout,ExecSpace,MemoryTraits>::~CSCArrayKokkos() {}
13700
13702// Inherited Class Array
13704
13705/*
13706//template<class T, class Layout, class ExecSpace>
13707template<typename T>
13708class InheritedArray2L {
13709
13710 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
13711
13712private:
13713 size_t dim1_, length_;
13714
13715public:
13716 TArray1D this_array_;
13717 typename Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>::HostMirror h_this_array_;
13718
13719 InheritedArray2L();
13720
13721 InheritedArray2L(size_t some_dim1);
13722
13723 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13724 T& operator()(size_t i, size_t dest) const;
13725
13726 template <typename U>
13727 void AllocateHost(size_t size, U *obj);
13728
13729 void AllocateGPU();
13730
13731 template <typename U, typename V>
13732 void InitModels(U *obj, V input);
13733
13734 template <typename U>
13735 void ClearModels(U obj);
13736
13737 InheritedArray2L& operator=(const InheritedArray2L& temp);
13738
13739 // GPU Method
13740 // Method that returns size
13741 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13742 size_t size();
13743
13744 // Host Method
13745 // Method that returns size
13746 size_t extent();
13747
13748 // Methods returns the raw pointer (most likely GPU) of the Kokkos View
13749 T* pointer();
13750
13751 // Deconstructor
13752 KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13753 ~InheritedArray2L ();
13754}; // End of InheritedArray2L
13755
13756// Default constructor
13757template <typename T>
13758InheritedArray2L<T>::InheritedArray2L() {}
13759
13760// Overloaded 1D constructor
13761template <typename T>
13762InheritedArray2L<T>::InheritedArray2L(size_t some_dim1) {
13763 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T*, Layout, ExecSpace>;
13764
13765 dim1_ = some_dim1;
13766 length_ = dim1_;
13767 this_array_ = TArray1D("this_array_", length_);
13768 h_this_array_ = Kokkos::create_mirror_view(this_array_);
13769}
13770
13771template <typename T>
13772KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13773T& InheritedArray2L<T>::operator()(size_t i, size_t dest) const {
13774 assert(i < dim1_ && "i is out of bounds in InheritedArray2L 1D!");
13775 assert(dest < 2 && "dest is out of bounds in InheritedArray2L 1D!");
13776 if (dest == 0)
13777 return h_this_array_(i);
13778 else
13779 return this_array_(i);
13780}
13781
13782template <typename T>
13783template <typename U>
13784void InheritedArray2L<T>::AllocateHost(size_t size, U *obj) {
13785 obj = (U *) kmalloc(size);
13786}
13787
13788template <typename T>
13789void InheritedArray2L<T>::AllocateGPU() {
13790 Kokkos::deep_copy(this_array_, h_this_array_);
13791}
13792
13793template <typename T>
13794template <typename U, typename V>
13795void InheritedArray2L<T>::InitModels(U *obj, V input) {
13796 Kokkos::parallel_for(
13797 "CreateObjects", 1, KOKKOS_CLASS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
13798 new ((V *)obj) V{input};
13799 });
13800}
13801
13802template <typename T>
13803template <typename U>
13804void InheritedArray2L<T>::ClearModels(U obj) {
13805 Kokkos::parallel_for(
13806 "DestroyObjects", 1, KOKKOS_LAMBDA(const int&) {
13807 this_array_(0).obj->~U();
13808 this_array_(1).obj->~U();
13809 });
13810}
13811
13812template <typename T>
13813InheritedArray2L<T>& InheritedArray2L<T>::operator= (const InheritedArray2L& temp) {
13814 using TArray1D = Kokkos::View<T *,Layout,ExecSpace>;
13815
13816 // Do nothing if the assignment is of the form x = x
13817 if (this != &temp) {
13818 dim1_ = temp.dim1_;
13819 length_ = temp.length_;
13820 this_array_ = TArray1D("this_array_", length_);
13821 }
13822
13823 return *this;
13824}
13825
13826// Return size
13827template <typename T>
13828KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13829size_t InheritedArray2L<T>::size() {
13830 return length_;
13831}
13832
13833template <typename T>
13834size_t InheritedArray2L<T>::extent() {
13835 return length_;
13836}
13837
13838template <typename T>
13839T* InheritedArray2L<T>::pointer() {
13840 return this_array_.data();
13841}
13842
13843template <typename T>
13844KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION
13845InheritedArray2L<T>::~InheritedArray2L() {}
13846*/
13847
13849// End of InheritedArray2L
13851
13852
13853// #endif
